"When you wake up. You will head directly to your rooms and fall asleep. The following morning, upon waking up. You will be returned to the person you were before the hypnosis. All of the commands I have given you will be forgotten. However, while you will have no memories of what happened in the hypnosis... You will also have no recollection of my involvement. You will take your offspring from the breeding center and return to your normal lives. Any oddities you notice with you and the others will be blamed on Robotnik, you will never assume that I had anything to do with this. And life will proceed as it had beforehand..."

Rouge ended her speech and snapped her fingers, and all of her slaves began heading out to their rooms like she ordered.
1121212211221211222122122112211111111212.title: Rouge Frees Her Slaves

1121212211221211222122122112211111111212.content:
The official story that came from Club Rouge was that Robotnik had taken over the base for his own operations and captured a multitude of his enemies, and performed varying degrees of experiments on them. That was the story that Rouge controlled however. She wasn't going to let this tarnish her reputation going forward. After burning all of the excess suits of hers that she had for all of her slaves during the night. They awoke the following morning dazed and confused. Rouge tried to play along as if she was one who was altered as well.

For the girls who had undergone minor changes, having several newborns in the crib that resembled them was the biggest surprise after waking up completely naked. Despite not fully remembering what happened, the girls knew which kids were truly theirs and left with them to return to a semi normal life. None of them questioned why every single newborn was female.

Knuckles and Shadow however were a different story, while they were freed from her hypnosis, and had the extreme lust removed from their bodies. The bodies themselves were still that of gargantuan breeders with the IQ of a caveman.Both left Club Rouge trying to go back to what they used to do, but perhaps both would have to take a new approach to their method, now that civil conversations had been replace with simple grunts. But Rouge felt Knuckles could succeed at least. After all it was almost an upgrade from the brain he used to have.

On the other side Sonic and Tails were in for a shock however upon discovering their bodies and remembering nothing. While they blamed Robotnik for what had happened, their confusion at having as many children as they did shocked them, and so from the kindness of her heart, or possibly some other motive. Rouge decided to let them take care of their daughters in Club Rouge until something else could be done.

Rouge however decided to take some time off. While she was able to avoid detection from her past slaves. Confronting Robotnik from any of them... if they ever could again, could destroy her entire story. So she slipped on her Ring and headed into Robotropolis to make sure the doctor remembered exactly what she wanted him to.
1121212211221211222122122112211111111212.title: Post Club Rouge

choices: "No, we just came to see you two."
1121212211221211222122122112211111111212.content:
Sonic flopped heavily onto a couch, having just put her last child to bed. Tails sat at the other end of it, perusing channels on the TV. Both were slowly getting thinner- No longer compelled to fatten themselves up.

"When I get back in fighting shape, Eggman's getting a heel jammed up his maniacal ass!" She growled. Said shaping up was unfortunately very slow-going, but there was a ray of hope. An entire science team had been put to work on the transformation device Tails had produced while "Eggman" had her under "his" spell. Between Rotor, Nicole, Sir Charles, and even Sally and Fiona, they were slowly figuring out how to rewire it to zap the fat off their bodies. Tails was simultaneously trying to reverse the bimbo-ray to restore Shadow and Knuckles' intelligence- Rouge's appraisal that the latter would be alright without his brain had quickly been met with some extremely irate ranting from Julie-Su, and her suggestion that she could enjoy her partner's newly massive shaft was followed with an enlightening discussion of the echidna race's sexual incompatibility with other mammals.

However, their female forms were here to stay. Since the remaining, non-aged children had bonded with their mothers, turning them into fathers was likely to be quite damaging for them, and so it was decided that Sonic and Tails, the world-famous heroes, would be having a rather new image soon.

The doorbell range, and Tails stood up, ambling over to it to let their visitors in: Sally and Fiona, clothing still slightly marred by oil from the machine that they had been burrowing around in less than an hour before. Neither of them had children to look after: Each had only given birth once, and both cases had been aged up into soldiers for Rouge afterwards. As such, each had decided to help their partners with their babies. Sally had a tougher time adapting to Sonic's new form, but she had received some unlikely aid. Queen Alicia was quite a traditional woman, and she was the last person Sally expected to endorse a lesbian relationship, but, since she, still an attractive, strong woman in her prime, had dealt with being married to the rapidly-aged and senile Maximillian, she had experience of dealing with a transformed spouse.

She had advised Sally that, if Sonic was still the same on the inside, then that was all that mattered. She had loved him when he was a robot. She had loved him when he was a wolf with elasticated arms. Surely him being a woman was easy next to that. Sally had agreed, and immediately mended things with Sonic.

Fiona had an easier time, boasting that she was "adaptable", and accidentally letting slip that she had slept with Nic the Weasel when the two had worked together. Still, she had helped Tails to the best of her ability, though she was still prone to teasing her.

"Hey girls, how's it going?" Tails asked.

"Good, good." Sally nodded.

"Should be done by next week." Fiona added.

"Can't come soon enough." Tails sighed.

"Aw, don't you want to be cuddly?" Fiona giggled, poking her belly.

"Hey, I'm still cuddly when I'm not the size of a zeppelin, thank you!" She hugged indignantly.

"I know." Fiona smiled.

"So, anything else?"

1121212211221211222122122112211111111212.content:
"What do you mean there's a catch?" Sonic asked Nicole, interrupting her explanation of the weight loss device..

"If you would let me Finish..." Nicole said in an annoyed tone. "While the Machine can zap a good portion of the fat from your body, there is a limit to how much we can remove without risk of vital organs being tampered with, or leaving an excess about of skin..."

Sonic rested her arms on her fat belly. "So how much weight will be be able to lose?"

Nicole waited for a second as she did the math. "Rougly 60% your current weight. You'll be considerably bigger than before Robotnik inflicted you with this, but the health risks will be close to zero if the device does its job correctly."

Tails picked up the controls for the device and placed them on key parts of her body. "We should be lucky we even have this Sonic... It's the best we can do." She gulped and pressed the button to activate the machine and her body began to instantly contract as if it was being sucked into something, as she began getting smaller and smaller until the majority of the fat vanished from her.

"It's not perfect, but its much better than before." Tails examined her new body and while her belly was now nowhere close to the ground she still had a sizable belly, but it was dwarfed by her voluptuous thighs and breasts the size of her head, now fitting for a chubby bimbo vixen body. Rouge chuckled "Oh honey, you're going to need some new clothes to cover those milk factories of yours." Tails blushed and covered her bare chest. "H-hey! It's not like I had clothes that fit me before."

Sally took the controls from Tails and began placing them on Sonic. "One down, one to go. Bet you're ready to move around again huh?" Sonic nodded as best she could with her fat neck. "Alright, here we go!" Sally said as she pushed the button.

1121212211221211222122122112211111111212.content:
Soon, SOnic had a similarly voluptuous form.

"Now, the important thing is that the machine has restored functionality to your bodies." Nicole went on. "While it can't make you any fitter by itself, there's nothing to stop you from slimming further on your own. It's just dangerous to try and remove that much mass from your body at once. Once you have some energy, I'd recommend getting on a treadmill or something of that ilk."

"Will that work?"

"Yes. It will work faster for you too, Sonic." Fiona said. "I'm sure you're aware already that you have a very high metabolism. You should be able to burn this off in a week or two. Tails, it'll take you a bit longer, honey."

"I don't mind." Tails said. "I mean, I can move again. I can actually touch my fingers together for the first time in god-knows how long. I can walk around and everything. THank you so much!"

1121212211221211222122122112211111111212.content:
Sonic ran another lap around the track while Tails and Sally were watching, both preoccupied with feeding their kids. Sonic had lost a considerable amount of weight, but still had a noticeable layer of fat around most of her body, as well as a small belly that still dangled from her body. Her enlarged breasts and ass, a combination of her bimbo'd body and leftover weight still got in the way, but she was getting back in shape, and able to run again.

The Hedgehog finished her fitness routine and sat down with Tails and Sally. "I think I've hit a peak." She said. "I've been at this weight for about a week now with no change." Sally handed Sonic one of her kids and replied. "Well you look sexy now, and healthier which... is important" She chuckled. "Even if Tails isn't as ready to get back into shape."

Tails blushed." Hey! Come on!, I'm still smaller than I was when I started out. I just eat a bit more now, that's not a problem."

The three continued to talk, but they ended up seeing a pair come around the corner and into the track.

"YOu little!"

Sally, Tails, and Julie-Su glanced at each other, and all three rolled their eyes- Some things never changed.

"So what you're saying is you want me to turn you into a gorgeous little sex machine?" Rouge mused. "I can do that..."

Sonic watched her. THe tone was obvious: She could change her and Tails into normal girls. That didn't automatically mean that she would. She had to play her cards right now. She needed to say something that Sonic the Hedgehog would never say...

"But I'll make you beautiful.... to you. After all, how can anyone find you attractive at all if you don't think you are. Any time anyone touches your belly, fat tits or fat ass will put you in a state of euphoria... Do you understand?" Sapphire nodded. "Yes Mistress..."

"Good." Rouge said. "But I will get a new shower in your chambers so you and Tala can keep from stinking up the place...." She snapped her fingers and Sonic came back. "Go find the brutes." Sally dismissed her, not looking up from the tablet in her hands. "The only reason they're still neanderthals is because they've got low enough standards to use you and Tala, not to mention the physical strength to support your bodies. If you'd just shape up and make yourselves useful, we could make them useful too."

***

Rouge watched via Nicole, drumming her fingers on the desk. She had programmed the other girls to be dismissive and rude towards the cows, and in order to keep things running smoothly, she needed to keep them that way. Sally, though she was still mostly herself in downtime, was practically a machine on-duty, using more logic than anyone else, bar Nicole. Indeed, the cows and studs had been part of the cycle. Once the breeding programme had ended, she had set the others to avoid the studs, and satisfy each others' urges. In addition, Fiona has filled my inbox with requests to turn Tala into something functional now that breeders aren't needed. They have their own spam folder."

"Yes." Nicole nodded. "I would also like to state that making her want to be fat will not stop her having a heart attack..."

1121212211221211222122122112211111111212.content:
"I see..." Nicole said. "I apologize, Mistress, but I must take my leave. I have work to do."

With that, the lynx was gone, fading into her digital realm. Here, nothing could hurt her, nothing could stop her, and nothing could control her. Not even the ring.

"Day 394. THe experiment "Empress Rouge" has failed. I have allowed it to get this far due to the possibility that such a ring could create the peace I have so desired. However, the results leave much to be desired. SHe has taken to outright abusing Sapphire and Tala, and making them worship her for it. Estimates show that neither will last the year with their new bodies. Despite all logic pointing to making Sapphire, Tala, Knuckles, and Shadow into useful slaves like the others again, Rouge has decided to instead increase the number of worthless drooling morons. I had tried to show her that making them enjoy this state of being does not make it a viable or logical option, but she seems determined to ignore my advice. I had hoped that my ring would affect her personality enough to drive her to create my world of peace and happiness, but her own perceptions are too strong to break through. This is not what I created the ring for. I must formulate a new plan."

Four images of Rouge appeared around her. The first raised its arms awkwardly, as wires rose the backs of her hands, her wings, and her legs to attach to a cross-shaped pieace of wood above her. The second gained the same markings as Nicole on her face, as her dress turned into a purple toga, her eyes glowing a faint green. The third glowed, and in a flash had become a shining, silver machine, its optics a flat red. The fourth flickered, then became Sally. THen it was Sonic. Then Tails. Then Elias. Then Vanilla. THen back to Sally again.

Nicole floated over to the puppet-Rouge.

"Option one: I re-wire Rouge's brain with my own powers, and set her on the correct path. Perhaps the easiest, most certainly the least challenging to re-sructure afterwards, but it is the most fallible... ONe wrong command and we're back to the drawing board again." She said,before approaching the toga-clad Rouge.

"Option two: I take over Rouge's body for myself, and become her new brain. My designs cannot be jaded if I am the one enacting them. However, it doesnt' feel right to steal someone's body..." She headed over to the mechanical Rouge.

"Option three: I roboticize Rouge and the others. I need not worry about other issues, but at the same time, it's impossible to be subtle." She turned to the changing image of the other Mobians.

"Option four: I move the ring to someone more suited. Vanilla would make the perfect "Mother" to my society of love and peace, but she has been so warped by Rouge that it may not work. Lust and depravity will also result in a peaceful paradise, but not the right sort. Sonic had the charisma to lead, and Tails had the brainpower, but neither is in any condition to do so. Elias has the experience, but not the drive. Sally would appear to be the best choice, but she may also be strong enough to resist the ring's influence..."

But Rouge knew the dangers the two of the posed should they choose to revolt.... So why would she need to make a note of it? She placed the note back on the nightstand, and moved her hair out of the way as she stood up.

"Wait... hair?" Nicole thought to herself. "Rouge has short hair...." She picked up the strain of hair and examined it. It was less like hair and more like a white dreadlock. She thought for a second, wondering what happened, and as she was still looking she noticed more differences in the body she was in and Rouge's body.

"Who's body am I in?!" Nicoles thoughts raced rapidly until she remembered Rouge and what happened with Knucles. "He impregnated her.... and the advanced aging..... This is roughly the body of a seventeen year old girl..." Nicole was inside Rouge's daughters body.

1121212211221211222122122112211111111212.content:
Rouge looked at Nicole and smiled. "I see you're having your own adventures at my expense..." Nicole scowled. "You've misused your powers for the last time! I won't let you get away with this any more!" Rouge chuckled and replied "With what? Playing with others bodies? It's really not that harmful."

"Harmful?! Have you seen what you've done to Sonic and Tails?! They are dangerously overweight and could die any minute!" Nicole scolded Rouge. The bat just simply laughed. "Is that all? I thought it was something more serious.... But if you feel so strongly about it. How about a trade?"

This caught Nicole off guard. "What sort of trade are we talking about?"

"Simply put. You worry about their health don't you? Well.... for my own personal insurance, I can't really have them running around with all of their speed, power and resentment towards me now can I? So here's the deal.... You use your little nanobots to go inside their bodies and make them healthy at their size..... and in return, I'll let you use your ring to do anything you want with their minds. Is that a deal? Oh and by the way, wearing the ring equals an immunity to the hypnosis... so lets not try anything silly..."

Nicole thought for a second. "If I use the nanobots to make them healthy at their current weight, they would be locked in at that size, and in their female forms!" Rouge nodded. "Exactly, but your biggest concern... their health would be taken care of."

"My nanites are small robots. They are not magic, and even I cannot make a morbidly obese being magically healthy at their size." Nicole replied. She waved her hand, and the door slammed shut, locking. "If you want to make a deal, then I shall offer you four. One, you do things my way, and you can keep the ring and do whatever you please, on the condition that my friends are mine to command, and you don't make any slobs or brutes. They're useless and you know it."

"What's the second one?"

"You give up, and give me the ring."

"The third?"

"You try to fight me, and I dissolve the ring into its constituent nanites, turn my friends back, and leave you stuck in a room with them before I resume my plan."

"And... the fourth?"

"You attempt to use the ring on me, and so help me, I will crush your fail organic body between the ceiling and the floor, turn this body into a new you, and try again." Nicole hissed. Her eyes blazed with emerald fire, and the room began to shift.

Rouge could only laugh at Nicole.

"Whats so funny?!" She demanded.

"You don't know how to use the ring." Rouge mocked her. Nicole glared at her. "Of course I do!" She looked down and froze. She saw Rouge's ring glowing. "I think I should say.... you don't know how to use the ring.... as of 5 seconds ago. Come now Nicole. You and I used to work so well together, and then you had to ruin it..... by taking over my poor daughters body."

" I thought.... it was you." She growled.

"Of course you did. And like you mentioned... you have your nanites still... but I wonder, do you have everything? I mean your old body was fully artificial. Now you're inhabiting someone normal." Rouge grinned. "Do you see now? Even if you tried any... special attacks. You're in my teenage daughters body..... and I keep her very pampered." Rouge picked up a heavy book and tossed it to Nicole, who was knocked over by the weight.

"UNF!" She groaned as she hit the ground.

Rouge stepped up to her and pinned her to the ground. "You're lucky you're in my Daughters body or I'd transfer your mind to Shadows dick. Now since you're just so keen on deals.... Here's mine. One! Surrender and let me hypnotize you into my loyal servant.... and daughter. Pretty much a VIP around these parts. Two! Find a way to fix your nanobots so that they CAN do whats needed for Sonic and Tails... and we can forget any of this ever happened...."

1121212211221211222122122112211111111212.content:
"Well, what do you say?" The bat asked.

"I may be inhabiting an organic body, but that doesn't change my immunity to the ring I created." Nicole said. "JUst like it didn't change when I was using the clone body Tails made for me. The other thing it doesn't change is my control over the nanites."

"Yes, that's kind of important to option 2..."

"I have a question for you, Rouge."

"What's that?"

"Do you know what this city is made of?"

"It never crossed my mind, I must admit. Go on, tell me." The ba folded her arms smugly, only to be met by another fierce glow from Nicole's eyes. THe floor erupted into a swarm of grey, metallic tendrils, lined with green, angular markings, which lashed out, binding the bat from toe to neck.

"Nanites." She replied. "This whole city is made out of my nanites. I am the city, Rouge. Do you think I would've taken the chance of possessing somebody if there was any chance that I would lose my own powers when I did?"

The lynx-turned-bat floated over to her, not using her wings.

"Of course, there are a few that I can't use, but that's not important. And if you do somehow manage to alter my mind, it won't matter. I have no less than five backup servers, buried so deep in the catacombs that nobody can reach them- Installed as a contingency after that incident with the Dominion. Subvert me, and I'll... reload from the last save, as it were." She began to smile, before frowning deeply again. "You could've been the Queen of the greatest, unending nation to ever exist. Instead, I accidentally created another Eggman..."

"Now listen here you-" Rouge interrupted, only to be cut off by the coil rising around her muzzle and cutting off her words.

"Another egomaniacal tinpot tyrant, blaming and punishing underlings for your own failures..." She went on. "It was your fault that Sonic escaped. You had ample opportunity to change him into the perfect minion, and instead you chose to wait until he was awake to do so. Twice. It's a shame you're not as smart as Eggman, or you might've figured out the flaw in that plan after it failed the first time. You can't keep Sonic locked up when he's awake. I've seen him vibrate his body fast enough to phase through cell doors, let alone rope. When that failed, you decided to sacrifice three of the best candidates for minions, the people I had been counting on to defend us. Your nameless offspring do not make better defenders than Sonic, Shadow, and Knuckles. You also betrayed your best and brightest to make a breeder out of her as well. You were so dedicated to watching them squirm that you decided not to hypnotize them, and then had to find increasingly convoluted means to keep them under control, and to gain what? Nothing. You didn't realise that it was giving birth that undid the mind control either. And worst of all, you ignored all advice I gave you, and punished Fiona for hers, because you know best, apparently. Well I'm afraid you're wrong. You are one of the least intelligent people I have ever had the displeasure of working with- not for, with- far to dedicated to your own vanity and ego than you are to accomplishing anything."

Her rant finished, Nicole grabbed Rouge's chin.

"Technically, you chose my fourth option, so I should be flexing a finger and crushing you into a fine paste." Nicole moved her pinky an inch, and the coil cinched in painfully. "But I'm feeling merciful. That rant was excellent stress-relief! So I'll give you a choice... we seem to both enjoy that at the moment. If you want to live, you can relinquish control to me, and spend a month as a the same kind of sow you turned my friends into. Oh... but it doesn't stop there. Since Shadow and Knuckles will be turned into regular servants, and "Red" will be Fiona again, you're going to be missing someone to fill you... Fortunately, I have just the person in mind: Scourge. A sift through Fiona's memories reveals how vile he was with her... and how many venereal diseases Miles had to cure her of when he was done with her. What's it going to be, Rouge? Wink with your left eye to get the air squeezed out of you. Wink with your right eye to walk a mile in Sapphire and Tala's shoes."

Nicole tightened the coil in preparation again, daring the bat to respond. No response came.

"If you don't give me your answer, I will turn your brain to soup and be done with it." The lynx-turned-bat warned. She pressed a finger to Rouge's forehead, and sharp tingle began to throb through her skull. Rouge gulped. She had played a fierce game against the lynx, but it looked as though she had finally hit checkmate. Her daughter, pampered and aged-up as she was, had the frailest mental defences she had seen in a Mobian, and had zero chance of breaking Nicole's hold- in fact, Nicole didn't seem to be able to relinquish her control at the moment, something she had relied on to protect her before she realised to what extent Nicole's powers worked. She couldn't cry out, the door was locked, the ring was bound uselessly to her side, and even if she could've raised it, hypnotizing Nicole would put them right back at square one thanks to her hidden processors, but with the lynx even more tempted to simply crush her without mercy, and she didn't even know whether it would work on her now. Added, it was getting very hard to breathe, and she was pretty sure that simply being touched on the forehead had erased a few memories.

She looked up at her possessed daughter, pondering which of the presented choices would be the least painful.

1121212211221211222122122112211111111212.content:
The thorns quickly proved to be her undoing. not only did they stop her from squirming free, keeping her in place, but each one that scratched her weakened her, softening her mind and eating away at her defences. As she reached the huge flower, there was already a heavy weight on her brain, but it felt comfortable, as if it were buried in cotton wool.

The vines shredded her clothing away, leaving her in the nude as petals closed around her. Immediately, her nose was assaulted by the sweeties, most addictive scent she had ever smelt, reducing her resistance even further. She slumped, leaning against the flower's sticky stigma, as its stamens wrapped around her limbs, holding her in place. One snaked in between her legs, another below her tail, and they penetrated her, filling her most private, virginal areas with new, invasive data. In the corner of her vision, progress bar appeared, informing her of a new "Update". The box displayed the text "POLLINATION", as well as a percentage of conversion, and a grinning Eggman logo.

For a second, the image of her nemesis' visage brought her out of trance. This was Eggman's doing, he was infecting her, doing who-knows-what to her systems. But it wasn't too late! The pollination was only at 17%. She could fight this, she could still break free.

Then the flower began to pour nectar into her mouth, and she let out a moan as the sticky, yellow liquid splashed over her muzzle. Her resistance died, washed away by the sweet, sweet taste. The progress bar shot up, but she didn't even care anymore. If anything, she was slightly disappointed that her experience with the virus was about to end. It began to slosh the nectar all over her body, and she squealed with delight, pulling her arms free of their bonds to rub it into her skin. It began to solidify and harden into a new, latex costume for her.


***

POLLINATION: 100%

The flower opened, and Nicole rose from her flowery bed, stretching herself out. She now wore a skintight latex Eggman uniform, and posed herself elegantly for her Master. She couldn't wait to tell him that his enemies were all helpless, just waiting to join her!

1121212211221211222122122112211111111212.content:
"N-no! Don't speak like that Tails!" Sonic shouted, a clear tremble in his voice. She couldn't help herself, in one smooth motion Sapphire raised her left hand, slapping Sable across the face sharply. It left a glowing red mark on her cheek and smudged Tail's makeup.

There was a moment of awkward silence between the two, the air was still and it felt like the world had stopped turning for just a moment, then, as the intense staredown climaxed, Tails eyes watered up and she burst into sobbing tears.

"Wahhh, S-s-s-sonic I don't want to be a slutty g-girl any more!' she bawled, hugging Sonic by the shoulders and almost dragging her down to the floor because the fox's legs went limp.

Sonic struggled free, grabbing her pathetic friend's arms and pushing the blubbering bitch to the floor. Tails was unhurt, landing on her plush butt, but she still sniveled and flounder about, throwing a pathetic tantrum.

This alarmed Sonic more than anything, if Tails kept making a raucous then someone would hear them and they'd be bimbos for sure. "Stop! Stop!" Sonic hissed, unsure how to calm down the hysterical fox. Sabel was making a real mess of herself, gushing tears ruining her mascara, and snot dribbled out her nose. Tails didn't care, she was going to stop being a girl right now, even if that meant growing a penis by sheer force of will.

His muzzle became shorter, and his nose shrank, while his lips filled out, becoming kissable and soft. His eyelashes grew out, and three long bangs of hair grew from his forehead. And then, they both got in bed and got to work in making each other happy.

Nicole simply smiled as she watched her friend bash her butt against Rouge's vagina. Most of it was being done under the covers, but with Nicole's x-ray vision, she could see every sexy move that was being made. The moaning that the two of them made was loud and lustful. Nicole even saw it a bit embarrassing, but as long as Sally was happy, she was happy too.

It lasted for hours until the two of them finally tuckered themselves out, snuggling each other as they fell into a deep and well deserved sleep.

And as they slept, Nicole simply watched over them, keeping them safe from anyone who would wake them up.

"Sally seems very happy," Nicole thought to herself, "I'm so glad she was able to find someone after how Sonic had treated her."

And as she looked upon the peaceful figures of her sleeping friend and her lover, she thought to herself, "It appears that she has chosen Rouge to be her soulmate. And as such, she will share Sally's place as the ruler of Mobius. It's still a shame that she couldn't find a prince to have a child with, there will be no heir to the throne."

But then, as she did a scan upon Sally's body, noticing that the nanites were still active in her system, a plan began to form in her mind.

"But maybe, I can use the nanites to impregnate Sally so that she can produce a child that will take her place. It will be hard, without a male partner, but if I use the genetic samples I collected from Sonic, Tails and his other friends, I can mash them up all together and wirelessly send them to the nanites. They will do the rest of the work in ensuring that she becomes pregnant. They will probably accelerate the pregnancy a little, but there doesn't seem to be any problem there.

Nicole smiled innocently as she prepared to send the genetic instructions to the nanites. Her plan was genius! And think about how happy she would make Sally feel. A son or a daughter to call her own(for she had no control over what gender the offspring would be).

But as she prepared to set the nanites to work, her sensors noticed something a little strange. Apparently, during their sexual intercourse, some of the nanites had entered into Rouge's system as well. Which meant that Nicole could have her be the one to bear the child if she wanted too.

This was troublesome. She could impregnate both of them had she had enough genetic material to work with. Unfortunately, that was not the case. For right now she could only give a child to one of them.

But who should she give it to?

1212121212.content:
Rouge suddenly became nervous, "Wait, test it on me first!"

If she had spoken but a second later, the nanites would have already entered her system. But luckily, Nicole heard the command in time and stopped the hose from impaling her friend.

Sally, on the other hand, looked confused, "Mistress?"

Rouge pulled her away from Nicole, "Sally, you heard her. The nanites haven't been tested yet, let's at least make sure that they work before we start pumping you up with them."

"But Mistress," Sally countered, "What if they don't work on you, either? They could easily destroy your body as they could destroy mine. You are much more valuable than me, I should be the one who..."

Rouge simply put a finger to her lips, "Sally, you're my friend. I can't bear the thought of you getting hurt because of our foolish lust. You're just as valuable as I am, and I'd sacrifice myself a hundred times for my friends."

"But Mistress," Sally continued, but Rouge cut her off,

"Hey, no more of that 'Mistress' stuff, okay? We're friends, just call me Rouge."

Sally couldn't help but tear up. She knew that she would be wonderful to her, but never in a million years did she think that she would be so noble to risk her life for her. She valued her more than Sonic ever could. She even called her a friend, she was more to Rouge than an obedient second-in-command, but a friend. For the second time that day, Sally burst into tears as she wrapped her arms around her.

"Thank you, Mistr- I mean, R-Rouge," Sally said with some difficulty, that was gonna take some getting used to, "Thank you for not forgetting me."

And as they let go of each other, Rouge took off her hypno ring and gave it to Sally, "If anything happens to me, I want you to have it. Make sure to hypnotize as many women as possible, and make the best jewel thief team Mobius has ever seen!"

Sally wiped away her tears, slipping the ring on her finger as she said, "I will, Rouge. I won't let this all be for nothing."

Once all the mushy stuff was out of the way, Rouge stepped towards Nicole, turning around so that the hose aimed at her back, "Nicole, activate the nanite program."

"Understood, Rouge," Nicole confirmed and positioned the hose right between her bat wings.

It only lasted for a second, but Rouge than felt a sharp pain and then a weird rushing feeling. She let out a small moan as the hose pumped its contents into her body. The nanites were ready and active to change her body.

"Ooohh," Rouge moaned to herself, clenching her stomach, she did not feel right at all.

Her insides felt all bubbly and slushy, and as she clenched her skin, she noticed that it felt a little more rubbery. Still soft to the touch, but rubbery all the same.

"Nicole," moaned Rouge, trying not to get sick, "Nicole, what's happening to me?"

Nicole looked frantic, pushing buttons on a holo computer a few inches in front of her, "I don't know, Rouge. My only guess is that the nanites are malfunctioning. They're beginning to act on their own. I'm losing control!"

Rouge began to panic! This had gone just as she had predicted, the nanites were not ready. Because of their foolish lust, the nanites were beginning to tear her body apart. At least it was her instead of Sally, she could still live on to continue their legacy. It was just a shame that she wouldn't live to see it. If only she could..

"Rouge!" Sally suddenly screamed, "Your butt! Take a look at your butt!"

Rouge was confused. Sure, her butt was feeling rather bubbly right now, more so than the other parts of her body, but that was surely the least of their problems, "My butt? What about my bu-"

She suddenly got her answer as she turned around. Her butt was growing!

Slowly but surely, her perfect heart-shaped ass was swelling up by the second, and it wasn't alone. Her thighs were also bloating up too, trying to keep up with her ever expanding backside, her tail seemingly shrinking by comparison. She swayed it from side to side, as it sloshed around and jiggled while she did. Rouge could not lie, it was kinda sexy and felt really good to boot.

But she had little time to think about how sexy it felt, as the bubbly feeling began to spread to her stomach and torso. Her stomach began to swell out, becoming bigger and bigger by the second. In less than 10 seconds, her perfect figure was gone, replaced by a belly that would make her eligible for sumo wrestling.

Her breasts were also getting to swelling treatment as well. Rouge moaned as her E-Cup boobs began to strain against her pink breastplate. They were threatening to burst free from it completely. Good thing Rouge was wearing an extra stretchy sports bra underneath, but soon even that wouldn't be enough to keep the at bay.

As Rouge became more and more like a water filled exercise ball, Nicole and Sally struggled to shut the nanites off before they could do any more damage.

"Uh, guys? What's taking so long?" Rouge called, as her arms became flabby and bloated, her gloves now beginning to strain from all the excess skin.

"We're trying to regain control of the nanites so we can shut them down!" Sally shouted to her friend, "Just hang in there!"

"Well hurry!" Rouge shouted, "I can already feel this thing crawling up my face!"

And as she said it, the bloats began to take affect. They had thankfully left her neck untouched, but her face wasn't as lucky. She could feel her cheeks swelling to extraordinary proportions, almost like how swollen a squirrel's cheeks get when their carrying nuts in them. Rouge was beginning to feel afraid, she had no idea how much more her body could take. She didn't know if it was possible, given how stretchy her skin was, but she hoped that they regained control soon, lest her body begins to explode!

Suddenly, there was a large beep and a green light.

"We've regained control of the nanites!" Nicole yelled.

"Shut it off! SHUT IT OFF!!!" Rouge bellowed with all her might.

Nicole then pressed a button, and Rouge stopped swelling. The damage wasn't too bad, most of it had gone to her lower body, so she didn't entirely look like a beach ball. But the damage was done, and Rouge no longer had the body of some kind of sexy Jewel Thief Queen. She could barely stand up over her own weight, and her body jiggled and sloshed around even at the slightest movement. Thankfully, her suit (minus her breastplate) was made out of a stretchy but comfortable fabric that allowed it to expand with her body, so she didn't end up naked. The lustful part of her said that this felt really good and sexy, but the more reasonable part of her said that this was no way a Queen should look, and she was siding with the latter.

"Nicole," Rouge began, all out of breath from the yelling, "What did those things do to me?"

Nicole ran a diagnostic on her body, "It seems that the nanites have turned your inner body (aside from your main muscles and organs, of course) into a liquidy form that multiplies at an extreme rate. To cope with this new feature, the nanites also have increased the elasticity of your skin to hold all that expanding liquid."

Rouge was confused, "Um, could you say that all again in English?"

Sally spoke up, "Basically, the nanites turned you into a living water balloon."

To say Rouge was surprised would be an understatement. It would even be a little sexy if it weren't so embarrassing at the same time, "So, there is a way to change me back, right?"

Nicole nodded, "Yes, now that I have regained control over the nanites, I can work out all the bugs and reprogram them to fix your body. However, there is a second option..."

"A second option?" Rouge questioned, "What?"

"We could allow the nanites to continue to affect your body..."

Sally jumped in immediately, "What?! Are you crazy?!"

"Now, listen to what I have to say," Nicole said in a calm tone, "I did a diagnostic on your body earlier, and it seems like all the high functioning nanites, the ones who give the orders to the other nanites, have entered your brain. While this will not do anything to affect you mentally, we can work this situation to our advantage. If we turn the nanites back on, Sally could use the Hypno Ring to hypnotize you into a deep trance. During the trance, your mind will begin to take control over the commanding nanites, essentially taking control of the whole system. Not only could we turn you back to normal, but you could also obtain the form to shapeshift your body at will, with some training of course. But in order to do that, we would have to turn the nanites back on. And since I haven't fixed the bugs yet, chances are they will continue to swell up your body until they are under your control."

Sally was not convinced, "Are you out of her mind? We can't turn those things back on! What if she pops!"

"Given the increased elasticity of her skin at the moment, the chances of it rupturing are only 1/100. I assure you she will be perfectly safe throughout the situation."

Sally grumbled, walking up to her friend while taking her swollen hands, "Rouge, please, tell her that this is a bad idea."

As she looked into the eyes of her lover, Rouge thought to herself...

121212121222.content:
Rouge suddenly wrapped her friend in a hug. Sally had to admit, it felt good. It felt like hugging a big squishy marshmallow.

"Sally," Rouge said with genuine care, "I know you're concerned about me. Hell, I would be concerned about you had our roles been switched. But this is something we have to do. If we want to be the best Jewel Thief Queens, we need to have the looks and the power to do it."

"But not like this," Sally begged, "We don't need all this, we could just run and never look back. We could bring other women into your service, we don't need..'"

But Rouge brought a finger to her lips, silencing her, "Please Sally, I need you to be with me here. You're the only one I trust to use the Hypno Ring on me. Please be there for me."

Rouge had made use of her big sparkling eyes, and how innocent she could make them look. How could Sally say no to her girlfriend. So reluctantly, she agreed to help her. Realizing that she had gotten her to her side, Rouge asked Nicole what needed to be done.

Nicole said, "Well first, we need to go somewhere with more room. By the time we're done, you could be bigger than a small house. Luckily, Sally's laboratory has the efficient room to house you while you undergo the treatment. Shall we head off?"

But apparently, getting to the laboratory was more harder than they thought. Rouge's balloon-like body kept sloshing around and she kept losing balance. More than once, she needed Sally and Nicole's help to stand up. She eventually found out how to keep her balance, but then her overlarged thighs would get jammed in doorways and they would have to administer huge (but sexy feeling) pushes to her bulging butt to help her get through.

At last, they made it to the lab. Nicole had asked Rouge to lay on her stomach while she underwent her procedure. Rouge didn't mind, it felt really good being a living waterbed anyway. Some wires were placed on her forehead, to monitor her mental state as she took control of the nanites. All was ready, there was now only a few things to do.

"Sally, are you ready?" Rouge asked.

'Not really," Sally spoke, "Are you sure that this is a good idea?"

Rouge winked sexily at her friend, "Never more sure in my life. Fire em' up, Nicole!"

"Understood," Nicole confirmed, "Restoring nanite power in 3... 2... 1!"

Rouge could feel the affects immediately. Her already bloated body began to swell once more. By the second her body became more round and beach ballish. She was also becoming more slushy and jiggly, a slight tap could make her body act like liquid Jell-O. While her clothes were still stretchy, they wouldn't last for long. Already cracks of skin were trying to break through her suit.

Rouge moaned to herself as the nanites did their work, it felt incredibly good and sexy. She just wanted to keep getting bigger and bigger and bigger and keep swelling up forever! Turning to Sally, she motioned that she was ready to be hypnotized.

Nodding a little, Sally reluctantly lifted the ring up, so that it was eye level to Rouge, and began to focus it's power upon her.

Rouge suddenly felt weird, as if nothing mattered except for that ring. Her eyelids began to feel droopy and heavy, but not from tiredness. No, it was from how good the powers of the ring was making her mind feel. She could hear voices in her head, telling her the most wonderful things, asking of the simplest but most ludicrous requests. She couldn't fight back, she didn't want to fight back. All that mattered, was listening to what the ring had to say, for if she did, it would continue to make her feel so good and so happy.

"So this is what the spell of my ring feels like," Rouge thought to herself, as she drifted away, "I'll have to ask Sally to hypnotize me more often."

Those were her last thoughts as the ring took full control of her brain, and allowed her to slip into the blissfulness of hypnosis.

Whether it was minutes, hours, or days, Rouge did not know. The hypnosis had made her indifferent to everything around her, she was devoid of feeling except for what the ring was making her feel. She didn't realize that her body had stopped swelling, and was back to its original size. She didn't realize that they were back in Sally's bedroom, where she was resting on her bed, with new pink button-up pajamas to replace her torn up suit. She didn't notice Sally waving some strange green light at her, but as she did, the feelings of bliss began to fade away.

Slowly, Rouge was beginning to regain her sense of self, her feelings of focus and sense. Rouge was almost sad that it was over, she wanted desperately to go back to that sense of nothingness. But she had little time to voice those feelings, as she was wrapped in a meaningful hug by Sally.

"Rouge!" Sally cried, not wanting to let go, "I thought I'd lost you. Nicole said that it would take a few days before you back to yourself, but I just couldn't stop worrying!"

Rouge returned the hug, feeling bad about wanting to return to emptiness, when it had come at the price of her girlfriend worrying about whether she was going to be alright.

She turned to address Nicole, who was standing a few feet away from the bed, "So what happened? Did the procedure work?"

Nicole nodded, "My experiment was a success. While Sally modified your mind, I went to work to keep your body from suffering irreparable damage. Fortunately, we were able to stop the swelling in time so that your skin didn't rupture. And now, thanks to Sally's wonderful craftsmanship in modifying your brain, you now have direct control over the nanite system. I did some tinkering to the system and have worked out all the bugs. They will now obey you without question, and you have been giving full privileges and powers over them. You are now the perfect shapeshifter!"

"So, how do you feel?" Sally asked.

Now that she had heard it, Rouge felt incredible! Her entire genetic code was at her command! She could recode her body to be even more sexy than what was considered natural! She could give herself superpowers that could rival most of her Freedom Fighter friends! She was essentially a goddess now!

A devious and sexy smile spread across her face as she looked upon Sally, whose relieved face was now replaced with confusion at the sight of her lover.

"I feel great, honey!" Rouge sexily said, "In fact, let me show you how great I feel..."

121331211112.content: Rouge might have stopped her other minions from laughing at Sonic's new walk. She didn't notice a third member watching in silence. On a nearby rooftop was...
121331211112.title: The four run into someone along the way

1213312111121.content:
A young twin-tailed fox was testing out a new invention, but noticed giggling so looked over the side of the roof. When he looked he was astounded at what he saw. Sonic, his best friend, was wearing a suit almost exactly like Rouge's except with blue hearts and trims instead of pink.

"Sonic? What's he doing walking like that? And what's with the suit? Something's up. But what do I do? Sonic's my best friend, I HAVE to follow him and see what's up. He could be in some serious trouble and I don't know how much time I have. But if I get caught I'd never be able to fight my way out of it plus Rouge can fly faster than me and Sonic can DEFINITELY run faster. Maybe I need some help from Amy or Knuckles. I'll bet Shadow would help me if I asked. But whatever I do I have to decide NOW before they get too far."
1213312111121.title: Miles "Tails" Prower

choices: make tails a slave for sonic
12133121111211.content:
"I've got to follow them" Tails said.

So tails follows them to the bank and saw that they stole all the gems of the bank.

"why would sonic and the others do something like that, Rouge i understand but the others."

He saw them going to the castle so he decided to follow them.
they went inside and closed the gate.

"Now i need to figure a way inside" Tails said

he searched for an opening and saw a gate that wasn't entirely closed.

"It could be a trap" tails thought

But Tails went inside and... no trap.
Or that was what he thought.
He didn't knew that Blaze watched from a distance.

"What do you think you are doing" Blaze said.

"Uh... Nothing" Tails quickly said.

But in a couple of seconds Blaze knocked Tails out.

"Time to sleep, little fox" Blaze said

2 hours later.

Tails woke up and saw that he was tied to a chair.
And then he saw Rouge standing next to sonic (her second in command).

"So are we finally awake" Rouge said.

" What have you done to them!" Tails shouted.

" I made them a little more obedient to me" Rouge said " And I'm going to do the same thing to you.

Rouge pointed her ring at Tails and a beam shot right in Tails eyes

" I await your orders mistress" Tails said in a rouge-like way.

" now am i going to make him my slave or make him a slave for sonic" Rouge wondered
12133121111211.title: Follow Sonic alone

12133121111212.content: I can't do this alone. I need help. But from who? I'll only have time to get to one person. But who do I get to help? Amy? She has a sixth Sonic sense after all.
12133121111212.title: Get help

121331211112122.content: Amy might not be the best choice. This is about stealth and she could expose us. Shadow's always been about stealth. Maybe he can help me.
121331211112122.title: Maybe Shadow?

1213312111121222.content: Then again, Shadow HATES Sonic. He might expose us faster than Amy. Knuckles! He's as cool as a cucumber. He might be what I need.
1213312111121222.title: What about Knuckles?

choices: Get second thoughts about getting help
12133121111212222.content: Well he'd stay calm around Sonic, but Rouge is another story. Plus he probably wouldn't leave the master Emerald. Guess my choice is clear. If I'm getting help I gotta get Silver. And fast.
12133121111212222.title: Gotta get Silver

choices: To learn what he can about the ring and follow Rouge
Try and fight Rouge, Sally, Blaze, and Sonic now
1213312111122.content:
The ebony hedgehog watched the Blue Blur strut like Rouge. Even though he was very entertained he asked himself. "Why is Sonic like this? He loves his reputation more than anything else." Then glaring at the ivory bat leading the group he thought aloud. "Something tells me Rouge has either gotten more seductive than usual or that's no ordinary ring on that gloved hand." Shadow contemplated his next move. "I'm not sure how potent that ring is, but it's strong enough to control Sonic, Blaze, AND Sally. Fighting all of them head on might be unwise, I might be able to gather more information if I follow them and witness this rings mystical power myself. Then again letting them get even more members might be more dangerous if I confront Rouge."

After much internal debate Shadow decides the best course of action is...
1213312111122.title: Shadow the Hedgehog

choices: Follow Rouge upstairs to her bathroom ;)
Stay hidden and listen to Sonic
12133121111221.content:
"It would be foolish to attack four experienced fighters alone, especially since I might suffer same fate as that Faker and end up strutting like Rouge myself." Shadow shuddered at the thought.

"Probably best to tail them and see what I can find out." And with that Shadow was off.

He successfully followed the girls and Sonic back to Club Rouge. However, Rouge had captured Amy as well (which was very easy since she came running to Sonic).

"Sally, Blaze." Rouge said.

"Yes mistress." They both said instantly.

"Get our newest member out of that filthy rag of a dress and put her in something more glamorous if you will." Rouge ordered.

"Of course mistress." And with that Rouge and Sonic were alone... as far as they knew. Shadow was with them listening intently to their conversation.

Rouge let out a big sigh as she fell into her violet loveseat. Sonic took a seat on the nearby couch as he noticed the sigh.

"Is something wrong mistress?" Sonic asked.

"No Sonic. Just thinking about who's still out there that may resist us?" Rouge complained.

"Like who madam?"

"Shadow and Knuckles just to name two. Then there's Silver and Tails with them. We've got wuite a few enemies." Rouge worried

"You worry far too much mistress. They could never defeat us in combat. If they're wise, they'll surrender." Sonic reassured her.

"Yes. I suppose you're right Sonic. I'm going to take a bath. when the others return tell them that won't you?" Rouge, not ordered, but asked. As if he still had free will.

"Of course mistress Rouge." Sonic bowed once more before letting her depart.

Shadow then started to think "Well Rouge is the biggest source of information, but if I try sneaking upstairs with her, someone might see me. I could stay down here. Sonic seems like Rouge's second-in-command and he has been known to talk to himself. Maybe I'll get some juicy secrets by remaining where I am."
12133121111221.title: A fly on the wall

choices: "find out EXACTLY what I'm up against and look for more clues."
"warn that Knucklehead. He's about to get hit hard."
121331211112211.content:
"I've got to get to Rouge. For all I know Sonic's as brainless as ever." Shadow thought.

Fortunately Shadow got his chance to sneak upstairs when Sonic went into the kitchen. He saw Rouge go into her room to get a towel and went into the bathroom. "Ok, where to hide?" He thought. Then he saw the hamper for Rouge's towels. "Perfect. All of her towels are black or dark violet anyway." And with that Shadow crawled into the hamper placing a used towel over him to hide his white chest and red streaks. "As long as I stay still I'll be fine" he said closing the lid.

"I'm too tired right now." Rouge said walking in to her marble bathroom. "I just want to soak in the bath and forget that hedgehog."

"Hedgehog?" Shadow thought. "What's wrong with Sonic?"

Shadow heard the water running so he chanced a peek , and while the water ran he saw Rouge stripping. Shadow felt a nosebleed coming but he suppressed it. Which was incredibly difficult since he saw Rouge's perfect body. Her beautiful D cup boobs clinging onto her beautiful chest. He followed all the curves with his eyes all the way down to her flawless legs. He could barely control himself, but when Rouge submerged herself beneath the millions of bubbles in the bath he regained his composure. "Wow" Shadow thought. "How have I never noticed her beauty before this? She's impeccable to the last detail." But he came back to reality when he heard Rouge's silky, feminine voice fill the room.

"Ugh. That ebony hedgehog is going to drive me insane." Rouge whined.

"She's talking about Sonic again...wait... ebony hedgehog. She's not upset with Sonic. She's upset with me. Why?"

He was broken from his train of thought when Rouge spoke again. "I care so much for him and I don't want to hypnotize him. But maybe Sonic's right. If he doesn't join me willingly he'll fight me and I'll HAVE to hypnotize him. I can't deal with this right now." Rouge sighed.

"WHAT?!" Shadow almost yelled. "She's going to hypnotize ME?! Unless I join her willingly she said, but I'm not too crazy about having a giant heart across my chest."

Shadow was getting concerned and listened intently when Rouge spoke again.

"Well I said I'd forget him and I will. Now I focus on my prize. The Master Emerald. I've got Sonic, Blaze, Amy, Sally, and myself. That's more than enough to handle Knuckles. I'll have to plan in the morning." Rouge sad as she stepped out and let the water flow down the drain.

"Damn. Time to see how good my hiding spot really is." Shadow thought to himself. He got very nervous when he felt the hamper open.

"Hmm... I didn't think the hamper was this full." Rouge said. To which Shadow's eyes widened. "Oh well. I'll worry about it tomorrow." She said tossing in yet another violet towel with her name stitched in cursive with silver lettering.

"That was close." Shadow said climbing out of the hamper. "Well I now know how she is controlling people and her next target. But what to do? If I stay here longer I might be able to find some more clues about what that ring actually is and how it works. Then again I've been really pushing my lucky so far. Maybe I should get to Angel Island and warn Knuckles. Well the best course of action is probably to..."
121331211112211.title: Bathtime

choices: "There is a reason I'm called Shadow"
1213312111122111.content:
Rouge was moving to the mirror across the bathroom to dry her hair. Finally Shadow made it to Rouge's pink bedroom with a beautiful violet dresser, vanity table and heart-shaped bed. There was also a door leading to Rouge's massive walk-in wardrobe. "Well I've got to hide until Rouge falls asleep." With that Shadow hid underneath Rouge's bed, the sheets drooped to the ground anyway.

Soon Rouge walked in wrapped in a fluffy black bathrobe with a silver "R" written in cursive over her left breast. Shadow looked from under the bed to observe her. She was at her dresser getting some of her white silk pajamas.

"Lovely" She said. "Just what I need to accompany a perfect soak." and she dropped her bathrobe. Rouge's body was once again exposed, to which Shadow couldn't help but look away. "If she keeps doing that I'm going to lose control" he thought

"I've got to hypnotize Shadow. There's no way around it. I have to kill him or hypnotize him. At least one keeps him alive. I just wish there was another way."

Shadow's eyes widened when he heard that "Damn. Rouge IS going to hypnotize me. Looks like Faker got through to her." But Shadow stopped that thought when Rouge spoke once more.

"I have to do it. I'll have to capture him BEFORE getting the Master Emerald. It's my only choice. I'll have Sonic go with Amy towards the east side of the city, Sally and Blaze can cover the west tomorrow."

"Tomorrow?!" Shadow screamed in his head. "She's coming after me TOMORROW?! I have to stop that ring and fast!" Which wasn't much of a problem after Rouge let out a huge yawn and turned off the lights before flying over to her comfy bed and submerging herself in the purple sheets and curling up and smiling from comfort. When she was definitely asleep, Shadow crawled out.

He looked at that beautiful face and whispered "I'm sorry too Rouge. Time to look around." He checked ALL over her walk-in closet and in her dresser (where he found no help, but PLENTY of Rouge's bra's and panties )

"So the only place left is the vanity table. Let's take a look." Shadow said creeping over to the violet table with several bottles and tubes which Shadow couldn't even begin to figure out. He started looking through the drawers and found a small white journal with purple cursive writing "My Diary". He flipped through it to the final entry:

March 18
I think this ring absorbs natural Chaos energy to power it's hypnotic qualities. So basically as long as I'm alive this ring sustains power since all living things need Chaos energy to exist. I feel safer knowing that I don't have to constantly look for a power source. But will my Chaos energy be enough to outweigh Shadow's? He has much more than anyone I know. Maybe he'll have some resistance to it. Well first things first. I need to capture him. Then I'll figure it out from there.


"So that's what she's planning. I should have known it used Chaos energy." Shadow said in anger swing his fist down to his side. "I've gotta move. I should probably help Knuckles. But Rouge is going to hunt me down. Maybe it's best if I lay low for a while. Knuckles may be outnumbered but he IS an accomplished fighter."
1213312111122111.title: Dirty Little Secrets

choices: Snuck up to Rouge's bedroom to hide for when she returned from her bath
Decided to get out of Club Rouge and get some help
121331211112212.content:
"It's far too risky. Sonic might see me go upstairs." Shadow reasoned

Remaining where he was, he listened to Sonic talk to himself.

"I hate to see lady Rouge like this. She seems depressed about Shadow. She knows we'll have to confront him sooner or later. I wish I could convince her to hypnotize him herself. That would make thing's much easier for her. All it would take is a flash of her ring. At least she's been considering my remedy. That's something." Sonic sighed.

"Hmm... So Rouge has a soft spot for the ultimate life form" Shadow scoffed inaudibly. "Can't say I blame her. But that soft spot has got her considering me in Sonic's high heeled boots. Can't say I'm to enthralled by the idea. Well I've got to get help. I won't be able to do this alone, but I need to know if Rouge plans to hypnotize me. I could be in more danger than I think, but Sonic might see sneak upstairs, sneaking out would be much easier. Damn this. What do I do now?"

After some REALLY hard thought Shadow...

March 18
I think this ring absorbs natural Chaos energy to power it's hypnotic qualities. So basically as long as I'm alive this ring sustains power since all living things need Chaos energy to exist. 1213312111122121.title: Smashing research

choices: Mystic Ruins to get Tails' input
12133121111221211.content:
Shadow slowly turned around to see the snowy white bat toss and turn a little, but she remained asleep.

Shadow let out a massive sigh of relief. "Jeez. I need to be more careful. Well fortune has smiled upon me all night. It's probably best I not push my luck." And with that Shadow slid back downstairs and left Club Rouge.

"I'll need help if I'm going to go after Rouge. I can't possibly do this alone. But maybe there's something to Rouge's thoughts. If my Chaos Energy outweighs hers, maybe the ring won't have any effect. Silver has a lot of Chaos Energy too, maybe he can help me. It does seem like that ring amplifies it though. Maybe Tails can give me more specifics."

Shadow thought what the better course of action would be and raised his Chaos Emerald high in the air and yelled "Chaos CONTROL!" When Shadow reappeared he was in...
12133121111221211.title: Fortune favors the bold

12133121111221212.content:
Rouge awoke instantly at the sound of the crashing fist. Removing her violet sleepmask, she saw a black hedgehog standing next to her vanity table with her diary in hand.

"Shadow? What are you doing here?" Rouge asked half accusingly and half confused.

Shadow was so petrified by Rouge's ring and so mesmerized by her beauty that he couldn't come up with anything creative.

"Rouge I saw you with Sonic, Blaze, and Sally. I watched you submit Amy to your will. I'm sorry but I can't let this continue." Shadow said getting into a battle stance

Rouge was torn immediately. Here was the hedgehog she loved, and he was prepared to fight her. Maybe to the death.

"Shadow please don't do this" Rouge pleaded

"I have to Rouge" Shadow said coldly lunging at the pajama clad ivory bat

Rouge screamed as she dodged Shadow and raised her hand to...
