choices: Rouge. That ring has some serious kick
Shadow. He is after all the ULTIMATE Life Form.
121331211112212122.content:
Rouge twirled around Shadow forcing him to fly past her, but he recovered by puting his feet to the wall and jumping from the wall. In her defense she held up her ring and let a red light emit from the teal emerald. Rouge became worried as Shadow collapsed on all fours. "Damn!" She thought "I was right. Shadow's resisting me. I hope this ring works" She hoped fervently watching the ebony hedgehog.

Shadow yelled in pain as he was on all fours. A battle of will was raging inside of him. His own will versus that of Rouge's ring. Shadow still had time to make the same realization Rouge did though. Shadow's high level of Chaos energy offered a resistance to Rouge's ring.

But who won the battle of wills?
121331211112212122.title: Use her ring

choices: He managed to stop some, but Rouge got away.
12133121111222.content: Shadow decides even though he doesn't know what the threat is exactly, if it's with Rouge it can't be good. So he uses Chaos Control to get in front of the group of girls (plus Sonic) and prepares for the fight of his life. How does it go for Shadow?
12133121111222.title: Fight of your life

choices: He was restrained by metal braces and that his Chaos Emerald was gone
121331211112222.content:
"Shadow. Fancy seeing you here. Come to pay me a visit?" Rouge asked seductively.

"You could say that. I don't know how you're controlling these three but I'm positive you don't have the best intentions in mind, so I'm going to have to end it now." Shadow growled and braced for battle

"Seems your efforts are in vain. Ladies? Sonic?" Rouge ushered them forward where they got into a combat stance.

"Chaos Spear!" Shadow yelled and burst of Chaos energy flew at the group, but Blaze stopped them with a pillar of flame. Meanwhile Sonic landed a spinning king in Shadow's stomach sending him sliding across the street. Shadow tried getting up, but Sally restrained Shadow, but he escaped using Chaos Control resulting in Sonic punching Sally. When that happened Blaze was ready and blasted Shadow onto the ground with a ball of flame. Shadow couldn't take anymore and passed out.

"Excellent work all. Now take him. We'll bring him with us."

When Shadow woke up, he discovered that
121331211112222.title: Things could have gone better...

1213312111122221.content:
"Ugh." Shadow groaned starting to come to. "Hey! Where am I?!" Shadow yelled realizing he was locked onto a metallic table butterflied out with metal braces.

"I was wondering when you were going to wake up." Rouge said sitting not far away, but a glisten in her hand caught Shadow's eye.

"HEY! That's my Chaos Emerald!" Shadow yelled looking at the red gem in Rouge's gloved hand.

"Now now, that's not a nice tone you're using Shady" Rouge said coming closer holding Shadow's chin. He violently turned his head away from her hand.

"Where the hell am I?" He asked again.

"Wave's Laboratory" Rouge said as Wave walked up beside Rouge in a jumpsuit that looked exactly like Rouge's except the breastplate was a light violet instead of pink.

"I'm sorry to interrupt Ms. Rouge, but the device is ready."

"What device?" Shadow asked.

"Lady Rouge asked me to build her..."
1213312111122221.title: He was restrained by metal braces and that his ...

12133121111222211.content:
"Energy Siphon?" Shadow wondered aloud.

"Yes Shadow. You are about to aid Lady Rouge's mission greatly." Sonic said walking to Rouge's right side showing he was second-in-command.

"You see Shadow," Rouge began "Sonic has his own set of Chaos abilities from when he saved the Arabian Nights. However without Shahra's power they've laid dormant. She amplified Sonic's Chaos energy and unlocked those powers." But she was interrupted by Shadow

"So you want to siphon my Chaos energy to power Sonic's currently dormant abilities." Shadow finished.

"Cute and Smart. It's a shame Sonic walked in on us instead of you Shadow. Wave!" Rouge called

"Yes Mistress?" Wave asked

"Is the device prepared for it's test run?" Rouge asked.

"Ready Lady Rouge" Wave stated.

"Sonic, you know what to do" Rouge said looking to her right.

"Of course miss Rouge" and with that Wave strapped Sonic to metal braces exactly like Shadow was now. After she linked a strange cable to each of the hedgehogs four limbs she flipped a switch.

"Beginning transfer now." She said looking at a screen with a picture of a blue and black hedgehog.

"AH!" Shadow said bracing himself against the pain. It was like every part of his body was being forced out of him and into those cables. "Stop this hell!" he yelled. Meanwhile Sonic was lying in comfort. He felt like every part of his body was becoming stronger. Adrenaline pulsed through his veins and power surged throughout his being.

"Transfer at 68% lady Rouge" Wave updated.

"Excellent. Just a little longer now." Rouge said clapping her hands together.

"AAAAHHHH!!!!" Shadow screamed. "I can't take this! CHAOS BLAST!" Shadow yelled with all his might. But as much as he tried Sonic had siphoned too much energy. There was a small spark but not nearly enough to break Wave's restraints.

Sonic on the other hand was feeling more powerful than ever. His quills changed to a sapphire blue and a giant violet streak appeared on his back and down to his tail.

"Transfer complete mistress" Wave announced.

Shadow was just glad the process was over.

"Wonderful. Release Sonic." Rouge ordered. As he was released Rouge asked the new Sonic "How do you feel?"

"Powerful. Every part of my body feels as if it's strength has grown ten times." Sonic said flexing his fingers which were now concealed by violet gloves.

"Excellent" Rouge said. "Let's go" Rouge said

"Wait! What about me?!" Shadow asked feeling helpless without his Chaos powers and without his emerald.

"What about you?" Sonic spat. "You're just lucky lady Rouge has ordered that you just be left here unharmed as opposed to fighting me"

And with that Shadow was alone. Helpless. "So this is how the Ultimate Life Form dies. Strapped to a table." He sighed distraught. Things seemed grim until someone entered the lab...

Who found Shadow?
12133121111222211.title: "An Energy Siphon"

121331211112222111.content:
Shadow was beginning to lose hope after a few hours until...

"Hey Wave? You around? I was wondering if I could borrow a particle wrench?" Tails shouted.

"Tails!" Shadow's voice boomed "Tails! Follow my voice! Rouge trapped me here!"

"I'm coming Shadow!" Tails yelled "What happened to you?" Tails asked.

"Tell you later." Shadow said. "Just get me down first"

"Sure Shadow" Tails agreed gathering a few tools.

"Thanks Tails." Shadow said to the twin tailed tinkerer

"Anytime, but why are you here?" Tails asked

"Because Rouge got a new ring that submits people to her will so she got Wave to restrain me here and use an Energy Siphon to give all of my Chaos Energy to Sonic." Shadow complained.

"Come back with me to Mystic Ruins then. You'll need some tests done to check your health." Tails said noticing how weakly Shadow stood.

"Sure. Thanks." Shadow said climbing into the X Tornado.

"Hang on" Tails yelled as they went airborne.

Meanwhile...

"Hey stop where you are!" a police officer yelled from a nearby helicopter

"No one gives me orders!" Sonic yelled running away with a sack full of precious jewels.

"Then we will use force! Open fire!" the officer yelled.

"Good luck," Sonic said smirking. "Speed Break!" he yelled, and in that instant the hedgehog that was moving at the speed of sound was now moving twice, maybe three times as fast.

"Damn. We lost him. Let's turn it around" the officer said

"Heheheheh" Sonic snickered returning to Club Rouge.

"Sonic!" Rouge said welcoming him back with a kiss. Ever since Sonic's joined her, Rouge has found Sonic much sexier than Shadow, fortunately Sonic had always had some feelings for Rouge too. "Was the heist successful?" She asked.

Sonic opened the sack with some of the world's finest (and biggest) gemstones. "Yes" he answered "Some of the world's most beautiful stones. And yet they look like pieces of charcoal when you're in the room" Sonic said looking at Rouge lovingly.

"Oh Sonic, with your Speed Break and Time Break this world is ours for the taking!" Rouge said pulling him in for another kiss.

Back in the Mystic Ruins...

"Well your vitals look fine, so I'm not too worried. But we have to stop that Rouge and Sonic. Along with Sally, Blaze, and Wave" Tails said

"I'll do this ALONE" Shadow said emphasizing the last word. "I started this and now I'll end it" he said beginning to leave.

"Shadow don't be stupid. We can help you" Tails offered "Me, Amy, Knuckles and Silver."

Knowing Tails was right Shadow turned around and sat back on the couch.

"I'll make some calls. Be right back." Tails said leaving the room

Tails getting his cellphone wondered aloud "Okay, who do I call first?"
121331211112222111.title: Shadow's Savior

1213312111122221111.content:
"Call Silver." Shadow said after a moments thought. "Silver's the best bet of catching Sonic and if we can bring him back to our side then we've got a better chance."

"All right." Tails said before dialing Silver's cell number and leaving the room. Just then a knock on the door drew Shadow's attention.
1213312111122221111.title: Silver

choices: Shadow, Amy, a bed. Do I have to draw a picture?
Shadow gets up to go after Rouge
121331211112222112.content:
"Wave!" a voice yelled that snapped Shadow to attention "Are you ready to go shoe shopping? Come on all the sixes go first, you know that!" She said pouting

"Actually I don't know that thankfully" Shadow replied

"Shadow? What are you doing here? Where are you?" Amy said hammer in hand

"I'll tell you later. Just follow my voice I need help." Shadow pleaded.

Normally Amy wouldn't trust Shadow like this, but hearing the desperation in his voice she followed it until she reached the lab.

"Shadow!" Amy yelled running close to the restrained life form.

"Amy. Am I lucky you came." Shadow said truthfully "Can you find a way to get me down?" Shadow asked.

"Sure Shadow, just hang on" Amy said

"Not like I can do anything else" Shadow joked as Amy looked around. Finally she went to the computer Wave was using and found a big blue button and a big black button. Upon pushing the black one Shadow's restraints released and he fell to the ground on all fours.

"SHADOW!" Amy yelled in fear

"I'm fine... Thanks Amy" Shadow said showing his gratitude. Amy blushed a bit since that was so out of character for Shadow. Shadow's head was down so he didn't see.

"Come on. My house is near here, you can rest there" Amy said throwing Shadow's arm over her shoulders.

"I'd like that" except Shadow saw when Amy blushed from Shadow's piercing, fiery red irises.

After a long walk, Shadow was resting in a large, pink, heart-shaped bed. Shadow got a little angry about all the pictures of Sonic around the pink room, but let it go. He didn't have the strength to be angry, and just passed out beneath the pink sheets.

The next morning Shadow awoke to a wetness on his forehead. Reaching up he felt a wet towel on it. And strangely all of the Sonic pictures were gone making the room look a bit bare. "Hmm... Amy's gone through a bit of trouble apparently."

"Breakfast Shadow!" Amy said carrying in a tray of eggs, pancakes and juice.

"Thank you Amy. This is so much more trouble than you needed to go through." Shadow admitted.

"I don't let my hurt friends suffer" Amy said honestly

"Well I greatly appreciate it." He said eating as Amy sat down next to Shadow on the bed. "This is delicious Amy. Where did you learn to cook?" He said awestruck

"I thought learning to cook would make Sonic like me more" she said meekly.

"You know Amy. You really are too good for Sonic." Shadow admitted "You chase him and chase him just to get rejected each time" Shadow said moving the tray from his lap to the nightstand. He looked into her jade irises deeply "Sonic has no idea what he is giving up. And I feel sorry for him." Shadow admitted.

"Thank you Shadow. That means a lot" She said still not daring to break the gaze between ruby and jade until she closed her eyes and leaned in to kiss the Ultimate Life Form.

"Oh my god! Shadow I'm so sorry!" She said crying and turning away. "It's just you've been so nice and grateful, everything I wish I had in a boyfriend and-" She stopped when she felt a slight pressure on her arm turn her around. Once again jade met ruby except Shadow kissed Amy this time. Long and passionate they let their tongues explore each others' mouths and when they finally broke away Shadow looked at her and said "Your wish has been granted".

"Oh Shadow..." She said smiling as she was cuddling up under the sheets clinging to his white fur as he stroked her head.
121331211112222112.title: {x} Son {/x}  Shadamy

choices: "...Your going to be my servant as well."
12133121111222212.content:
"A long range laser cannon." Wave replied automatically.

"Wave he didn't need to know that." Rouge admonished as she walked out of the room towards the device.

"Rouge you've gone mad! What are you trying to do with a Laser?!" Shadow shouted as he tried to yank him self free of the braces,and succeeding in hurting his wrists and ankles.

Rouge turned back towards and gave a wicked grin. "I'm going to take control of Mobotropolis from Nicole and remake her in my image in one fell swoop." She lifted her ring. "and then I'll turn every citizen of Mobotroplis into my loyal subjects. but you don't need to worry a bout that Shadow."

"Why not?" Shadow said disturbed at what his former friend was saying.

"Because..."
12133121111222212.title: All the bacon in the world can't save you now.

121331211112222122.content:
"... You're going back to sleep." Rouge replied as she resumed her walk towards her machine. "Wave start the process."

"Yes Mistress." Wave said as she moved to the left of the table that Shadow was strapped to. "Your arms and leg's will be inside the pod a all time if at anytime you begin to feel cold well that's exactly the point." She said as she yanked on a lever. The purple swallow stood back as her creation sprang to life a metal ring dropped from the ceiling even as two more rose from the ground. one stopping just above the ground the other stopping at the same level as the table. Glass cylinders rose from the the floor and descended to the floor meeting in the where the ring clamped down on both of them. Shadow suddenly recognized what was going on as a hissing filled the air. He was being put on ice.
121331211112222122.title: Cold Comfort.

1213312111122221221.content:
Rouge stood next to the laser cannon. in few moments it would be fired and Nicole and Mobotropolis would fall under sway. she could take her time with the individual denizens. Wave came through the doorway. "Shadow is now cryogenically frozen and being transferred someplace were he can't interfere if he get's free Mistress."

"I couldn't let him interfere and i couldn't be sure the ring would work on him. Ready the Reprogramer." Rouge ordered. Wave nodded turning the dial the machine rumbling as power flowed into it. Wave pulled a lever to allow the roof to slide open. The main cannon lifted up angling out of the roof and towards Mobotropolis.

"The Reprogramer is armed and ready." Wave called

"Fire on Mobotropolis." Rouge replied.

------Fifteen years later.---------

Rouge sat upon her throne In what had once been the ruins of the Echidna. her palace and it's fortification took up 90% of Angel Island.
her Thorn used the Master Emerald as a base and the Chaos Emeralds as decoration for the arch. The palace was filled with her most loyal servants (most of them her hypnotized slaves.) some simply devoted to her and her reign. "Ah if it isn't Sonic the Last Freedom Fighter." she said as Knuckles dragged the bound and gagged Hedgehog in front of her.

"Dammit Rouge this is insane." Sonic shouted.

"No Sonic this is the end to all threats to my reign and the perfect gift to my eldest daughters fifteenth birthday. She always admired you and seeing as you're already wrapped." with that Rouge raised her ring and made brought sonic under her control. "From now on you will obey every command my Daughter gives you."

"Yes Mistress." Sonic replied. Rouge smiled this meant that she could enjoy her rule in piece for rest of her day's and only when she passed away would the ring and her kingdom go to her daughter.
1213312111122221221.title: Rouge the conquer.

1213312111122221222.content:
The first thing Shadow was aware of was the sudden warmth. Then he realized he was being held up by someone. "Come on wake up we don't have time to sit around if The Empire finds us we'll both be on ice." His mysterious benefactor sounded like a lovely young women but no one he knew.

"what's going on?" he said turning to follow the mysterious hedgehog out of his prison.

"Okay Sonic about 500 years ago you disappeared along with a bunch of others and Rouge took over Mobotropolis and the rest of the acorn kingdom and then most of the world swallowing the Eggman Empire and the Iron Dominion. For the last 500 years her and her descendents have ruled like the world is their personal candy bowl. taking the best and most beautiful for the use in their harems." she said as she ran along the tunnel.

"Just one problem I'm not Sonic, but i will do my best to help."
1213312111122221222.title: Bad Future.

choices: Have some fun with the powerless Shadow.
Wait for Mistress Rouge to return.
1213312111122222.content:
Shadow groaned and shook his head as he started to come around. The first thing he noticed was that he was in Club Rouge, on a bed. The second thing he noticed was that he couldn't move his arms or legs.

"So, you're awake." a voice from his left stated. Turning his head, he saw Blaze, calmly seated with her legs crossed just like Rouge.

"Mistress Rouge ordered you to be brought back here. She is out, with Sonic and Sally, preparing for a heist. So it's just you and me." she said with a grin.

Shadow grunted, trying to stand up, but Blaz casually walked over, swaying her hips in the same manner as her mistress.

"Don't bother trying to move. We used a powerful muscle relaxant to ensure your cooperation. I think you'll find you're paralysed from the neck down."

Shadow grimaced upon hearing that. "What are you planning to do with me?"

"Nothing," Blaze replied with teasing innocence. "I'm just going to make you a bit more presentable for the mistress."

At that, she whipped out a jumpsuit akin to her own and Rouge's, only the heart was a glossy black.

"We made sure to take our measurements while you were unconcious, so your outfit's ready for you."

Shadow was powerless to resist as Blaze stripped him of his gloves and boots, and pulling the tight jumpsuit up his body. She quickly followed this with the matching opera length gloves and high heeled boots. She expertly applied the blue eyeshadow and pink lipstick that the group wore, despite Shadow's attempts to avoid her hands.

"There now," Blaze said satisfied as she put the makeup away. "I'm sure Mistress will be pleased."

The former princess smirked a little to herself, as she looked Shadow over, his muscles easily showing through the tight body suit.

"Hm... I can see why Mistress loves him so much..." she thought to herself. "I'm sure it wouldn't hurt to play with him a little..."
1213312111122222.title: He was getting suited up

choices: "I'd sooner forget Maria than join you!"
"Very well. I'll join you as long as that ring stays away from me"
12133121111222221.content:
"Well Shadow. I must admit, I can see why Lady Rouge takes a particular liking to you" Blaze said closing in on the Rouge-ified Shadow. "You're strong, dark, charismatic, confident. It's no wonder you are the Ultimate Life Form ." Blaze said seductively playing with what white chest fur protruded from behind Shadow's black breastplate.

"What do you think you're doing?" Shadow spat too weak to do anything else.

"Don't worry about a thing." Blaze assured leaning closer to the ebony prisoner.

"Yes, I'm just paralyzed, held against my will, and to top it off I'm wearing Rouge's jumpsuit and makeup. No reason to worry at all." Shadow said angrily.

"You know Shadow, you could really learn how to relax" She said seductively purring before pulling Shadow's head in closer for a kiss. She let her tongue explore his and surprisingly he did the same thing. Longer and deeper they kissed until she finally broke away. "Lovely" She said letting her liquid gold irises stare into the ruby irises of her prisoner.

"It's a shame the mistress wanted you for herself Shadow. Alas alack." She said shrugging.

A few hours later Rouge entered the room. "Well well Shadow, don't we look glamorous this evening?" She said smirking

"You know damn well why I'm here and it certainly wasn't for glamor" Shadow said with an acid tongue.

"Oh right, it was so you could be seduced by Blaze." Rouge joked.

"She told you?" Shadow asked

"Told me? Hell I gave her permission to do it." Rouge admitted. "Now I have an offer for you Shadow."

"Not like I'm going anywhere so let's hear it" Shadow said sarcastically

"Obviously I have great control over anyone I subject this ring to. But I like you Shady, I really do" Rouge said playing with Shadow's chest fur the same way Blaze did earlier. "So I'm giving you a choice. Either you can willingly join me, in which case you have SOME free will, or I just use this ring right now which you'll be powerless to stop or resist after I use it. Your call Shadow. Do I have to use this ring?"
12133121111222221.title: Permission

choices: Shadow uses what control he has to pull away and go after Rouge
121331211112222211.content:
"I promised Maria that I would protect the people of this Earth and that's what I'm going to do." Shadow said feeling a lump in his back. Knowing exactly what it was he smirked.

"I'm sorry to hear that Shady." Rouge said holding up her ring

"I'm not. CHAOS CONTROL!" He yelled interacting with the Chaos Emerald Rouge neglected to take away and vanished.

"Damn it! SONIC! BLAZE! SALLY! Find Shadow NOW!" Rouge said furious.

Meanwhile Shadow used Chaos Control to go to Amy's house.

"AH!" Amy screamed as Shadow suddenly appeared on her living room couch.

"Amy, please. I need help." Shadow said

"Why should I help you?" Amy said arms crossed.

"Hmm..." Shadow said looking at all of the pictures around and noticing one common element. "Help me and I'll take down Rouge who has Blaze, Sally, AND Sonic under mind control"

"WHAT?!" Amy said shocked "Okay I'll help you."

"Excellent. Can you call Tails? Tell him I need a muscle stimulant." Shadow asked

"Sure" Amy said leaving the room to call Tails.

"Nice girl" Shadow thought out loud. "I wonder why she chases Sonic so much though. She only gets rejected."

"Tails said he'd be here in a few minutes" Amy told Shadow.

"Thanks" Shadow said making an effort to be friendly

"So what happened?" Amy asked sweetly but worried

Shadow told his whole story until he narrowly escaped which left Amy in tears.

"I have to save Sonic now!" Amy yelled grabbing her hammer and heading out the door

"Amy! Wait!" Shadow said trying to leave the couch but only landing on the floor with a massive thud

"Shadow!" Amy said running to support him back on the couch "Are you okay?"

But Shadow ignored the question "Amy you can't fight them all alone, especially since against Sonic you'd hold back. Please, just let me handle this." Shadow pleaded.

"I can't just wait here." Amy said "I love him"

"Well in case you haven't noticed he doesn't love you back! All you do is pursue him just to be rejected! No matter what you do he'll always run! And in case you haven't noticed, he's always running away from YOU!" Shadow yelled. But Amy couldn't respond. She knew it was true as much as she wanted to deny it. No matter what she did Sonic ran. It just hit her harder from a different angle. But Shadow immediately felt horrible about what he said.

"Amy listen I'm sorry. It's just I care about you. I don't want you getting hurt OR worse." Shadow confessed

"Shadow?" Amy said.

"Yes?"

"What does it feel like? To lose the person you care most about?" She asked through her tears obviously referring to Maria

"Much like you do right now. A black soulless void has engulfed your very being. You lose all sense of direction but you don't want to leave anyway." Shadow told her reviving horrible memories. "But I'm one of the lucky ones. I've found a glimmer of light in this void and it might be enough to banish the darkness." He admitted

"Really? What?" Amy asked sobbing

"You Amy. Ever since I've known you I've held a place in my heart for you. I could never shake the feeling away, but you were so focused on Sonic that I never bothered telling you. Instead I watched from the sidelines as a silent guardian." Shadow explained to the crying pink hedgehog

"Shadow..." Amy said looking into the powerful hedgehog's ruby irises with her jade ones before embracing the limp Shadow in a passionate kiss. Amy did most of the work but Shadow did enough for Amy to know he was responding. Tails walked in on them, but they didn't notice so he just left the syringe he came with on the table in the foyer before leaving.

"Amy you don't know how long I've waited for that." Shadow confessed

"I've waited too long for someone to love me back Shadow. I've always thought I wanted Sonic, but you actually love me. That's what I've always wanted." Amy realized.

"What's that?" Shadow said looking around Amy at something blue that WASN'T a picture of Sonic.

"A syringe. Tails must have seen us." Amy said holding it

"I'm sorry Amy" Shadow said

"I'm not" Amy said injecting the needle into Shadow who in a matter of moments felt as strong as ever.

"Okay Shadow. Your muscles are working again, let's put them to work." Amy said seductively pulling off Shadow's jumpsuit and playing with the white fur on his chest.

"What did you have in mind?" Shadow asked growling playfully.

"Why don't we head up to my bedroom and find out exactly how long you waited to have me?" She said grabbing Shadow's hand and pulling him upstairs.
121331211112222211.title: Syringes, Stories, and Seduction

choices: "...the proper skills of a jewel thief."
121331211112222212.content:
Shadow looked at Rouge, then at the ring on he finger. Either way, he was going to end up 'one of the girls,' so he decided it'd be better if he was still himself. Maybe he'd even be able to learn a way to reverse the hypnotism...

"Very well. I'll join you as long as that ring stays away from me."

Rouge grinned, showing off her razor sharp fangs.

"I knew you'd see it my way." She pulled a syringe from her breastplate and injected it into Shadow's arm, causing him to wince, but at the same time he felt feeling return to his limbs. He soon managed to find the strength to climb out of bed, though he wobbled slightly. He wasn't sure if he was still woozy from the antidote or if he just wasn't used to his high heels yet.

"Come along, Shadow!" the pearly bat called out. "We'll have to start on your lessons right away."

"Lessons?" Shadow asked as he looked at her. "What lessons?"

"Shadow, if you're going to be a part of our group, you'll need to know..."
121331211112222212.title: "Very well. I'll join you as long as th...

1213312111122222122.content:
"Come on Shady." Rouge said coyly. "You know how much girl power means to me. I can either teach you or I can force you." She said brandishing her ring.

Thinking about the decision made before, he realized there would have to be sacrifice. "Fine." he spat.

"I don't think I heard you right Shadow" Rouge said putting her gloved hand up to her ear.

Shadow swallowing his pride said "Please teach me... Lady Rouge"

"That's my girl" Rouge said winking. But I'll tell you what Shady, since you did this by will, I'll let you exercise some of that free will I promised."

"I'm listening... mistress" Shadow said correcting himself.

"Well I will let you choose your teacher to bring you into the fame of femininity. You can be taught by your truly," She said gesturing to herself "or my second-in-command."

"You mean that Faker Sonic." Shadow said containing his rage.

"Yes I do Shady. Now pick your mentor." Rouge said as Sonic walked into the room
1213312111122222122.title: Perfumed Poison

choices: Shadow and Rouge... enjoy the evening
They are interrupted by a knocking on Rouge's bedroom door
12133121111222221221.content:
Shadow knew Rouge would go overkill on Shadow being one of the girls, but his there was way too much bad blood between him and Sonic for him to be calm without help. Then Rouge would use the ring and he'd never resist. So, with a very heavy heart he spoke. "I want you."

"Sorry Shadow?" Rouge asked toying with Shadow again.

"I want you... Lady Rouge" Shadow barely got out.

"You want me? Well you'll have to buy me dinner first Shady." Rouge joked pushing Shadow to his limit.

"Lady Rouge, I would be honored if you would teach me the glamors of being a girl" Shadow barely got out. He knew if Rouge pushed him anymore right now he'd go off.

"Well if that's what you want." Rouge said "Nothing would make me happier. Sorry Sonic." She said apologizing

"It's fine. It's just good to see the Ultimate Life Form be so submissive." Sonic scoffed, obviously on higher ground, especially since Sonic was now his superior.

"By the way Sonic, can you help Blaze and Sally across town? You've got a heist." Rouge said

"Of course Lady Rouge." He said turning around "Speed Break!" Sonic said almost invisible to the naked eye.

"How'd you teach him that trick?" Shadow asked with words flowing from his now pink lips

"Amplified his Chaos energy Shady. I'd tell you how but that would require insurance you wouldn't tell." She said holding her ring up again.

"Perhaps ignorance is bliss" Shadow admitted, truly, genuinely AFRAID for the first time in his life.

"Good girl Shady" Rouge said. "Come on, you've still got a lesson" Rouge said ushering him forward.

After spending hours with Shadow teaching him how to walk, talk, think, and act like a proper woman, he finally knew how to apply makeup, his fashion sense became impeccable, and he didn't wobble in his boots anymore. Rouge, noticing this noticed incredible improvement and was so proud she was offering a reward to her newest recruit.

"Oh Shady" Rouge said to him

"Yes Lady Rouge?" Shadow asked leaning on a single knee, bowing his head and placing his right arm across his chest

"You have done incredibly Shadow, and for that you deserve a reward. You're a lot more cooperative than I imagined."

"Reward?" Shadow wondered aloud.

"Come with me" Rouge said and Shadow followed walking in a very Rouge-esque manner.

They entered Rouge's violet bedroom, equipped with vanity table, walk in wardrobe, dresser, and heart-shaped bed. Rouge went into her wardrobe, pulling out a small black silk bag, probably only big enough to hold a softball.

"What's that?" Shadow asked

"Your reward." Rouge said, but nothing Shadow did could prepare him for what happened. Rouge pulled out a red Chaos Emerald and actually GAVE it to Shadow. She gave someone else a jewel, and not just a jewel, but a Chaos Emerald.

"Thank you Rouge... excuse me mistress Rouge." Shadow corrected accepting the Chaos emerald
"If you don't mind my asking, why give me this?"

"Simple. Shadow you are being much more cooperative than I imagined, and we'll need your Chaos Control for our bigger heists." Rouge said "Plus..." She said walking closer. "I've always had a soft spot for you Shadow." She as as she let her pink lips meet his. And as Rouge let her tongue enter and explore Shadow's mouth, she was surprised when Shadow reciprocated every action she made. Finally breaking away from the kiss Shadow spoke.

"Well I should probably go" Shadow said turning to leave.

"Hold on Shady." Rouge said letting her arms slowly slither down Shadow's neck and meet on his muscular chest. "Sonic, Blaze, and Sally are all gone. We've got a wonderfully comfortable bed provided." She said turning him around.

"I like where this is going" Shadow said.

"Let's see how much you're still a man" Rouge said pulling in the ebony hedgehog and shutting the door.
12133121111222221221.title: Regretably/Romantically Rouge

121331211112222212212.content:
"Lady Rouge?" Sally asked knocking on the door.

"Whatever it is can wait. Go away." Rouge said furious someone interrupted her alone time with Shadow.

"Actually I was hoping Shadow was done with his lessons. He's got a visitor." Sally admitted

"Who?" Rouge demanded

"Silver the hedgehog" Sally replied.

"You go." Rouge told Shadow. "I'll be waiting for when you get back" Rouge winked. "Use your regular boots and gloves too. No reason to arouse suspicion." Rouge said removing Shadow's makeup

"I'll be back for you later." Shadow said with a grin letting his ruby irises pierce Rogue's soul

Shadow walked down the stairs of Club Rouge to find a familiar silver-white hedgehog.

"Hey Shadow. I heard you were here" Silver said.

"Silver. Always a pleasure" Shadow said, trying to think of a way to tell Silver what's going on.

"What's up? Feel like going out to do something?" Silver asked.

"Let me check with the girlfriend. You know how they can be." Shadow joked.

"Don't I know it" Silver rolled his eyes

Retuning upstairs, Rouge was ready for round two, but was disappointed when Shadow asked for permission to go with Silver.

"Ok Shady. You wanted free will, so now you have it. Just don't tell him anything" Rouge threatened.

"Don't worry, and when I get back we can have rounds two and three if you want" Shadow teased.

"I might make it four if your out late" Rouge said as Shadow left.

"Let's go" Shadow said leaving with Silver.

They were just looking for something to do, but Shadow pulled Silver aside.

"Silver there's something you need to know." Shadow said pulling out his Chaos Emerald "Grab on"

"Okay" Silver said grabbing his arm

After Shadow used Chaos Control, he and Silver went halfway across Mobius where Shadow told Silver everything about Rouge's ring.

"Damn Shadow. That's rough." Silver admitted "But I think I can help."

"How?!" Shadow pleaded

"From your description of the ring it sounds like a Spellbinder." Silver said deep in thought.

"Spellbinder?" Shadow said.

"Yes. A powerful artifact that allows the wearer to submit people to their will." Silver explained

"How do I stop it?" Shadow asked

"It'll be tricky. The Spellbinder is alive almost. It bonds itself to it's owner, their souls are almost in unison." Silver said

"So it's linked to Rouge's SOUL?" Shadow screamed "What do we do now?!"

"Calm down. The ring only works almost like a parasite. It loves the user when they are submitting people. If we can find a way for the Spellbinder to break that affection for Rouge, maybe it'll come off." Silver hypothesized

"She gave me the choice to submit or not. Maybe the Spellbinder didn't like that?" Shadow wondered.

"It was more neutral. You're still submissive to the owner even though the Spellbinder itself wasn't used." Silver explained "Somehow you have to set those people free. Make Rouge not want that ring anymore."

"How the hell am I gonna do that?" Shadow asked

"I don't know Shadow, but we better get back." Silver admitted

"Good point. Thanks Silver." Shadow said.

"Anytime you need my help, just give me a call. I got your back" Silver promised.

"Thanks. That means a lot." And with that, Shadow and Silver vanished. Unfortunately, someone was watching from the shadows

But who was it?
121331211112222212212.title: Silver Lining

choices: "you plotted against me, and now you will suffer"
"Don't you EVER let me hear something like this again."
1213312111122222122121.content:
"I knew that phony freak couldn't be trusted" Sonic said emerging from nearby shadows. "I'm glad I can sense spikes in Chaos energy ever since Rouge amplified my own. Well Lady Rouge will want to hear of this. I'll have to beat Shadow though. Not a problem" The Blue Blur said with a grin "TIME BREAK!" He yelled. Everything around him seemed to be frozen in time as he sped off to Club Rouge.

meanwhile in a Chaos Rift

"Shadow we've been here for a while now" Silver said worried

"It's probably just a spike in Chaos Energy. Sometimes it interferes with my Chaos Control." Shadow explained.

"Are they common?" Silver asked

"No. And I have a bad feeling I know what, or rather who, caused it." Shadow admitted

"Hang on we're moving now"

At Club Rouge

"Sonic are you sure you heard that?" Rouge said in shock over the tale Sonic told

"After I sensed that massive spike in Chaos energy I knew only Shadow could have caused it with that Chaos Emerald." Sonic admitted "I tailed him with my Speed Break after that."

"I don't believe it" Rouge said saddened. "Thank you Sonic"

Suddenly Shadow walked into the room "Sorry hot stuff. I'm ready for round two when y-" Shadow stopped when he saw Sonic wearing a devilish grin and Shadow knew his feeling he had in that Chaos rift was dead accurate.

"Hello Shadow" Rouge said piercing Shadow with her icy blue eyes. "You know I just heard the most interesting story about you and Silver."

"Really?" Shadow said keeping his natural calm.

"Sonic told me that you and Silver are plotting against me" Rouge told Shadow who inside was scared to death

"I'd never betray you Rouge." Shadow assured her

"Lies! I saw you and Silver directly plotting against Lady Rouge!" Sonic accused

"Is that so Faker? Let's see if you can back up your words with action" Shadow said bracing himself for battle just as Sonic did

"Stop it! Both of you!" Rouge demanded.

"You're lucky Lady Rouge has demanded we not fight" Sonic warned.

"I'm shaking" Shadow said rolling his eyes.

"Listen Shadow..." Rouge began

Well? Does Rouge believe Sonic her loyal second-in-command or Shadow her ebony lover?
1213312111122222122121.title: Sonic, Rouge's second-in-command

12133121111222221221212.content:
"Shadow I'll let you off this once because you haven't given me a reason to mistrust you. But If I EVER hear a report like this again, I will make sure you are subjected to cruel and harsh punishment" The ivory bat said furious. She looked ready to kill as she looked at Shadow and asked "Am I clear?"

"Crystal" Shadow said smirking

"Get out of my sight. Both of you." Rouge ordered

Bowing with their arms across their chests they replied "As you wish Lady Rouge"

Out in the hallway Sonic was irate Shadow didn't suffer for his treachery "You're lucky Rouge has a soft spot for you Faker." He spat.

Shadow locked eyes with him fierce and strong "Oh really?"

"Yes REALLY. But I'm keeping my eyes on you. Next time Lady Rouge won't be around to protect you." Sonic threatened holding his fist to Shadow's nose

"Well what do you know?" Shadow said cool and calm as ever "She's not here now. What do you say we end this now?"

"Let's" Sonic said.

With that a black and a blue blur traveled at incredible speeds to the outside of town.

"Ready?" Shadow said tensed for battle

"Always." Sonic scoffed.

"Good. Chaos SPEAR!" Shadow yelled sending out burst of Chaos energy at Sonic

"Time Break!" Sonic yelled slowing the spears in a temporal loop and aptly dodging them and landing a spindash right into the stomach of the ebony hedgehog.

"Chaos BLAST!" Shadow yelled burning Sonic and sending him back into a nearby building "Chaos Control!" Shadow shouted and vanished

When Sonic got up he taunted Shadow "Come out and play Shadow. I won't bite."

"If that's how you want it." Shadow said reappearing behind Sonic and kicking him in the head knocking him down. "Chaos Spear!" He yelled sending more bursts of Chaos energy

"Speed Break!" Sonic yelled getting up quickly and punching Shadow in the chest with each punch coming and leaving as fast as lightning and as strong as if his fist was coated in steel.

"Chaos Blast!" Shadow yelled blasting Sonic again.

"This isn't over yet Shadow!" Sonic said standing up braced for battle

"Good. I'm not done with you yet" Shadow said hitting Sonic with a spinning kick.

Soon both fighters were badly wounded, but they had plenty of energy to continue. Unfortunately they didn't get the chance since someone showed up to stop the fighting.
12133121111222221221212.title: Chaos Battle

choices: "we never got to round two before"
"our first heist is tomorrow and you'll be vital to its success"
121331211112222212212122.content:
"What on Mobius do you two think you're doing?" Rouge said landing between the two

"L-Lady Rouge" Sonic said immediately bowing as he saw the ivory bat. "I can explain"

"No need" Rouge spat at Sonic. "You two obviously have no self-control. For this you both know I will deliver harsh punishment immediately." She said turning to Shadow. "Let's go. Both of you." She said leading the way

Eventually they returned to Club Rouge, Sonic with his tail between his legs and Shadow just as confident as when he was fighting.

"Blaze!" Rouge shouted

Running down the stairs Blaze asked "You called for me Ms. Rouge?"

"Yes" Rouge said looking at Sonic. "Give Sonic the water torture. He needs some punishment"

"Let's go Sonic. Lady Rouge has wished it" Blaze said curling her smile into an evil grin as she led Sonic to a deep pool

"As for you Shadow. This is the second infraction I've heard tonight. I'm starting to think that Sonic wasn't all hot air when he reported seeing you and Silver" Rouge said brandishing her ring with the teal emerald facing Shadow's nose

"I assure you Lady Rouge I would never plot against you" Shadow said bowing

"Nevertheless I did witness you defy me once and that deserves punishment." Rouge said furious "Sally!"

"Yes mistress Rouge" Sally said when she arrived

"Bring me the blade" Rouge commanded

"As you wish" Sally said running upstairs and returning with a dagger with a blade made of pure diamond instead of steel.

"Restrain him" Rouge said holding the hilt in her hand and Sally immediately pressed a button on the wall restraining Shadow with four mechanical arms.

"Shadow, Shadow, Shadow" Rouge said walking behind him twirling the blade in her hand "You have wronged me. When I gave you free will you abused it. Now I won't use the ring, I'll save that for next time." She said unzipping Shadow's suit. "But remember this next time you want to attempt to defy me."

In that moment Shadow cried out a blood-curdling scream as Rouge plunged the dagger into Shadow's back. Far away from vitals so he'd live, but only the hilt could be seen out of Shadow's back.

"Remove the blade in ten minutes Sally. I want him to suffer." Rouge said not facing Shadow and walking away. "And make sure the blood doesn't get on the carpet."

"It shall be done mistress Rouge." Sally said turning back to Shadow who was in horrible unthinkable pain as the dagger remained in his back being stained by his blood.

After ten excruciating minutes Rouge returned to Sally. "Release him" Rouge ordered and immediately the arms holding Shadow released, but he fell to the floor. "Get him bandaged and cleaned off. Once he can walk have him see me." Rouge said removing the diamond blade from Shadow's back in one swift movement.

Some time passed and Rouge was writing in her diary until she heard a knocking

"Lady Rouge? I was sent to see you." Shadow said with a bandage near his shoulder blade

"Come in Shadow." Rouge said.

With a fluid opening and closing of the door, Rouge and Shadow were one again alone in the violet room, but the mood was much different this time

"Why Shadow? Why did you provoke Sonic to the point where he fought you?" Rouge asked

"He provoked me." Shadow rebutted "I'm not letting that faker control me."

"Well if this happens again he won't control you" Rouge promised "I will" She said showing Shadow her Spellbinder.

"Understood" Shadow replied

"Now how are you feeling?" Rouge wondered looking at the bandage

"I've had better days, but I feel pretty strong" Shadow admitted

"Excellent" Rouge responded "Because..."

Shadow was about to fall asleep himself when he thought of the ring...If he could get it off of Rogue's finger right now, all of his problems could be over! After thinking about it for a little bit, Shadow lifted up Rouge's finger and slowly, being super careful not to look into it, slid the Ring off of Rogue's finger and put it in a pouch he always had on him for times like this. Rogue turned over in her sleep but then was still. Shadow got out of the bed and stared to plan his next move...

Almost as quickly as that thought was over he had brought out the pouch and had it set in his palm.

121331211112222212212122112.title: Dismiss the thought and find Silver... Or mabey...

12133121111222221222.content:
Shadow carefully weighed the pros and cons of the two figures in front of him. Under normal circumstances he wouldn't even consider taking orders from the faker... but with Rouge, one wrong move could permanently rob him of his free will. It'd probably be safer to grin and bear it with Sonic.

"Very well..." the ebony hedgehog stated slowly. "I choose Sonic as my mentor."

"Aw, you don't want me, Shady?" taunted the jewel thief with in a mock-hurt tone. "What a shame..." She glanced over at her second in command. "You'll take good care of him, won't you Sonic?"

"Of course, mistress," the Blue Blur stated with a grin. Upon Rouge leaving he turned to his new pupil.

"Well now, Shady..." he chuckled. Even with his new personality, his rivalry with Shadow had remained. And now he had full authority over him.

"Since you're now one of us, I guess I'll start by teaching you..."
12133121111222221222.title: Sonic

choices: ...he does a pretty good job for a first-timer.
121331211112222212221.content:
Sonic grinned upon seeing Shadow's face, the same grin Rouge would often flash Knuckles whenever he got flustered.

"Come on, Shadsy, you can't expect us to do your makeup every morning, can you?" Sonic sashayed over to a nearby vanity table while Shadow tried his hardest not to look at his rival-turned-mentor's swishing hips. "Have a seat," the blue hedgehog said with a grin, tapping the stool in front of him.

Shadow grumbled and slowly tottered over as instructed, not used to his new boots quite yet, before plonking himself down on the stool. He glanced up upon hearing a disapproving tut to see Sonic with his arms crossed and tapping one foot on the ground. He followed his teacher's steely gaze, and noticed he was glaring at his legs, which were open as he usually sat. Realizing what he wanted him to do, Shadow sighed and reluctantly crossed his legs in the Rouge-like manner she almost always did.

"That's better, Shadsy," the blue one chuckled, before reaching over and producing a makeup wipe from a drawer. Running it over the striped hedgehog's face, the lipstick and eye makeup vanished quickly, revealing the usual gruff face of Shadow the Hedgehog.

"Now try putting it back on."

"What?" Shadow snapped out of his daydream and looked up.

"I want to see how good you are right now. Everything you need is here, so try putting it on without help."

Shadow looked at the vanity table, and the sheer amount of cosmetics; rows of lipstick tubes, multiple pallets of eyeshadow, tubes and containers that he didn't even recognize... Shadow didn't even know where to begin. Sighing, he picked up the first tube of lipstick to reach his hand and did his best.
121331211112222212221.title: Cosmetic Changes

choices: Break the window and leave his feminine prison
Stay and search for information about Rouge's ring
1213312111122222122212.content:
As the mortified ebony hedgehog picked up a silver tube, he began to twist it exposing a pink tip. Puckering his lips, he tried to remember what Maria did while she was still alive. After applying lipstick with a level of success he also donned mascara, eye shadow, and blush. All the while horrified at what he was doing while his mentor chuckled behind him, obviously enjoying himself. When Shadow had finished he set down the last tube looking to Sonic with a scowl. His fiery red irises blazing with anger. Of course Sonic, now having a power over Shadow, was not threatened at all. Sliding from side to side he examines Shadow, as if in keen observation. Flashing a set of white teeth he smirks before speaking.

"Not bad Shadsy. I think even Lady Rouge didn't expect this much out of you." Sonic glided in front of Shadow once again to look at his facial expression. Chuckling he holds his gloved hand up moving his index finger back and forth like a metronome. "Now now Shadsy. You look beautiful, why so angry?"

With fury blazing inside of him like an inferno Shadow remains seated using what awesome strength he has from not tearing his rival who was only inches from him. Snarling he turns away before speaking "You know damn well why Faker. If it wasn't for Rouge, you would be nothing"

Chuckling, the famed Blue Blur swishes his hips walking out of the room. "Now now Shady. Why don't you stay here and get a new appreciation for your external beauty while I get lady Rouge to examine you?" And with the Sonic left his rival and apprentice alone. Thinking to himself Shadow looked around the room. Walking to a locked window Shadow examines the hinges more thinking to himself.

"Hmm... I could very easily break this lock and get out of here, but Rouge would come after me fervently and she'd use that ring. If I stay on the other hand I'll be subject to more of this mortification, but I might learn how to combat that ring." After a few minutes of thought Shadow eventually decided that it was best to...
1213312111122222122212.title: ...he does a pretty good job for a first-timer.

12133121111222221222122.content:
Shadow quickly heard the clack, clack, clack of high heels as Sonic and Rouge returned; he sighed and decided to stay put, just as his new captors entered the room.

"Wow..." muttered Rouge with a smirk. "Not bad, Shadow. Not bad at all..."

Sonic grinned as his Mistress examined his student. "I knew you'd be impressed, Madame."

The ivory bat simply grinned and stood up. "Well, I think it's clear you don't need any more make-up lessons at least."

Sonic noticed his crossdressed rival letting out a small sigh of releif. Can't have that...

"Madame Rouge, perhaps you could help me teach Shadow's next lesson?"

Rouge raised an eyebrow as she looked over to her sapphire commander. "Oh? And what would that be?"

Shadow began to sweat when he noticed Sonic grin, and said "Well, I was thinking he needs to know..."
12133121111222221222122.title: Stay and search for information about Rouge'...

"Why don't we head into my bedroom for a few minutes?"

"Maybe my dear sweet Sonic" Rouge said seductively. "We can have some fun first."

"Whatever my mistress wants need only say the word." Sonic said bowing like he did before.

"Well here's what I was thinking..."
12133121112.title: Pleasure before Business

choices: Sonic willingly giving himself to Rouge
121331211121.content:
"After all, it would CRUSH her to see another girl in your arms." Rouge said with a devilish grin.

Soon Sonic copied that grin and got behind rouge to let his strong arms slither and wrap around her waist.

"Let's go" he said.

They discovered that Tails had Amy over to help him with the X Tornado. So it was off to the Mystic Ruins they went. Fortunately Amy was outside with Tails getting some air.

"Perfect" Rouge smiled. "Let's head off Blue Blur."

"Of course my mistress" Rouge had Sonic lose his jumpsuit, just for now so now suspicion would arise. Unfortunately it did when the fox's ears heard something

"Hey Amy, do you hear something back there?"

"Showtime"

Rouge and Sonic walked out, hand in hand. As soon as Amy saw them tears began to swell in her eyes.

"Amy?" Tails asked concerned?

"SONIC!" Amy screamed, Piko-Piko Hammer in hand "What are you doing with this she-witch!"

Sonic glared at Amy with an absolutely wicked smile and said only one word "This"

And with that Sonic turned Rouge around and stared into her aqua colored irises lovingly before wrapping her arms around her waist and pulling her in for a passionate kiss. Tails was scared for his life as he thought Amy would have smashed them both flatter than a coin. But she just stayed there broken. More tears rising the more Sonic and Rouge explored each others' mouths. Eventually Rouge was so excited her wings supported them both in the air. After they released Amy was on her knees crying as she saw the pink lipstick Sonic was now wearing.

"Why Sonic? W-Why h-h-her?" She could barely get the words out she was crying so badly.

"Simple Amy. You are a girl. Rouge is a woman. She is mature and she's everything your could never be. She can give me everything I've ever wanted and I want to give myself to her. Plus she's not an overly-obsessive, stalking, fan girl." Sonic said staring at Amy and letting his emerald eyes cut through Amy's heart like a dagger and destroying her soul. Her jade eyes were barely visible behind all her tears.

"Hmm... Amy's Really taking it hard" Rouge thought to herself. "Well what do I do? Do I tell her Sonic's under my unyielding control, or do I claim it's love holding him to me? Which would crush her more?"
121331211121.title: Breaking Hearts

1213312111212.content:
With Amy still crying Rouge decided to let her arms slither down both sides of Sonic's neck and meet on his muscular chest. All the while letting her head rest on his shoulder. "That's right Amy. The harder you tried, the more you pushed him into my arms. It was wonderful. He was just running from you one day ran into me. Fortunately I always had some feelings for him too." She said while she played with his quills with her finger. "When we realized how much we loved each other, well, you know the rest." She said glaring at Amy broken.

"Well Amy, Tails. I just stopped by to say hi. I'm actually going on a date with this lovely to Twinkle Park." To which Amy wailed.

"But S-S-Sonic! That's where we had our first date!"

"So?" Sonic said "Like I said Amy, you don't matter to me. Besides the only reason I went out on a date with you was because I lost a bet to Knuckles."

That crushed Amy more than she could take. She just curled on the ground into a ball. Not even trying to stop her tears.

"Good to see we don't have to keep it a secret any more Big Blue. Let's go" Rouge said seductively

Sonic looked into her icy irises lovingly before saying "Whatever you want my Ivory Angel."
And Sonic carried her in her arms and sped off leaving Amy a broken woman. Destroyed. Rouge got what she wanted, but maybe she got more. She never saw Sonic's dark side before, and now that it was out she liked it. She loved the way he looked into her eyes and the way he kissed her. She loved everything about him and never wanted to let him go. He was her Big Blue and she was his Ivory Angel. And she couldn't be happier.

"Lovely miss Rouge. She's devastated and I'm finally rid of her." Sonic said laughing.

Rouge saw a good opportunity to use her ring here. "Just call me Rouge. Sonic? The next question I ask I want to to answer honestly."

"As you wish." Sonic replied.

"Do you love me?" Rouge asked, felling silly she did.

"Yes Rouge. I do. Ever since I've known you, your feminine beauty has captivated me. The more I fought it, the more I wanted you for my own. I love you Rouge the Bat, and I would do anything for you. I'm just grateful I no longer have to hide it."

Rouge was ecstatic. Not ONLY did Rouge love Sonic, but he reciprocated that love. They were together now. Thanks to this ring, she and Sonic could finally be together. It was so beautiful she cried into his powerful chest.

"Rouge." Sonic said tenderly "Are you alright? Did I hurt your feelings?"

"Why don't you tell me?" Rouge said pulling him back in for another passionate kiss.

"So what do you want to do now my Ivory Angel?" Sonic said flashing the confident smile that swept Rouge off her feet.

"Don't you remember sweetie? We've got a date at Twinkle Park." Rouge said.

"Then hang on tight" Sonic told her. And with a gust of wind Sonic was at Twinkle Park with Rouge.
1213312111212.title: Son{x}amy{/x}ouge

choices: Rouge and Sonic have a perfect ending
They are interrupted by a knocking on Rouge's bedroom door
12133121112121.content:
After a lovely night of Ferris Wheels, cotton candy, and high-speed runs, Rouge and Sonic return to Club Rouge.

"Sonic that was wonderful!" Rouge said kissing her new boyfriend.

"Yes. Yes it was." Sonic admitted. "Well I should get back to Sally and Blaze. Make sure they're okay."

"Whoa whoa Big Blue" Rouge said. "They'll be fine. I've got a perfect ending to this date of ours."
She said with a devilishly seductive smile.

"Hmm... I like where this is going" Sonic said copying Rouge's grin.

"Come on Big Blue. Let's find out how fast you REALLY are." She said wrapping her arms around him pulling her up to her violet heart-shaped bed.
12133121112121.title: A night to remember

choices: "He's hiding something. Let's see what we can discover."
"You're probably right Sonic. Now where were we?"
121331211121212.content:
"Well this timing couldn't possibly be any worse." Rouge said just as she and Sonic were beginning to strip on Rouge's canopy bed.

"Lady Rouge?" Sally asked from the other side of the door.

"Whatever it is can't it wait?" Rouge said very annoyed at this point

"You have a visitor Lady Rouge. Shadow the Hedgehog is here to see you."

"Argh. Fine. I'll be down in a moment." Rouge said reluctantly as she began to don her black jumpsuit once more. "Feel like coming Sonic?" Rouge asked, not commanded, as she extended her hand.

"To be away from you would be the greatest torture." Sonic said grabbing it with his jumpsuit back on as well.

Shadow had to stifle a laugh as he saw Sonic with a giant blue heart across his chest walking downstairs next to a pink one. But he remained calm. "Good Evening Rouge. I'm sorry am I interrupting?" He asked examining Sonic's new attire.

"No not at all" Rouge said trying to be polite to the ebony hedgehog she formerly loved.

"Well I was merely hoping to come here to see if those rumors I heard were true." Shadow bluntly stated. "From the looks of things I'd say they are."

"What rumors?" Sonic asked speaking for the first time

"I heard that the ever so famous faker..." Shadow began

"Keep calling me that and I'm about to prove to you how real I am." Sonic interjected

"Is that so?" Shadow threatened

"Calm down both of you" Rouge commanded she said taking Sonic's hand and intertwining her fingers with his. "Sally get us some tea won't you?" She asked turning her head

"Of course Miss Rouge." She said and left for the kitchen

"Now finish Shadow" Rouge ushered

"I heard that Sonic and you were at Twinkle park earlier this evening seemingly on a date. I know the first half is true. But is the second half just as credible as the first?" Shadow wondered meeting Rouge's icy irises with his fiery ones just as Sally returned with the tea.

"Thank you Sally" Rouge said.

"The pleasure is mine Miss Rouge" Sally said leaving.

"Well you get good information Shadow." Rouge said nonchalantly "Yes. My Big Blue and I were on a date at Twinkle Park this evening."

"Lovely" Shadow said taking a saucer and sipping his tea. "Now may I ask how you two started dating? I'm sure it's quite an enthralling tale." He ushered.

Sonic jumped in to the conversation "Well one day I was running from that annoyance of a fan girl Amy Rose." He began "Eventually I was planning on hiding and Club Rouge was the closest place. Rouge let me in, we talked and talked." He said looking into the eyes of his Ivory Angel "The longer we talked, the more we grew to like each other. Feelings developed and we soon discovered that we never wanted to be apart afterward."

"Running away from the arms of one girl, just to go into the arms of another." Shadow commented. "Riveting. Now what about the suit?" Shadow said sipping more tea and placing his saucer back down on the table

"This was a gift from this gorgeous lady." Sonic said letting Rouge rest her head on his shoulder and nuzzle his neck. "A reminder of her. Something I'll cherish always." He said truthfully.

"What about your reputation Sonic? I thought you loved that more than anything else." Shadow questioned

"My reputation is only made greater wearing this suit. This suit means that I love Rouge and by the greatest divine miracle she loves me back." Sonic said proudly.

"Well Sonic, you champion Rouge fervently. I'm impressed" Shadow said and turning his head to look at Rouge he continued "You got one of the good ones Rouge. I commend you. Thank you again for the tea it was marvelous as always, but I'm afraid I must be off." Shadow said standing

"Don't be a stranger Shadow" Rouge said to her friend. "My doors are always open for the Ultimate Life Form " Rouge joked.

"I'll see you soon Rouge. And treat her well Fa- I mean Sonic." Shadow said trying to form some kind of friendship.

"I will. Don't you worry." Sonic said letting his emerald eyes get lost in Rouge's aquamarine ones as Shadow left.

"Well that was nice." Sonic began, "But I think that canopy bed is going to be exquisite." Sonic growled playfully.

"Sonic? Did Shadow seem like he was hiding something?" Rouge asked

"I couldn't tell" Sonic admitted

"He rarely visits. I think he's hiding something." Rouge accused

"Well personally love, I don't think we have anything to fear, but if you want to go spy on Shadow, I'll be right behind you" He said before pulling her in for a kiss.

Well? Does Rouge go spy on Shadow? Or does she let it go (back to that canopy bed)?
121331211121212.title: Horrible timing

choices: "hide. We have to discover what Shadow knows"
"get out of here. It's way too dangerous to be near Shadow right now"
1213312111212121.content:
"Come on Sonic. If I know that hedgehog, and I do, he knows more than he's letting on" Rouge argued

"Anything for my Ivory Angel" Sonic said as they rushed to Rouge's room and they got into black cat suits (which Sonic had his own tailored)

"Ready?" Rouge asked

"Always" Sonic replied "Let's go" he said scooping her into his arms and they were gone as a blur of darkness seemed to fine it's way all the way to Shadow's apartment.

"Okay, I think Shadow's gone" Rouge said noticing his motorcycle wasn't in the driveway and moving to the door

"Let's get this lock" Rouge said rubbing her gloved hands together

"Wait. If there's any sign the lock was forced, Shadow might suspect us. He probably keeps a spare somewhere" Sonic suggested

"Wow Sonic. That's actually very thoughtful" Rouge said as she and her Big Blue started looking for the key, when Rouge noticed something

"Sonic look!" Rouge said pointing to Shadow's balcony and noticing the open door

"Let's go" Sonic said running up the side of the building as Rouge flew.

"Okay, let's look around" Rouge said looking around the black apartment. Sonic started looking in Shadow's closet while Rouge looked in the dresser.

"Rouge, come look at this" Sonic said waving his hand

"What is it?" Rouge wondered

"It's a journal. Look at the latest entry." Sonic said as he handed Rouge the small crimson book with pages black as night

April 24
Well it looks like Rouge has gotten a soft spot for the fastest thing alive, but strangely he seems to reciprocate those feelings for her. I heard they went to Twinkle Park for a date. Maybe now I could visit her. Find out more about that ring she's always wearing. I'm starting to think that it's more than just a fashion statement. I'll find out tonight.

"Damn" Rouge worried "Now he suspects"

"Don't worry Rouge" Sonic said embracing his Ivory Angel. "If he fights us he'll lose. If he discovers the truth you can erase it. If he submits our group is stronger. No matter what happens it is beneficial for us" he assured.

"I suppose you're right. We should probably go." Rouge started to say when she heard something Sonic couldn't "DAMN! Sonic he's back!" she said when Sonic was now able to hear the engine.

"Sonic put the journal back. We need to..."

1213312112.title: Who's for Hire?

12133121121.content:
"Who will that be, mistress?" Blaze asked. "I'll hypnotize Wave the mechanic. After all, we want this team to be completly girls and I had no choice but to hypnotize Sonic." Rouge replied. "Plus, I don't like her."

"Damn, she is really paranoid for a bird." Sally muttered, looking through the skylight of Wave's house at the lasers, cameras, and various traps below. "Yeah, but with this team we'll get through it easily." Rouge said. They all jumped down off the roof. "Alright ladies, and Sonic, let's go!" Rouge ordered. Blaze kicked open the door and immediatly hurled a fireball at the camera. Sonic ran in and quickly dodged and hopped over all the lasers. At the end of the hallway, Sonic flipped a big switch and turned off all the lasers. Finally, Rouge walked in and knocked on the door at the end. Shortly after, Wave opened it, very confused. Her confused look quickly turned to anger. "Rouge?! How and why the hell did you break into my house?!" She exclaimed. "Shhhh... It'll all make sense in time..." Rouge said softly and held the ring in front of Wave. "Sense... In... Time..." Wave mumbled. Suddenly, she shook herself awake. "How may I serve you, my mistress?" Wave asked in Rouge's smooth and sexy tone. "I need you to build me a machine that will transform a boy into a girl." Rouge said. "Alright, mistress." Wave said and was about to get started. "Oh, and make sure that it will make them sexy." Rouge added. Wave nodded, and headed to her lab. Rouge turned back to her treasure hunting team. "Sonic, you have done well. I will now refer to you as a woman, too." Rouge said. "Thank you, mistress." Sonic replied happily. "Alright ladies, who should we hypnotize now?" Rouge asked.

"Excellent news, ladies. I have finished the machine." She said, an excited tone in her voice.

"Well..." Sally began...

1213312112122221.content:
Sally pulled a grey palmtop computer off of her boot.

"Wave, could you help me with something?" She asked, not looking up.

"Sure." Wave replied.

"Could you reprogram Nicole to serve Mistress?" Sally said, finally glancing at Wave. "Tails said you were smarter than him."

"Only when it comes to boards." Wave admitted, her pride removed by the brainwashing. "But, I'll give it a shot."

Wave took Sally down into the lab, past a machine that she guessed would be used on Sonic, mainly due to its similarity to the Roboticizer, and over to a workbench. She then took Nicole from Sally, and plugged her into her own computer.

"I'm in." She said after a while.

"Good. Don't change her too much. Make it so it's like she's been hit by the ring." Sally replied.

"OK."

After that, it didn't take long. Within the hour, Wave unplugged Nicole, and Sally turned the AI back on. Nicole's avatar soon appeared in front of them, already changed to incorporate a "Rouge-ified" appearance.

Suddenly, NICOLE the lynx's projection popped out of the screen. She was completely normal except for her boobs and butt, which were larger. Her hair was styled like Rouge's and she was wearing Rouge's jumpsuit. Instead of the hearts being pink they were dark brown. "Hello, Sally. Where's mistress Rouge?" Nicole asked in her same logical and calculating way, but with a twist of seduction and sexiness. "She's on her way with our uniforms." Blaze answered. 121331211212222111.content:
Sonic placed his suit down on a workbench, and stepped into the machine they had dubbed "the Womanicizer". Wave shut the door, and activated the machine, feeding a tranfe energy through the glass cylinder. It fired in a huge burst of fuschia light, and Sonic was changed forever.

As the light faded, they found his body to rival Rouge herself, with a thin, waspish waist, long, womanly legs, perky rear, small, dainty hands and feet, slender arms, thin shoulders and neck, full lips, a soft, round face, a small, cute button for a nose, long, luscious locks of blue hair, longer eyelashes, firm, D-cup breasts, and a vagina.

"Welcome to feminity, Sapphire." Rouge said, the female hedgehog stepped off the plate.

"Thank you, my Mistress." Sapphire replied, her voice soft and smooth. She strutted over to a mirror, and admired her reflection, and pulled on her suit, before repeating the same. She filled it out perfectly, every part of it supporting her female form. She was perfect, and apparently, she wasn't the only one of that opinion.

"Sally?" Nicole asked her friend. "Your heartrate and temperature are soaring, You're giving off pheremones too."

"I-I'm fine." The squirrel muttered, blushing. Rouge decided to ignore this, and asked her slaves a question.

"This is great, Miss Rouge." Cream said, "We're at the top of Mobius and Sally's reduced to a maid!"

"I know." Rouge smiled, "Unfortunately, I saw some people protesting. Namely Wave the Swallow."

The teacher and student smirked at each other. They BOTH knew what that meant.

"Blaze." Rouge called.

"Yes, my queen?" Blaze asked as she arrived.

"Bring in Wave the Swallow." Rouge ordered.

"Yes, my queen." Blaze replied before running off to do her queen's bidding.

1213312211212122122212112111212121222121.content:
Wave was furious about this announcement.Why would Sally give up the throne? and why give it to rouge? She never realized that these questions would be answered very shortly... Wave was in the front row of the crowd. She noticed a very large crate infront of her, (its contents unknown.) and formed a plan. The only thing that could be heard was the talking amongst the crowd, that is, until Wave climbed atop the crate and shouted "PEOPLE! LISTEN! LISTEN!" the crowd slowly stopped talking and payed attention, "LISTEN EVERYONE, HEAR ME OUT.NOW I DON'T KNOW WHAT THE HELL'S GOT INTO PRINCESS SALLY, BUT I'M NOT GONNA LET ROUGE TAKE THE SEAT TO THE THRONE THAT EASY!I SAY WE PROTEST! WHO IS WITH ME?!" The crowd by the end of Wave's speech were just shouting in excitment and anger.Wave felt pretty proud of herself - she'd just started a rebellion. "Nice speech, sugar" a voice was heard from behind of her. "i think it's time for you to meet the queen personally." Wave turned around, only to be met by a foot to the face contact, knocking Wave out completely.The figure quickly picked up Wave, and ran off into the castle, ignoring the gasps and shouting from the crowd.

THE CASTLE

Rouge was waiting patiently for Blaze to return, but she never had to wait any longer, as her minion had entered the room. "Ah Blaze you're back!" Rouge said. "Yes, ineed i am, my queen" Blaze replied, as she sat unconsious Wave on the nearby chair, and tied her to it. Wave finally awakes only to be 'greeted' by Rouge, standing all powerful over Wave. "YOU!" Wave shouted, struggling in the chair, trying to break free. "Yes. me. It seems someone didn't pay attention to my rules now, did they?" Rouge said, with an evil smirk on her face. "WHAT HAVE YOU DONE TO SALLY?!" Wave angrily shouted. "The same thing i'm gonna do to you!" Rouge replied, taking out the ring. "I think this minion will be...

121331221121212212222.title: Other matters to attend to

12133122112121222.content:
Rouge smiled widely and evilly looking to the proud princess of Mobius. Using the power of the ring on her finger she commanded her first slave.

"Tomorrow you will step down from power Sally. After you step down you will grant full power to Queen Rouge and Princess Cream at the coronation ceremony."

Kneeling to her mistress and soon to be queen she replied with confidence in her voice, not lamenting over the change in rule over all of Mobius.

"Of course Lady Rouge. It shall be done"

Flashing her fangs in a devilish smile Rouge dismissed Sally to arrange the ceremony.

As dawn broke the next day Rouge awoke from her deep slumber only to smile at the thought of the beginning of her monarchy. After summoning Blaze and Cream she began to prepare for the day while Sally readied herself. Sometime later that morning, or perhaps early afternoon, the town surrounding Castle Acorn was filled with the music of bugles as the coronation ceremony began. As hundreds, potentially thousands of Mobians came to the ceremony, Sally stood upon a high balcony along with Rouge. As she looked down to her subjects Sally spoke as Rouge guided her, the teal emerald of her ring emitting a soft glow, far too low for anyone who wasn't up on the balcony to see.

"Ladies and Gentlemen of Mobius. I saddens me to say the I find myself no longer capable of ruling the monarchy of this world." Gasps and shudders broke out all over the audience as she spoke. Holding up a gloved hand to silence them, Sally continued "However do not believe that I am simply abandoning you. I have found a suitable replacement who will lead this kingdom in ways I never could." Gesturing to the ivory bat clad in a violet gown, along with the rabbit in white she continued like it was nothing "As the supreme power of this monarchy I hereby succeed to Rouge the Bat." As Sally removed the silver crown from her head and placed it on that of her mistress, she turned to the crowd hands upraised. "All hail Queen Rouge!"

As a massive uproar came throughout the spectators the either cheered in absolute joy or yelled in fury, both attitudes having to be suppressed by the royal guard. However one face in the crowd seemed stoic almost as he gazed to Mobius' new queen. As the hedgehogs quills swished when he shook his head he made his way through the crowd to isolate himself and gather his thoughts.

But what famous hedgehog witness Rouge's coronation?
12133122112121222.title: Crafty Coronation

choices: "I think it's time that Faker learned to show me the proper respect"
"To truly rule, I need power. Power only all seven Chaos Emeralds can provide"
121331221121212221.content:
"Rouge certainly has a way with people"

The ebony hedgehog spoke to himself. With a smirk he looked up to the new ruler of Mobius staring at her beauty. Impressed he cared not for the change in rule. After all he was a rogue, what would new laws matter to the Ultimate Life Form? He had always done in his best interest and that was all he planned on doing. With a scoff he began to walk away before Rouge spoke to the public of Mobius, he new kingdom.

Seeing the ebony blur with red streaks sticking out in the crowd Rouge smirked devilishly before speaking. Her ivory fangs almost glistening in the sunlight as words flowed from her lips.

"Citizens of Mobius, it is an honor and pleasure to be bestowed the crown of Sally Acorn. With its power I intend to make all that is wrong right once again. Which is why I make my first act a queen now. A horrible injustice has fallen upon us, and it must be set right."

With another look to one hedgehog in the crowd she continued. Yelling, she commanded with the authority of queens.

"Guards! Bring me Shadow the Hedgehog!"

Astonished, Shadow opened his eyes as he immediately halted. Braced for battle he combated several Mobian castle guards with the civilian crowd in an uproar. Shadow fought valiantly, his speed and manipulation of Chaos Control required the entire royal guard to come to action. Shadow was relentless, murdering any guard that dared cross his path, but it seemed with each one dead another two were ready to take the place of the fallen. After Shadow was restrained, the guards left alive after the battle escorted him into the castle while the crowd watched in silence.

As he walked through a massive set of oak doors, Shadow's white teeth were in a snarl as he saw the ivory bat at the throne, her golden ring glistening in the reflected light of the chandelier. With his ruby irises blazing as fire itself, he yelled to the new queen.

"You psychotic bat! Release me now!"

With that, Shadow only found himself hit in the back of the head with a blunt object and forced onto his knees as one of the palace guards, an orange colored ferret, spoke

"You'll be wise to show the queen her proper respects in the future to scum"

Shadow was struck again as he turned his head and snarled. Having enough of this Rouge raised her gloved hand to the ferret and the brown fox escorting the prisoner.

"Enough you two. I'll not have any more of this... unless he deserves it. Now..."

With a gleam in her aqua eyes she looked to Shadow with a smile, cool water meeting blazing flames in their eyes.

"Shadow, there has been a horrible injustice done on everyone in Mobius regarding you. You aren't recognized properly."

Interrupting her, Shadow's smirk came across his face before speaking hiding his ruby eyes by shutting them

"Well, it's not my fault laws exist. I need things, I'm not planning on playing by someone else's rules to get them."

Seeing the opportunity she wanted, Rouge smiled taking Shadow's chin in her hand, while Princess Cream merely watched from a distance with a child-like innocence.

"I've loved that about you Shady. I love how you play by your own rules. Which is why I have something to show you..."

Waving her hand to the side Shadow turned his head amazed by what he saw. As Blaze walked out she head a seductive look about her as she brought forth an elegant, but powerful, cape and a golden crown. Rouge, calm by her minion's entrance continued

"And with you as Mobius' new king, everyone else will now play by those rules. The world will now correct the injustice it's done by spurning your genius Shadow."

With a snap of her fingers, the guards restraining Shadow released him so that he may walk freely. As Blaze came around him she almost dance as she secured the cape while Rouge bestowed the crown. Showing him a mirror, Cream held one to Shadow so that he may observe his kingly visage.

"Well Shadow. You know this is what you want. All this power you've always wanted at you disposal. All those who wronged you brutally punished, and you finally given what you deserve."

Shadow couldn't deny that his kingly visage amazed even himself. There was a certain elitist appearance about him. Not in a monarchical sense, but something more, as if a sense of belonging. Shadow smiled widely before turning to Rouge, pulling out a Chaos Emerald to match his Crimson irises. Letting it's power merge with his own it glowed before his queen stood at his right sidling up to him while the two guards that once commanded him knelt in respect... or fear. It didn't matter to the king of Mobius. As Rouge waved of the guards to herald the news of Shadow's rule she whispered in his ear.

"What is it you wish first my king?" Rouge knew she had plans of her own, and needed to keep her ring a secret from Shadow, but gaining his trust would be vital later. Besides, there was no denying it, Shadow was sexy, powerful, dark, mysterious, a gentleman, everything a queen could want. Of course her train of thought was broken as Shadow spoke. Clenching his fist he looked once more in the mirror before he expressed his thoughts...
121331221121212221.title: All Hail Shadow
