Tails was taken prisoner to use as a lure to bring Sonic there
1213312211212122211.content:
In the dark voice he was bestowed at creation, words slithered off of his tongue like silk as he let his blazing red eyes meet the cool blue ones of his queen's.

"I think it's time to correct another injustice against Mobius. That injustice being Sonic. His arrogance and insolence will bring turmoil and ruin to our kingdom. He must be dealt with before we can truly reign."

With a smile on her face, the ivory bat turned to Blaze showing her ivory fangs to her as well as the teal stone in her ring before she spoke.

"Blaze, as of this moment, you and Amy have been promoted to Captains of the Palace Guard. And your first order? Bring in the Blue Blur. You and Amy have full access to the armory and command of the guards. Use them to bring in Mobius' Public Enemy Number One. You will be the Order of the Ivory Shadow."

As she knelt to her rulers the purple cat thanked them before rushing off to complete her task while Rouge let out a quick chuckle at the name of her Palace Guard. Posters all over Mobius had the visage of the famed hero on it offering reward for his capture. So much so that Sonic himself had seen it in shock. Not being at the coronation he was astounded by this.

"Sally's got wanted posters?! What'd I do?" Rushing off the Blue Blur tried to make sense of it hoping he could find Tails for help, after all Tails knew Sally just as well as he did. Rushing to Castle Acorn, Sonic found a very interesting surprise when he got to Castle Acorn...
1213312211212122211.title: Public Enemy Number One

choices: A jumpsuit similar to Rouge's but with a blue heart & a pink, cursive "A" on it
A male uniform for the Order of the Ivory Shadow
12133122112121222111.content:
As Sonic moved toward the courtyard of Castle Acorn, Sonic ran through a massive stone archway to see the familiar fountain before him before he entered the main entrance to the colonnade. Unfortunately he didn't get far before several members of the palace guard ambushed him. Surrounding him in a circle, Sonic braced for battle wondering why the guards familiar blue jackets with a red trim were replaced with white and black, respectively. But Sonic's green eyes widened farther when he saw a pink hedgehog walk into the center of the circle with him clad in the same uniform of the Order of the Ivory Shadow.

"Ames? What's going on?" Sonic said stupefied

Taking out her hammer, Sonic noticed it was black and silver with a new scythe blade on the other end. Amazed Sonic watched Amy still braced for battle hoping soon she would calm him. Instead her normal bubbly giggle was a much more dark one before she spoke.

"Sonic. Coming to the rescue as always. It's such a shame you are so predictable. Now as Public Enemy Number One, I have direct orders from the queen to bring you in."

Sonic didn't even have time to react before every guard at Amy's command held him down. With a dark smile Amy latched her hammerscythe on her back before escorting her guards, with her newest prisoner, to the throne room. Amy hid her minor sorrows for having to bring in her lover, but orders were orders, and she'd never disobey them. Not even for Sonic. Addressing her guard, Amy spoke again with the authority of a captain.

"Incarcerate him while I report to the queen."

With that Sonic was dragged off while Amy entered the throne room. With a smile on her face she kneeled to the queen and king before her

"My Lord and Lady, Sonic the Hedgehog has been captured."

With a smile Rouge and Shadow looked to each other darkly before they looked to Amy. Rouge being the first to speak, caused Amy to smile widely at what the snowy white queen said.

"Excellent work Amy. As a reward, and seeing as how Sonic can't do anything while he's incarcerated, he is yours." Tossing her a metallic collar, Rouge smiled knowing she couldn't chance using her ring and exposing herself to Shadow. After all, her ring's power only worked on women.. as far as he knew.

Amy was overjoyed she almost lost her composure. Taking the silver collar she knelt again before leaving.

"Thank you my queen."

With that Amy left with Rouge's dark laughter fading behind her. Walking down the magnificent corridors Amy smiled opening one of the grandiose doors seeing Sonic in four-point restraint on a queen sized bed. Yelling Sonic realized Amy had somehow changed, his green eyes blazing with fury.

"Amy! Amy! Let me go!"

Yelling did nothing for Sonic though as Amy walked and swayed over to her blue lover and placed Rouge's collar on him. Looking almost like a silver necklace Sonic yelled in agony and pain as the collar's electronic impulses invaded his mind. As soon as it ended Sonic found himself as lovesick for his new mistress as she was for him. Submissive Sonic looked to Amy almost with hearts in his eyes. Looking to his restraints, Sonic put on a smirk that had always made Amy's heart melt.

"Well Ames. New outfit, four point restraint, a necklace? I'm not sure what kind of games you're playing but I think I could get into it."

With a dark smile on her face, Amy released Sonic to truly make him hers. To do so she knew what had to come next. Leading him to a wardrobe, Amy took out...
12133122112121222111.title: A changed woman

121331221121212221111.content:
"Sorry, but we need a few changes here, Sonic." Amy purred, looking into her hero's glazed eyes. "From now on, you will call me Mistress at all times. You are my submissive, loyal and obedient servant."

"Yes Mistress." Sonic nodded.

"You'll also wear this..." She grinned, holding up a jumpsuit similar to Rouge's, but with blue hearts and a pink, cursive "A" on it the chest.

"Mistress, those are girl's clothes." Sonic said.

"Yes, they are. Because you're a cross-dresser. You like to wear women's clothes, shoes, makeup, and perfume. You love it when I style your hair, and make you look pretty. Your greatest desire, besides being my lover, is to be a woman." Amy grinned. Rouge hadn't decreased her love for Sonic, but she had tweaked her sexual preferences. Besides, it would humiliate any part of Sonic left free, it would make him fit in with the other slaves, it would damage her chances of escaping, and it would be vengeance for leaving her to chase Sally for years.

Sonic, meanwhile, was confused. He had no idea what this side to his Mistress was, but a second later, she pressed a button on his collar, and within seconds, being a feminine sissy who desired womanhood above all else seemed like the most natural thing in the world to him. He obediently put on the outfit, and then struck a pose that would've been sexy, had he been in possession of "T&A".

Rouge knew how innocent Cream was, but that's about to change. Rouge knew someone known as being polite and kind as Cream would be a another great spy and apprentice. "Those parts won't fit in her uniform." Rouge stated.

"We need a mechanic, then." Sally suggested. "But it has to be a Freedom Fighter. Bunnie's cybernetics are the only thing stopping her from becoming affect by hereditary Neuro Immuno-Deficiency Syndrome. Her non-cyborg counterpart from Moebius has to wear a special mech suit to hold it at bay. Only one of us will know exactly what is needed."

"Right, thank you for the valuable information, Sally. I'm sure I can find a way to reward you." ROuge praised.

"Thanks, Mistress." Sally blushed. "Now, I'd suggest either Tails or Nicole. Nicole would be hard to convert, but she will be unswervingly loyal, and she has pwoer over the whole city. Tails, on the other hand, is easier to control, and, if someone asks him why he's walking around in a female body, we can make him, or rather, her, say either that it was a lab accident, and he hasn't found a way to change back yet, or Fiona convinced him to do it. I know that she has a thing for women, and he'll do anything for her, so it's plausible."

Rouge smiled. Not only was her squirrel slave beautiful, rich, and powerful, but she was an excellent tactician too. Sure, she wouldn't be relying on her for any actual fights, and she'd rather steal riches than just get given them by Sally and Blaze, but it was a start.

15121.content:
Normally, dealing with two targets would be difficult to deal with as opposed to just one. Luckily Rouge knew the Rabbits wouldn't put up a fight. Flying into the window, she quickly catches Vanilla by surprise and hypnotizes her. The bat goes into the other room and just as easily gets the young girl.

"How may we help you, Mistress Rouge" the mother and daughter say in unison. It seemed to have worked better than expected.

"Okay, let's see...I've seen the runt in action before. She would need to train her skills more." Rouge instructs Cream, who nods understandingly. "As for Vanilla, you lack any kind of fighting skill, right?" she nods with her eyes looking away, "Then you have to work behind the scenes. Now that I got you, there's no point in having you do nothing."

"Thank you Mistress Rouge." Vanilla says with a smile.

With that out of the way, what is the next thing Rouge does?
15121.title: Cream and Vanilla

151211.content:
Rouge taught she could use the ring to teach Cream how to sneak and fight properly, but her body wasn't prepared to do it immediately. She had to personally teach Cream, especially using techniques that uses and protects her ears so she wouldn't have to worry about not being able to fly. Not only that, she taught her how to use suggestion to mess with people, using either Rouge's technique or her own innocent look. Much to Rouge's surprise, Cream was a quick learner.

While they were training, Rouge assigned a project to Vanilla. Rouge had a spare uniform for Cream, but she was way too small for it. It was Vanilla's job to scale it down. Using the skills she got as a mother, she got the uniform to fit Cream perfectly. It was exactly the same as Rouge's except the pink parts were orange like her dress and the heart breastplate pressed against her torso, seeing as she nothing to work with unlike Rouge or Vanilla.

With eyeliner and quite a bit of dark teal eyeshadow, Cream had the look that of a thief and Rouge's apprentice. Vanilla asked her mistress if Cream was going on a heist soon, eager to get down to business. Rouge confirmed that they were ready to make to next move, the only problem was what? While this was a good start, it wasn't much of a team. She could do with more followers. Or she could use their innocence to sabotage their friends. Like Tails, even if he's smart, he was always gullible. They could nab a handful of his strange machines, and maybe a Chaos Emerald if they're lucky. He always seems to have one.
151211.title: With Family

1512112.content:
The thieving bat and rabbit duo closed in on the workshop ran by a genius boy. This would be Cream's first heist, a stepping stone of sorts. However Tails' place was not completely defenseless. To the untrained eye it was a simple shack with a runway, but sniffing out the hidden alarms and surprises was part of the challenge.

"The Tornado is gone." The young rabbit pointed out. "Wouldn't be much fun if there's no one there."

"You're eager, I like that, but you haven't shown me your skills yet." Rouge mentioned to her somewhat cocky student.

"Well, I've already spotted all the cameras and can tell the door can't be picked because it secretly needs a electric key."

"Mmph...I guess I should be impressed with my teachings." Rouge laughed to herself. "Leave no trace behind."

"Yes Mistress Rouge." Cream approached the building, leaping, ducking, and rolling to avoid detection. Clearing a corner, she came in front of the small hangar garage. A fundamental weak point since it would open to any device that uses a compatible signal. Luckily for Cream, Rouge would not let her go in unprepared. With a simple wireless device, the garage opened, giving her access to the rest of the workshop.

No one was home and there were no cameras inside, which gave the new thief free range. No sign of an Emerald, but something did catch her eye. It was a small raygun device that looked rather new but fully constructed. She examined it before sporting Rouge's signature mischievous smile.

Rouge scouted from her hiding place and spotted her student coming from the air. "Not too shabby, for a runt."

Cream retorted, "Maybe, but this runt got some results." She showed the raygun to Rouge who then mirrored her action when she saw it.

"Well this makes things interesting." Printed on the side was...
1512112.title: Just a little 'window shopping'

15121121.content:
Rouge looked over the tool. "Seems the 'boy' genius might have a sort of complex, making a device that can change anyone's, even his own, age. But that doesn't concern us." Compared to some state-of-the-art tech, the design looked primitive. The casting was smooth, rounded, but simple. The interface screen was bland, but everything was comprehensible and user-friendly. "Looks easy enough. We should be able to use it right away."

"Mistress, should we snatch more equipment from the shop while he's out." Cream asked, hoping to score more finds.

"Not now, we were just here for your field test. Besides, we don't want him to know the moment he walks in that he was robbed. Not to mention the fact that we would have to lug it back." The bat shrugged before spreading her wings. "We done here. Let's go back."

"Yes, Mistress Rouge." Cream chimed as she flapped her long ears.

--Rabbit's Residence--

Rouge sat in the recliner as Cream sat idly by and Vanilla made her mistress honey tea. Giving a final amused look at the device, she believed that she waited long enough. "I want to see this bad boy in action. Cream, your innocent charm is a good asset, but I must say, curiosity has me. A sneak peek of what's to come is entertaining."

The light in the young rabbit's eye twinkled, speaking to her youthful wonder, if not contrasting with her new look, "So you going to make me older?"

Vanilla gently gave Rouge the cup of tea and stood by to hear her thoughts. Blowing on the hot liquid, the mistress takes a quick sip and continued, "That's the idea. Well, part of it, because I'm thinking of using it on Vanilla too. She's already gorgeous, but if she was a little younger...Maybe around the young adult range..."

Vanilla smiled. "I was more energetic in my youth, and was just as sexy too. It wouldn't hurt to flaunt it again." She said with a wink.

Having pressed a few buttons, she sprayed a beam at her young apprentice. A colorful blast hit her right in the chest and swept over her body. The beam soon dissipated, but her silhouette changed nevertheless. Marveling at the sight, Rouge and Vanilla gasped as they witnessed this event, which was nothing short of a miracle. When Cream's new body and image came into focus, the bat twirled the raygun in her hand and smirked. In the next instant, a beam hit Vanilla and the process began again. The light surrounded her until her form shrank. After the illuminations died off, Rouge was satisfied with the results.

The younger rabbit got jumpstarted past puberty and sported a more developed body. Her chest hefted a pair of B-cup mounds and her hips have expended noticeably. Vanilla, on the other hand, had those same assets deducted, reduced to C-cups and her hips matching the width. Moreover, the main difference were their heights; Cream grew modestly as Vanilla shrunk significantly. The mother was still taller than her daughter, but the buffer was no more than two feet apart. Finally, the sudden change to their size caused Vanilla's and Cream's clothes to sag and tighten, respectively.

When they came to, they looked at each other before examining themselves. Even with the mental reprogramming from Rouge's ring, aspects of their family relationship showed as Vanilla's eyes water at the beautiful young woman her daughter was and Cream was in awe of her mother's transformation.

Rouge stared flabbergasted at the rabbits. The parent-child pair now more closely resembled two sisters. She regained her composure and grabbed her subordinates attention. "Twenty and fifteen on your ages. I'm surprised that you've had quite a growth spurt, Vanilla."

"It happens, Mistress." Vanilla assures her.

Glancing once again at the age changer, the mischievous bat purred once more. Truly, it was a remarkable gift, second only to her ring of course. 'Oh the things I can do with you.' She thought with a grin.
15121121.title: Reruns and Previews at the Flip of a Switch

choices: *hands her the device* "Show me how equal you two are."
151211212.content:
It has been a week since Rouge found the ring and had taken the Rabbit family for herself. In that time, Cream showed an incredible amount of promise, in both her naturally young and enhanced older forms. Rouge believed she was ready of her first solo jewel heist. Notably, it was to be performed in the middle of the day. Rouge must have had complete confidence in her teachings to think that the once sweet Rabbit could pull this off by herself. That, or thought that the target was in no way suitably prepared for a heist.

Alarms went off as a number of security guards went into a complete scramble. One guard got sight of a woman in a dark and orange sneaking suit with a bag and her arms full of gems and precious stones. He made a direct b-line for her, but rather than running, she skipped as if she had not a worry of getting caught. Even if she kept out of reach in a rather childish way, he knew that if can make for the stairs before she could, she would be cut off. Mustering what little he was not tapping into, he sprinted in a b-line to the only opening she could use and managed to reach there first.

To his surprise, he realized that he only made it there first because she had no intent to leave in that direction. Instead, she made her way to the window. He did not register why she would; the windows automatically shudder during a lockdown. The one she headed for was still wide open despite the shutdown due to a strip of duct tape sealing the gap closed. Security measures negated by an inexpensive mundane item. They might soon be in the market for a hydraulic replacement.

The bandit came to a stop in the front of the window before looking at the man behind her. He was winded in trying to pursue an alternate exit that it will take him a while to approach her again. Taking her time, she pulled a diamond from her pilfering stash and cut into the window, catching the glass before it would fall outside. She returned the authentic gemstone and hoisted herself with one hand to carefully sit on the windowsill. Just as she finished, the man closes the distance between them, but in a sluggish and pitiful way.

In a display of absolute prediction, she allowed the guard to get as close as possible and quickly wrapped her legs over his shoulders and around his neck. The man was lost in shock-induced stupor as he was suddenly in a headlock between the assailant's legs. He could barely think as Cream brushed his hair with her fingers so she could plant a kiss on his forehead with a giggle. With the guard paralyzed, the thief ended the tease by freeing him from her grasp and shoved him to the ground with her feet. When he snapped out of it and rose to his feet, he saw the girl sailing through the air with her ears. Shaken and humiliated, he continued to the ground level to continue the pursuit.

Walking along one of the many streets surrounding the museum, Vanilla moved into an enclosed alleyway. She took a couples glances over her shoulder to make sure no one was looking in her direction. Draped over one of her arms is Cream's school bag with their pet chao Cheese sleeping inside with his head peeking out. On cue, the airborne Rabbit lands in front of her mother with the treasured jewels in hand.

Cream gestured with the jewels in her possession, "Mistress was right. Now that I'm getting to hang of this, it does start getting fun."

Vanilla nods as she sets the bag down, pulling out the aging device and some makeup removal wipes. "Remember what else the Mistress said, that was just the first part..."

--Minutes Later--

Sirens blared as multiple squad cars storm down every road. The alert was out; the suspect was an orange and creamed-color Rabbit Mobian, possible teenage/young adult, height slightly shorter than the average human male. Many drivers and officers scanned the populace, desperate on the off-chance that the thief was in plain sight and not seeking cover.

One of the cars rolled down a street before spotting two orange and cream Rabbits from blocks away. The crew inside would have sworn that they found the culprit if only they stayed a distance away. When they got closer, they realized that while their color-scheme was spot-on, neither were the appropriate height.

The Rabbits saw the squad car pull up and silenced the siren. The driver stepped out intent on getting a closer look while the rest of his team advised otherwise. He knew what he was looking at, a small family of a mother, her daughter, and even a portable pet chao. Both were pretty shocked to see him with the girl cowering behind her mother.

"Officer," Vanilla started while placing a hand on Cream's head, "Is something wrong?"

The man was thinking that he was right on top of her. Maybe they were not the the culprit, but perhaps she is part of this family as well. For all he knew, they could have been in league with her. He spotted the backpack the girl was wearing with the sleeping chao inside. "Ma'am, we are in the middle of ongoing investigation. I just want the make sure that your daughter's bag was not compromised against her knowledge." He said in a attempt to not led on that he was suspicious of them.

Vanilla gulped before answering, "But why us? What have we done? Surely whoever or whatever you're looking for has nothing to do with us."

"Just doing my job." He held.

Cream looked up at the man who was intent on searching her bag. Noticing Vanilla's quiet instruction, she took her backpack up and scoop Cheese out, startling him to a groggy wakened state. Handing the bag to the officer, he immediately forced every zipper open and flipped it upside down. Considering a chao was taking up most of the space, all that fell were a few small toys and a snack that broke when it hit the pavement.

The officer stood stunned for a moment. An awkward pause continued until one of his coworkers left their seat. He was told that they were not going to entertain this futile exercise anymore and forced him back to the car. "I'm very sorry about this." The second man apologized for his partner's actions, "It's a little tense right now." Saying nothing else, he returned Cream's bag and duck back into the squad car.

When the police were out of view, Vanilla and Cream smirked at each other and kept walking down the sidewalk.

--Rabbit Residence--

The moment the mother-daughter duo passed through the front door, Vanilla lifted her ankle-length dress to reveal the gems strapped to her legs. "Mission Accomplished!" Cream said as she started removing the stolen treasures.

"Mistress's backpack decoy plan was pretty clever." Vanilla purred as her daughter started to remove their prizes from straps on her legs. "But that should come as no surprise given her track record."

Once they had the gems and jewels accounted for, they were stowed away for when they needed to present them to their mistress. "Now we just need to wait for her to check our work. Hopefully she'll praise me for how far my training has gone."

Without warning, the lights shut off in the Rabbits' surprise. Cream quickly turned to check the switch, but she heard a quick but quiet sound from her mother behind her. Turning once again, something forced her to spin until she was disoriented.

"Why exactly would I praise you?" The woman in the dark flatly stated. Cream tried to respond, but was cut off when both her wrists were caught behind her back by the bat's single-handed grip. "All you did was take a few gems from some poor suckers. You still wet behind your bunny ears." Rouge licked one of her fingers and wiped it at the base of the shivering girl's ear. "See? You're completely at my mercy."

"B-but Mistress, I don't understand...We did exactly what you said. We stayed truly loyal to you. I thought you wanted to make me a thief like you." Cream muttered in confusion.

Rouge sighed as she dragged the young rabbit by her wrists. Flipping the light switch back on, the mother was seen bound and gagged on the floor. "You see your mother, Sweetie? You misunderstood what I wanted. This isn't some fun little exercise to take you under my wing. This is not for your benefit, but mine." She finally lets go of the girl and approaches the bound mother. She wipes one of her tears before flashing her ring to her eyes. "You are mine now after all, and I tend to take care of my toys, my treasures. I set my eyes on something then I protect it. But you both are so much more than a sparkling thing."

The ring worked its magic on Vanilla, her gaze fogged in a trance. Despite expecting nothing less, she still smiled of her control over her. "You have so much potential, so many ways to be used." She grabbed the aging machine from the holster on her thigh. "And you have already made my life more...interesting." She broke the ring's gaze and locked eyes with her subject who was still tranced. "The things we can do...Now doesn't it make sense to leave things to me? To take this little operation in its proper direction?" Vanilla weakly nodded and let out a muffled cry.

Rouge turned to the daughter and showed the ring to her once more. Cream just stared into it, as if it was showing her the most pleasing image that only she can see. "Now, answer honestly. Who is your Mistress?"

"You are..."

"And what do you want?"

"To fulfill my Mistress's wishes..."

"So what would you be without your Mistress?"

This question did not trigger a verbal response. Instead, Cream began to sniffled as her eyes watered.

Rouge accepted the gesture as the most honest answer she could give. This was perfect to her. She hoped for her subjects absolutely dependent, but not broken. To follow her orders unquestionably, but not require her to hold their hand. Withdrawing the ring, she locked eyes with her prize. "Don't you worry. Now, you like to obey my orders, right?"

Cream nodded, letting out a small smile from what she was thinking was going to happen.

"Well then..."
151211212.title: Testing Commitments and Cementing Loyalties

choices: Is if she can use it (Cream pleasures her)
Is one final lesson (She pleasures Cream)
1512112122.content:
Rouge placed the device in Cream's waiting hands. Being only the second time she held it in her hands, she looked it over once more. Not as a mere toy, but an instrument she was entrusted to use. Seeing what was expected of her, she fiddled with it hiding her intentions for the moment. Once done, she locks eyes with her mother who was still tried to the ground. The young rabbit offered a smiling more befitting in her mistress before raising the ray gun.

The flash of light hit Vanilla, changing her form as expected. Rouge watched the silhouette as she was trying to figure out what her servant thought of 'be equal' really meant. The shrinking body was a quick tell of age regression. She shrank smaller and smaller, past as far as they once did. With the light dispersing, the adult rabbit was now as small as her daughter. The change in size also made her binds looser around her body as she was somewhat hidden in her clothes.

The mistress believed she saw what her slave was thinking. Equality in a literal sense. She turned to comment at Cream but froze at the next thing she saw. The Rabbit had turned the machine around and was pointing it at her chest. She pulled the trigger and zapped herself, dropping the device on impact. She grew in the shroud of white light, steadily moving into a stand.

In front of Rouge was Cream standing at her mother's previous age, her orange dress in her hands before it got too tight around her. She had once had the image of the two being akin to sisters, but now they looked downright like fraternal twins. Vanilla's short bangs were the only way she tell them apart at a glance.

Rouge was interested at the start with messing with their ages, but she as yet to have done it this far before. And yet, Cream did it just to please her. Plus, changing Vanilla was more of a curiosity while Cream's helped with stealth tactics and covering up her identity. She was at a lost for what to do with a kid Vanilla.

"So..." Rouge started again. "You didn't hesitate to shoot the raygun at your own mother while she was already vulnerable. Then you shot yourself immediately afterwards. You do know what happened, right?"

"I showed you how equal we are." Cream knelt down to her child-sized mother. "I still have all my happy memories with her and she will always be my mom. But whatever you need us to be, Mistress, we'll do it, no questions asked."

Rouge stuck up her index finger to the cradling daughter. "Then let me ask you a question. What made you chose those ages? What did I tell you that caused you to carry out an age reversal?"

Cream paused before speaking up again. "You...didn't tell me anything like that. I just wanted to prove to you how far we'll go. Mom would have done the same, right Mom?" Out of the hypno ring tranced, Vanilla nodded and moaned approval past the gag.

Rouge clicked her tongue to silence her. "But you know what that means, right?" The rabbits gave an uncertain look, letting the bat continue, "Choice. You acted on your own decisions while carrying out my order. That, was what I wanted to see." Rouge walked to the two rabbits staring at her before pinching both of their ears. "Of course, you understand there is one choice I definitely won't stand for."

Cream winced at the pain her sensitive ear was feeling. She got what Rouge was impling, 'Don't betray me.'. She would have pleaded for her to stop if she had not noticed her mom swarming her hands out of her binds. Once Vanilla's hands for free, she reached behind her head to undo the knot of the gag. With Cream still being pinched, she grabbed Rouge's hand and pulled it in front of her face. She saw the ring on her finger, and started kissing it multiple times, each one getting louder and louder.

Rouge pulled her hand away from her then patted her on her head. She gave a slight chuckle of amusement, "Very nice. I might even forget that you weren't supposed to get out of that." Vanilla looked down but held a smile at the compliment.

The bat looked at the rag that silenced Vanilla in her hand and got an idea. She walked behind Cream as she was helping her mom out of the loose clothing and Cream's orange sneaking suit hidden underneath. With fluid movements, Rouge wrapped the cloth around Cream's eyes catching the preoccupied woman off-guard. "Of course, even acceptable acts have consequences. I was expecting to have some fun with Vanilla, but you decided to take her place." The mistress's voice turned seductive for the next comment, "How sweet of you. Not only for sparing your mother from humiliation, but also for giving me a chance to 'play' with you."

Cream squirmed a little as the damp rag covering her eyes sent a chill down her spine, not helped by the bat's words. "B-but we already had some fun a few days ago. You used the raygun to make me grown while you and Mom taught me about sex and the pleasures of bring a woman."

"It's different, dear." Vanilla chimed in, her younger voice squeaking. "That was more...educational. The Mistress has something else in mind."

Rouge smiled, "True, she did learn a lot despite her youth and innocence. But what I am interested in..."
1512112122.title: Blurred Lines, but Everything's Crystal Clear
