15121121221.content:
Rouge led the blindfolded Cream to the the master bedroom. Placing the rabbit's hands at the foot of the bed, the bat laid on top of the sheets. Facing Cream, Rouge eyes the tiny Vanilla at the door. Despite her childish appearance, her eyes gave a gaze towards her daughter. The mistress identified that look as it was very familiar to her; pride. She can tell that Vanilla believed that Cream can live up to Rouge's expectations.

But that was not for her to decide. She silently waved her hand to shoo her. The message was received and Vanilla closed the door, leaving Rouge and Cream alone. She wanted her to be right as it would be to her benefit.

She used as few words as possible. "I won't accept failure in any department, Cream. You should know what to do..."

The rabbit nodded and lifted her hands to scan her mistress on the bed. First things first, she needed to free her mistress from her clothes. From memory, Rouge was lying there in her usual sneaking suit. She had one herself, so she knew how to worked. A unitard with a zipper in the front, covered by the breastplate. Cream would have to remove it, but not now.

Rouge laid there and felt her subject go for her boots first. One hand supported the back of her heel while the other guided her toe. Slowly, the boot came off with a gently constant tug. Her free foot became exposed to the air, sending a chill up her leg. The same process occurred on the opposite foot. Her toe was stuck out and the boot slid off. Not much for her arousal, but she could not remove the suit without getting rid of the outer layers first. It was a good mark that Cream was thinking ahead.

With the first task done, Cream's hands were left unoccupied. It was intended as she silently made a show with the next action. Sticking her hand up in plain view, the opposing thumb and index finger grabbed the edge of her glove. With the same speed she used for removing Rouge's footwear, Cream peeled her glove away, leaving only three fingers covered. Then with a flick of her wrist, it flew off her hand and landed on the bed. She mirrored the action again, flinging the other off on to the floor missing the bed entirely.

Starting with a loud clap, the rabbit vigorously rubbed her hands together. From the ankles, her hands run up the her mistress's legs. The warmth from her hands broke through the bat's fabric. The heat caused Rouge's legs to arch; the back of her knees soon caressed by the wandering hands. Rouge's inquisitive eyes closed while her throat let out a desired moan.

Her suit would drag against her body as Cream continued to move up. When the hands left an area, the fabric dragged against her again as the warmth escaped. A chill went up her spine when the cold air attacked her legs. Suddenly, the freed space was covered again. But it could not be by the hands, as Rouge still feel where they were. Instead, there was weight and softness behind it. Peeking, Rouge saw the Cream's adult body covering her legs, trapping her in a more intense heat. Between the simultaneous caressing, friction of her suit, and the change in temperatures, coupled with the unhurried speed, the bat melted into the blind service her servant provided.

The rabbit was giving everything to her mistress at that moment. She was to be obedient and loyal, but be able to act on her own direction. She pledged to serve her in any capacity and wished to fulfill it. She wanted this. That was what she truly believed. But that did not calm her nervousness. Despite the successful heist earlier that day, she feared that momentary success could lead to disappointment down the road. Hearing Rouge's moan gave her hope, but she dared not let up. Her skills in the bedroom is still a new world to her, but if she passed here, that will prove her worth.

Eventually, she worked her way up to the breastplate. She figured that the sweeping motion she had been using would not work as well here. Rather than using her palms, she would focus on the precise sensations of her fingers. Sliding her thumbs under the brim, the pink heart-shaped armor hovered in place. Her fingers traced around the circumference until she reached the top. For the first time this session, Cream was directly touching Rouge without anything in the way. With a single hand on Rouge's collarbone, Cream lifted the troublesome breastplate away. Her resting hand traced the outline of the fabric slowly to find the end of the zipper.

Rouge said nothing, but the moans kept coming. She was radiating heat that clung to her clothes that escaped when they were peeled away. This time around, there was nothing to keep her insulated. As more of her suit was moved, so was the rabbit's body removed to make room. Only then did the temperature of the room show her how cool it really was.

When Cream was fiddling, she unexpectedly hit a snag. She looked forward ahead with it came to taking off Rouge's boots, but she did not do the same with Rouge's gloves. Cream's worry was filling up but was short lived. After her earlier display, she decided to put on another show. While she still had her hands full, she had a different approach in mind.

Her hands rested around Rouge's right wrist and brought her arm up the her face. Her fingertips were an inch from her nose. Then, she insert the edge of the middle finger into her mouth and lightly bit the empty space as to not bite the finger. There was more resistance then there was with her boots, so she had to apply more pressure. As the tension built, Rouge could feel the glove squeeze around her hand. Soon the breaking point was reached and Cream's head jerked back while the glove hit her face. For a moment, Rouge could see her blush intensify through the blindfold.

With that and some more unrolling, one arm was clear. Repetition continued again. She prepared to not be embarrassed as she pulled with her teeth. As she tugged, she took care to only increase the pressure little by little. Then she noticed a slight twitch in her mistress's hand. Easing up at the precise moment, the garment came off in one fluid moment.

Arms free, it was time to completely free the bust that was restrained all day. Both hands rested on the sides of Rouge's boobs, she groped a bit focusing at the lower portion. Rouge gave more moans, but Cream gave cute groans. The laying bat wondered what the rabbit was doing as she continued to toy around the edges. When the motion switched to more circular ones, she got it. She was not only being pleasured from the start, but it was a performance as well. Now, she was pretending that Rouge's chest was a safe that she needed to crack before she could get the goods. One time uttering, "Almost...". Another time, "I think..."

Cream would love to linger there, but she needed to pick up the pace. Back at the starting position, her pinkies and ring fingers grabbed the soon to be discarded fabric. Tracing the outer limit of her chest with her index fingers, her thumbs met and dug into the valley in Rouge's cleavage. Cream supported a boob in each hand before pushing them up. Simultaneously, the hands brought the fabric down, finally breaking Rouge's chest out of its cage. "Gotcha." Cream spoke softly. Rouge noted that not only was it done in a flash, but she even managed to unhook her bra as well. Her nipples were out for all to see. All except the blindfolded servant.

For the remainder of the stripping, Cream hands were in the unitard. Caressing her again, but in reverse. Her hands deep when exposing her stomach. They spread when they went around her hips. They took care when snaking out Rouge short tail, only to explore her buttocks afterwards. Soon, she continued to where she started. She gave one final tug and the whole thing came off.

Rouge was lying down with nothing but her unhooked bra and black-as-night panties. She smiled as she looked at her servant as she set the unitard neatly aside. Rouge knew from the start, and this act symbolized everything up to this point. A gentle touch. Despite her reprogramming to emulate Rouge, Cream still cared for those close to her. Now, she was the one on top of her list.

In the bedroom, it was a technique best suited to create a sense of longing. But if it was anything like this show, it was also a way to make one hell of a tease. Rouge bit her lip as she mused over the results of the training. It was scary in its own way, but she wondered where the rabbit would lead her.
15121121221.title: In Service to her Mistress

choices: "We can fetch someone to fix it for us." (Reader's Choice)
"We'll need someone who is good with machines anyway." (Author's Choice)
"We don't need it. I like you two like this."
151211212212.content:
Rouge woke up in Vanilla's bed to find herself alone. Peeking out the window, the morning sun was illuminating the room. She was not much of a morning person, but the night prior made this day an exception. Though the rabbit only had a week's worth of training, she was skilled enough to keep Rouge entertained and satisfied.

She was sure as she got out of bed. "She passed, and I sure as hell am not going to let her go." The clothes that were littered around the room were now washed and folded on top of the dresser. "Diligent. How early did she wake up?" She questioned. Still, she admired the work ethic.

Taking the set of clothes in hand, the bat headed into the master bathroom for a rinse. The water from the shower head drenched her awake. Its heat fogged up the mirror beside her. The pressure was delicate as it cascaded her from head to toe.

Only the sound of the water spraying and draining echoed inside the cramped room. Rouge wondered as she reflected. 'Darn, it reminds me of her body heat. I think she might have left more of an impression than I thought. Her mother was different the few times we did it, but Cream was playing in a different field. How? The both of us taught her, so why did she show that level of skill?'

Rouge tried to wrap her head around it and came to a simple solution. 'Vanilla must be learning too. She probably didn't know how to properly please me. She knows how to please a man, not a woman. While Cream's teaching cemented a foundation, Vanilla's must be conflicting with her experience.'

What started as a quick soak adopted some light lathering of soap to her body. 'I can't fault her for that. She became a mother for a reason. I have felt that itch before too, many times. But I'm not pleased so easily. She'll relearn the basics of she has to. And once done, it better not be a repeat of what happened last night. I like variety.'

Rouge stopped putting on soap when she got to her arms. Giving it a small whiff, the smell reminded her of flowers. 'Umm...Not really my taste.'

Cream showed real potential to Rouge, but she was a blank slate. Vanilla needed to be reworked. Rouge did not want her broken first, that would jeopardize her efficiency. It was more accurate to say that she wished her servant to be more enlightened.

The water washed the soap down her legs and off her body. Turning the water off, Rouge stepped back into the steamed-up bathroom. Shivering due to the exposure, she wrapped herself in towel to dry up.

Eventually, the condensation of the mirror let up and the bat stared at her reflection. Reapplying her signature eye-shadow, she focused on her left ring finger, the new home of her powerful gem. 'There's more to it than I thought.' She continued. 'I thought it would be easy, and it really is, but there are still more defining details. I can changed them to become what I want them to be, but my wishes would only be fully answered if I, myself, put the work in. I can't rely on the ring to do everything.'

After she finished with her makeup, she got dressed from the pile that she brought with her. Donning her boots last, she belatedly wondered if she should have had the rabbits wash her in service. She sighed speaking aloud, "I have to remember that I am not alone in this."

She exited the bedroom and walked through the short hallway when a warm scent filled her nose. 'Breakfast.' This wasn't the first time the Rabbit family catered for her. She enjoyed it. She could not figure out of it was due to their hospitality or their willingness to serve. Either way, she benefited from it.

Entering the dining room, she saw Vanilla and Cream in the kitchen working for her without even a command. At a glance, she saw that they swapped their ages again, looking like sisters once more. Vanilla was the first to spot Rouge eyeing her and gave her a smile reminiscent of her mistress. "Later." The bat mouthed. Vanilla nodded, missing what Rouge was planning for her.

The bat waited without a word as her breakfast was brought to her. It was a nice perk of waking up in the Rabbit's household, but she got to thinking again.

With Rouge at one end of the table, she addressed to the mother and daughter on either side. "I've decided." The expression on Vanilla and Cream tensed on the serious tone. "The reason I started training Cream was because I wanted to see her potential. She had her share of adventures, sure, but jewel-swiping isn't exactly saving the world." Cream leaned in closer to hear the evaluation. "The only thing stopping her now is real experience."

It was a positive assessment of her skills. All she had to do was prove herself even more. It was realistic in the sense that there was still tweaks that needed to be done, but it could not be any higher a mark. "I will not disappoint you, Mistress." Cream bowed her head. Vanilla's lips curled into a smirk. Her daughter's accomplishments were her pride.

"With that," she continued, "I think we need to move on with the next step."

"Next step?" Cream questioned.

"Mistress isn't satisfied with just us." Vanilla guessed but stated it as a fact.

"Right. My first thought when I got the ring was to take it for a test run. I had a whole list of targets to choose from. But do either of you know why I picked you first?"

The question caught the rabbits a little off-guard. They shared a glance at each other, only to see that the other one did not have a clear answer.

Cream started, "W-was it because I could be easily manipulated? That once I would go under, there would be very little that I wouldn't think was wrong?" Rouge slightly shook her head. Cream's answer was wrong.

"Well," Vanilla jumped in, "Was it because we are practically alone? Since we live as a family in a house out of the way, no one would be suspicious?" More shaking; another wrong answer. The response they gave were half thought out, but it was still surprising nonetheless.

"No." The real answer hit them like a ton of bricks. "It was because you two are the weakest. I had no evidence to believe that the ring would work, so I needed to test it on those who stand no real chance against me. Plus, if I did fail, I doubt that you'd go out of your way to tell everybody. Even then, my reputation might not have taken a hit. I'm not exactly in the 'good guys' camp."

Vanilla grimaced at the truth, but not as much as Cream. She thought she was improving, that she was on Rouge's good side. She took in everything that was taught to her and got praised for it. But Rouge's interest was not based on her as an individual, but rather was based on a fundamental premise. The strong will dominate the weak. It would not help to think that it was easy for her. She managed to scoop them up after only revealing her first card. They were already at her mercy once she had made up her mind.

It would have been normal to be mortified and feel helpless, but Cream did not feel that way. If anything, she felt more determined. She belonged to her mistress now, so she couldn't be dragging her heels. She was weak? Then she will change that. She reaffirmed her mission once again. To be her best for Rouge's sake.

"But now I'm certain. I have put off getting new members for too long." Rouge rested her elbow on the table and her cheek in her palm. Taking a short sip of her much-needed coffee, Rouge confessed, "I just don't know who yet. The ring is powerful, so I could probably get anyone. But now, I don't any order in mind."

"Whoever they are, we will help." Cream pledged.

Her mother agreed. "We'll serve you to make your life better and easier."

Rouge was silent for the moment. She returned to her breakfast, followed by her servants. Finishing her hot breakfast first, Rouge's eyes started to roam until she spied the age machine at the edge of the table. She gave an internal chuckle as it was resting on top of a clean folded washcloth like a precious treasure.

Looking back at the rabbits, she again noticed their twin-like appearance. There was nothing wrong with it, but she remembered her thoughts while in the shower. Vanilla's reeducation. The mother was already in an appropriate body for the night, and she wanted to keep that. If she returned Cream to her normal age, the young rabbit would know not to expect something tonight. Really, Rouge's may reasoning was 'I will do it just because I want to.'

She got up from her seat and grabbed the device and pointed it at Cream. Everyone knew what to expect and waited for the flash of light. But it never came. "What the...?" Rouge tried again only to end up with the same result. She could not tell what was wrong, but one thing was clear.

Cream spelled it out. "Is it broken? If it is, then Mom and I are stuck like this."

Vanilla pointed out something else. "No one else knows about this. If we run into someone we know, the secret will be out."

"I'm not sure about that." Rouge gave her input. "You could just say you're cousins or something, but that won't last long." Rouge kept a level head as she inspected the device closely. She might not know what is immediately wrong with it, but she had an idea. "You know what? ..."
151211212212.title: Shower Thoughts Before Moving Forward

choices: "But we're going to play by my rules."
1512112122122.content:
It made the most sense in her mind. No one but Tails knew how it worked, so she will find someone else who could find out. They would need to spend time, maybe even up to weeks, to understand, restore, and even replicate it. On top of that, her new slave could create new items that might surpass it.

Vanilla asked the obvious question, "Wouldn't it be easiest to go after Tails? He'll be able to fix it instantly. And Cream broke in before, so catching him off-guard should not be a problem."

"I am interested in catching him, but not now." Rouge confessed. "He and the rest of his group will definitely try to stop us once they find out what we're up to. So we'll take them before that happens. My plan would be unstoppable once I can corrupt 'the heroes'. But I want it to go off without a hitch. We are going to need more people first."

Rouge had a quest in mind. Now she needed to form her party before getting her prize. A group of loyal servants answering her beck and call.

Still, she was following the immediate problem of the device in her hand. "I need someone other than Tails to fix this. They..." Rouge finally caught herself, "Let's be honest, 'she' would fill our ranks and can widen our arsenal. It's two birds with one stone." The bat fiddled with the device before she grinned. "In fact, I think we should do a little bird-watching."

Rouge asked Cream a question to jog her memory. "Cream. Do you remember Wave?"

Once she heard the name, Cream knew what Rouge had her eyes set on. "Yes, I remember. Wave the Swallow. She makes and races with Extreme Gears. And she's part of the Babylon Rogues."

"Exactly. While she's skilled in designing the Gears, there must be more in that head of hers. On top of that, she's already a thief. It's damn near perfect."

Vanilla placed a finger to her lip. "But she's in a group, right? Won't we be facing the same problem as we would getting Tails?"

"You're not exactly wrong. The difference is numbers. There are three of them, unlike the several Sonic has. If we take her first before the others figure it out, it would just take persuading at that point."

"But they might be at Babylon Gardens or on a heist. Distance is not a problem, but finding them is." Rouge nodded at Vanilla's words and clicked her tongue in frustration.

"Um...It says Wave would be at the new sand track at the beach two hours from here." The two more mature women stared at Cream when she finished. In just a few questions, she found a site promoting Wave's visit on her mom's phone. "As far as this says, the others might not be there."

Vanilla shot a glance to the ground. "I swear she's better at using that thing than me."

Rouge grinned again. She knew she was not going to pass up this golden opportunity.

---

There were few places or situations where Rouge would feel under-prepared. The beach was not one such place. By most standards, she had everything a woman would need to flaunt. Chest, hips, or butt, she was decked in almost all the essentials. Despite her impressive kicking power, there was not that much to look at when it to her legs.

That would not be the case if someone got too handsy though.

With that in mind, she dressed for the hot day ahead. She would have like to tease the populace with a perfect bikini, but she accounted for what might happen. Her usual Extreme Gear was carried under her arm. She figured that the trip would lead her into a race with and for her intended prize. For that reason, she chose a mini sarong that would conceal the goods, allowing an acceptable amount of modesty.

In the distance, a crowd formed around a stage that was erected for the day. It did not take a genius to guess that that was where the main attraction was. In the far section of the crowd were the two Rabbits. Cream wore a pink tankini, still hesitant to show more of her body to anyone other her mom or Rouge. Vanilla was more bold with a striped bandeau. Apparently, Vanilla keeping her old swimsuits in the name of 'wishful thinking' came in handy.

'Showtime!' Rouge moved to the group of people, planning to cause a stir. The closer she got, the image of an unsuspecting Wave in a fold-up chair became clearer. The professional but bored look on her face made Rouge smile. 'Don't worry, things will get interesting.'

She passed by her up-and-coming agents before cutting through the crowd. Taking one final look, she examined the chao in their arms. Cheese with Cream and Chocola with Vanilla. Despite the time she was with them, she never used the ring on them. She was not sure what would really happen to them. Luckily for her, she did not need to. They do not question what their caretakers tell them. Cheese was used on the day of Cream's heist while its twin 'guarded the house'. They were servants by proxy, but they were not chaining her.

Complete with the chao, the women looked like ordinary fans. They spotted their mistress and conveyed they were ready as covertly as they could. Their mission was to wait. If something were to go wrong, they were the secret group hidden under everyone's nose.

The words coming from the announcer sounded like gibberish as Rouge was bent on making a show of her own. Using the ring in front of all these people was not an option. She need to isolate Wave to avoid suspicion. It was unfortunate that the best chance she had was to get in front of everyone.

Wave was scoping the new sandy track when there was a divide cutting through the audience. When it faced the front, her face changed. One of her rivals stood in plain view, with an Extreme Gear no less. There was only one way to interpret that. "Oh please!" She got up from her position and walked to the edge of the stage, directly facing Rouge underneath her. "You seriously think that you can just walk up here and challenge me?"

Rouge smirked as she internally thought, 'I swear that would be the last time you'll will look down on me.' Her smile was natural but massively misinterpreted. She shrugged and spoke to the bird on the platform, loud enough for people to hear. "That's not going to be a problem, right? I doubt that you would want to pass up this opportunity to race. Of course, it would be very upsetting to you when I win."

The verbal challenge added drama to the situation. The audience got excited and would not want Wave to back off now. In all honesty, Wave did not care. Everyone here was just starstruck, hoping to see a 'cool' performance. They most likely would not understand a quarter of the things happening.

The words still had an effect on her though. Rouge was pretty presumptuous and arrogant, striking at the swallow's pride. Wave laughs in equal arrogance. "And how do you plan to do that? I bet you put that Gear of yours into a storage shed after your last race. Really..." Wave kicked her board up to showoff, "While yours was laying around, I kept fine-tuning mine. There's no way you can compete against me."

"We shall see about that, shall we?" Rouge further provoked.

"Save yourself from the embarrassment." Wave retorted.

Seeing that she had everyone's attention, she jumped onto the stage to reach eye level. "I didn't hear a 'no'."

"Are you asking for the taste of defeat?"

Rouge did not say anything. She was sure that she did not need to say anything more.

The Extreme Gear specialist scoffed at her opponent, "Fine,..."
1512112122122.title: Bird Watching...with a Net.

choices: "Sorry, Mistress, but I have a reputation to keep."
15121121221221.content:
It was completely in her hands now. Her provocation proved effective in securing a race. All that mattered at this point was in her execution.

She smiled. "So are we just going to wait for this little thing to finish, or can we just skip to the good part?" She waved her hand around to emphasize the stage.

Wave shrugged. "Fine by me. The rest of this would be boring anyways." The rumblings of the staff working the venue that were excited by the turn of events turned sour. The athlete looked at the crew with a fair amount of disinterest. "If you really wanted me to stay, you wouldn't have pay me upfront. I only came here to protect my reputation, but this woman would damage it more than you guys."

Rouge would not have believe that Wave would have been so open to the staff. She would have guessed that they would put a stop to this. She would not have bet on the power of the people to carry this through. It would not cross her mind that they would fold without setting things straight.

If she did not see everything transpire, she would be shocked. The main attraction of the event led to a line-up of Rouge and Wave alone on the starting line. In the time everything was set up, Rouge had memorized the track's overhead map. With it fresh in her mind, she had formulated her plan. She whispered to Wave right beside her, "Just to let you know, I'll get what I want."

The swallow snorted. "Well, don't expect it to be easy."

Like clockwork, the countdown began after the last word. Each number fulfilled its purpose, adding tension and suspense to the upcoming race. With zero substituted with a 'Go!', the two burst through the line, speeding at a rate the Blue Blur had to compliment. The air rushing past the racers kicked up sand, creating the illusion that they were surfing on the beach itself. As they take a turn, their after-trail changed from sand to water. In most races, eyes would be glued to those in the front of the pack. However, when there were only two, there was a certain appeal.

Many paid attention to Rouge in second place. The one who seemed so adamant to start a race was tailing behind. She would not lie to herself. She knew Wave did this for practically her whole life. Yet, winning was not her goal. She only needed to keep up.

Her objective was closing in on them. A massive jagged stone jetted out of the water. From the perspective of the people on the beach, it was a natural blind spot. Even if the spectators spread across the length of the shore, it would be too far away to see tiny detail clearly, if at all. It was the ideal place for Rouge to launch the trap.

While she was a distance away, there was a way to close the gap. Every course had shortcuts for racers specializing in speed, power, and in her case, flying. Both were able to use it, but Wave refrained from doing so due to her pride. Rouge had not used them up to that point to avoid giving her prey an excuse to flee. It was all for this moment. She was going to catch her by surprise.

The tech in her gear revved even harder. The board recalibrated to stabilize its balance in the air once Rouge was truly airborne. The air brushing past her body changed direction and increased in speed. She crouched down to limit the air resistance and spread her wings for the thrill of it.

In the lead, Wave had a bad feeling. She shot a glance behind her to find that she was alone. "That's how it is?" It was too late to change course. She readies her combat spanner for when Rouge reentered the track. It did not go as she planned.

Rouge had to come back, but she took a different path. As soon as the view from the shore was obstructed, she made her move. Wave saw the bat leave the flight path early, charging directly at her. She was shocked. Rouge could clearly see the weapon in her hand and did not wield her own. Forget rookie mistakes, it was a fatal one. The more puzzling part was her absolute confidence. She was posing with a bent knee and a hand with a prominent ring pointed at her face.

It was baffling to her. Was this woman an idiot? It was not immediately apparent to her. She gave a moments pause. A pause Rouge utilized. She played a game of chicken until she thought she could not get any closer and aimed the ring in Wave's face.

With them still moving at top speeds, Rouge was not sure if there was an effect. She could still hear and be heard though, so she give a command dressed as a question. "Now, how about throwing the win for me?"

Wave told Rouge...
15121121221221.title: Extreme Gears in Place

choices: Continue through Vanilla and Cream's POV
151211212212213.content:
Rouge was now the one left off-guard. Wave called her 'Mistress' so the ring had an effect. Despite that, she was not immediately loyal. Maybe if she showed her the ring again, she could cement the submission.

That would not come as Rouge was met with the end of Wave's oversized spanner and spun out. For as bad as it looked, Rouge was relatively fine. By the time she managed to right herself, Wave further expanded her lead.

Rouge gritted her teeth in fury. The viewers did not see the blow she just took, so she was spared that humiliation. The optics afterward were still confusing to the uninformed. One second, she took a shortcut. The next, the distance between the racers increased.

The bat's mind shifted focus. She achieved what she planned to do, but it was not to her expectations. Now she was stuck in a competition that she did not want to win in the first place. Her anger clouded her judgement. Now she needed to win.

It did not matter to her how petty the means were. She would take the shortcuts available to recover her positioning. Wave would constantly glance over her shoulder to watch Rouge gaining on her. When it came close for the first time, she took a sharp turn to a flight path. Now the distance was maintained evenly with Wave granting no chance for Rouge to catch the drift.

This process continued for the next minute before it was a straight shot to the finish line. Rouge knew there was no way she could catch up anymore. That did not meant she fully accepted it though. Predictably, Wave crossed the line first to thunderous applause. At her earliest convenience, Wave kicked her Gear up and gave a silent gloating smile. She held the look until she blew a seductive wink and kiss at her mistress. It infuriated Rouge is the effects of the ring gave Wave a double-edge sword. It gave her more appeal but also bolstered pride and cockiness.

Rouge wanted to confront the swallow, but the latter was swarmed by the people. In many cases, Rouge would regard them as random nobodies. They were sheep that mindlessly turned the events into Rouge's favor to stage the race. As far as she was concerned, they would disappear from her life by the end of the day. Alas, she knew she wanted to keep the ring and its magic a secret.

She mulled over what she wanted to do next. With Rouge standing where she was, the promoter brought Wave back onto the stage. His exaggerated hype was dulling Rouge's ears, further adding to her heightened agitation.

"Wow! Did anybody else see that?" He paused for the audience's cheer. "Good, I thought I was the only one." He joked while the uproar drowned out the lame remark. The promoter clears his throat, "But seriously, this has been a great day to launch off the debut of the track. Miss Wave, your thoughts?"

Wave saw Rouge looking down with her hand on her chin. She was not looking at her, but she knew that she was listening. "Taking the course into account, it's...rather decent. That is if you are looking for a beginner course." The cheers died down at the critique. "Just look at it seriously. It just screams 'a walk on the beach'. I raced on tracks with obstacles like waterfalls, deep pits, and falling debris. This is not a track for professionals like myself."

Beginner. Walk on the beach. Rouge heard the belittling words and so did everyone else. Once everyone noticed Rouge, they noticed the shade that was being thrown at her.

The promoter gave his own two cents. "Yes. And even after your opponent called you out, she was no match against you. Even with a track that would not provide much a challenge to her." Rouge made another note to find out where the promoter lived. "With that being said, I think I speak for many of us when I say that it was close almost the entire race through. If it was a beginner's course, shouldn't you have done better."

"What?!" Wave snapped at the insult.

Most everyone was taken by surprise yet again. Was he going to be the next one to pick a fight with her? Was he standing up for Rouge? In reality, as a promoter, protecting his client was an act of job security. "If the course is as bad as you are making it out to be, perhaps you could have finished it faster, while adding more flair. I mean, these are supposed to filled with intense drifting, close range melee, and the trinity of shortcuts and bypasses."

Wave interrupted him before he could finish his full thought. "Look here! One, this course is subpar compared to other ones. Two, I was only racing against one other person, so of course there wouldn't be a lot of action. And three, neither of us took it seriously. Have you noticed that we didn't use those shortcuts for the first half of the race? I didn't need to show off on a mediocre sandbar like this and neither did she."

That was something Rouge did not expect. Wave was defending her on the stage. Was that the power of the ring coming through, or was it her natural pride?

"Well, I got paid, and I raced. As I see it, I did what you asked me to." Without another word, she stepped off the stage.

In the moments where Wave was telling the promoter off, Rouge slipped under everyone's noses and passed by Vanilla and Cream. She told them only what was necessary. "The ring had an effect, but not completely. She still managed to disobey me. Follow her. Take her to Club Rouge. I have something in mind."

"As you wish./We got it." Vanilla and Cream gave affirmative answers as Rouge kept walking. Looking at their target, they sighed as the crowd did not disappear from her. That was something they will have to deal with.

Rouge came to the conclusion that reprogramming Wave is going to be different than with the rabbits. In a sense, they always seemed that they were living in 'easy mode'. On the other hand, Wave's pride was going to give her some resistance. The solution seemed simple enough. While she led the rabbits with carrots, she will have to give the bird the stick.
151211212212213.title: Shore Loser

choices: One of Wave's feathers, "Of how 'you' will always serve me."
1512112122122132.content:
The purple swallow had came to moments ago. Still, she could not change her current situation. It was dark. She could feel a blindfold over her eyes, obstructing her view. However, she could not remove it as her wrists and ankles were bound, keeping her spread eagle. She would have some preparations in such situations, but she knew that it would be impossible this time around. She was stripped of every article of clothing. The warm air brushed against her nude body, emphasizing her nakedness.

She knew she was in trouble. Other than posting guards, her captor went all out. Her mind spun when she first woke up, but it had reduced and she can think more clearly. Based on her past actions, she did not bother to ask 'who would want to do this to her?'. Rather, it was more of 'who can do this to her?' That only narrowed the field so much, but it helped.

The last thing she remembered was being on the beach, beating Rouge in a race, and meeting up with a crowd of fans. Notably, she met two rabbit Mobian sisters. They were pretty sexy she had to admit. It seemed to be a case of beach babes fawning over her for her dissatisfying victory. They were just two groupies with two pet Chao in tow. They were insistent, but their sweetness was so overpowering that she let them stick around.

The rest was still too fuzzy to recall. Thinking of the optics, she worried that she did something stupid. Did she get drunk with them and passed out? Did she say no to the wrong guy at the bar? She did not feel hungover, so she doubted these. Then she wondered if those girls did this. Their looks could be deceiving, but they still do not seem to be the type to orchestrate something like this.

They might have a boss to do this on their command. Her mind remained silent until a new thought arose. Before that day, the Babylon Rogues were her group and home. Jet the Hawk did not exactly have the qualities of a leader she wanted him to have, but there was not much argument that they were following him. Despite that, her mindset changed after...no, during the race. Rouge had taken that spot in her mind, with less hesitation. It gave her a sense of mental security, but the fact that she betrayed her did not escape her.

Then, it dawned on her. She could not remember why, but she was following Rouge now. She was given a command, but she ignored it. "Rouge!" She shouted into the air. "Are you the one who did this?" The silence resumed after the outburst. "W-was it not her?" She said quietly.

The door to the room opened with the sound of heeled shoes crossing the floor. As the footsteps got closer, Wave was washed with fear and dread. The bat stood over the swallow, her breathing audible to the latter. "I've been waiting for a while. You only just now figured it out? I expected more." Rouge's voice confirmed her suspicions. "Of course, we have business to attend to." The same voice had turned stern.

"The stunt you pulled yesterday really pissed me off, Wave. I know now that you were under my control, but I wouldn't have it to have my slaves..." Rouge reached for the ropes that bonded Wave's wrists.

"Disobey!" With a tug, the rope fastened more tightly on the trapped bird. The bindings dug into her skin and strained her arms. Wave stifled a scream, leaving only a pained groan. The tension eased for a moment, but Wave knew it was not over.

"Betray!" Wave did not hear Rouge move, but the bat was now pulling at the ankle-bound ropes. Her pain resulted in a more audible scream. With the subsequent easing, Wave guessed what would happen next.

"And humiliate me!" The swallow guessed wrong. Rather than having all limbs pulled at once, only her right arm and left ankle were tugged. Unlike before, the awkward diagonal restraints threatened to pull her joints out of their sockets. Use of those limbs was impossible, but she reflexively tensed her remaining two. Flexing her arm and leg did nothing to stop the pain, rather contributing to the damage. Still, despite knowing that she was causing this pain to herself, she could not relent.

The ropes lax for no more than an inch, but it was enough. A brief moment of stillness allowed her to recoil, but was shy from completely dispelling the pain. The sensation was still lingering in her wrists and ankles with stiffness in her shoulders and waist. Wave could feel the pulse of her blood pumping as she regain circulation. That was one issue dealt with. She was not spared of her lack of freedom and movement.

"I took a chance to get you, and it didn't go exactly how I wanted. I hate it when I lose after making a bet. I am not letting this chance slip away." Her voice appeared from the other side of the torture device. In the gaps of silence and recovery, it seemed that Rouge was standing somewhere else. She was light as the wind, if not the very air in the room. Was this her level of stealth? Were the first few footsteps only there to draw fear?

"P-Please..." Wave spoke her first words directly to her face. At least, where it was last. "I-I need to know. You did something during the race. What was it? Why does it feel like you stand out more in my mind? Why am regarding you as my mistress?" Wave spoke in fear-induced desperation. She hated not knowing something that was bugging her and now it was in her own mind.

Rouge was ticked that her monologue was interrupted. "Let me make this perfectly clear." The new location Wave heard the voice was directly above her. "I 'am' your mistress and you are to address me as such. You are my slave which means you belong to me. I say whether or not you have any meaning or worth. And these are the consequences of your actions."

All four ropes were pulled simultaneously, shocking her that her prediction came late. She felt as though she was to be split down the middle of her abdomen. Any chance that her eyes were not filled with tears were now gone.

"Of course..." Rouge removed her grips from Wave's bindings. "This is not all I planned to do." The sound of heels echoed throughout the room.

"I thought about what kind of punishment I could give you. Just basic torture wasn't going to cut it. But your body...I kept my mind on that. A way to remind you of who's in charge. I just needed to create an image with it."

Rouge pulled the blindfold from Wave's eyes. Being unconscious and robbed of light, it did not take long for her eyes to adjust to the dark lit room. They had immediate focus at Rouge's hand and towards what it was reaching for...
1512112122122132.title: Is a Bird Safe in its Nest?

15121121221221322.content: “Wh... What are you doing with that.... Misstresss?” Wave forced that last word out with a smile in hopes that her punishment would be lightened. Rouge didn’t smile in return. Instead the bat took the feather to an object placed infront of wave, pulling off a tarp from the object rouge revealed;
15121121221221322.title: One of Wave's feathers, "Of how 'yo...

15121121221221323.content:
One of the tables in view held a single oblong item on top of it. A shade of pink peeked through the darkness. Its shape resembled a heart and had a tiny leaf on a stem.

Rouge scooped up the heart and put it in front of Wave's face. "Do you know what this is?"

"Some kind of fruit?" Wave stated her question as an answer.

"Good. Of course, this one is special." Rouge withdrew the fruit from Wave's vision. "This is a Heart Fruit. It jumpstarts a chao's mating season. Apparently, there is a Lifenut that does the same thing, but this was far easier to get."

Wave flushed at a single word. "Wait! Mating?!" She tried bucking upwards but was denied due to her confinement.

Rouge adopted a predatory smile as her captive realized what was implied. "I said I was going to use your body. More accurately, you're going to pay with your body."

With a snap of her fingers, a brown chao flew out from the hiding spot he was silently in. One of the two that she seen earlier with those sisters. Rouge casually tossed Chocola the fruit who eagerly caught it. The Extreme Gear specialist watched in horror as the innocent and naive creature chomped away. The bits of the fruit disappearing from the main body served as a countdown to the main event.

Upon finishing his food, Chocola burped and gave off a flowery aura. Naturally, he was seeking another chao who was nearby. Rouge was hit with a spark of annoyance. Even if she made the final push to use the ring on him and his brother, more complicated instructions still needed to be spelled out.

Rouge placed a finger on Wave's exposed midsection. "You can nuzzle up here, cutie." Chocola looked Wave in the eyes. Wave wanted the chao to do anything else other than follow that order. Alas, Chocola was oblivious to her pleading eyes.

Chocola smiled as a heart appeared on his head. He slowly fluttered through the air, moving in a motion similar to skipping. Wave saw the disaster coming with no way to stop it. "P-Please Mistress! You don't have to do this, right?!" Tears of worry and fear mixed with the previous ones of pain.

Rouge said nothing."I-I promise never to betray again! And I'll give you anything of mine that you want!"

"You should be doing that anyway." Rouge stated coldly as Chocola placed his hand on Wave's stomach.

"So this is my punishment?! Force pregnancy?! T-That's rape! It has to be rape!" Wave barked in a attempt to force morality on her mistress.

Rouge sighed, "You call this rape?" The chao started to rub his face against Wave's skin. Wave tensed at the invasion of personal space. "It may not seem like it, but that's how they do it. It's supposed to be nose-to-nose, but..." Rouge's face was dead serious.

Wave tried to shake off her attacker, but it only ended up hurting herself. She could only move even less due to the extra weight of the chao pinning her middle. The violent shaking took a toll on her body as her energy flew away.

The way Chocola was rubbing her was ticklish. Her body squirmed at the weird sensation. His soft chubby hands gripped tightly as he dug in deep. She could feel her skin move along with his face. "T-this feels...weird..."

Rouge watched from behind Chocola. Her face contorted into a scowl more befitting of her dark partner. Wave accepted what was happening, but she was making light of it. She figured that the excessive face-rubbing would not result in a baby. Honestly, Rouge knew this too. It would not do to give Wave some time to recollect her thoughts.

"You think this is it?" Rouge's voice added a hint of harshness. "You think that I was going to lock you up for one day? That there isn't anything else I could do to you? I'm going to get the results I want."

Wave, while still under the ring's effect, protected her sense of self. Rouge showed a crack in her demeanor and she was going to poke at it. "So what? I didn't break, so you're going to do the next thing until I do?"

Rouge had a plan, so she was able to avoid biting the bait. "No. First was this. Then I'll force a egg into your womb. You would be incubating it, but you'll be left with the appearance of a pregnant woman. And with the added weight..." Rouge gave a titter laugh before resuming. "It would be impossible to ignore. And anytime you look down at yourself, anytime you have trouble standing up, you'll remember why this happened. You turned on me. You will never make that mistake again."

Her hopelessness renewed, Wave winced at the chao that was still on her. Forced pregnancy or incubation? Both had there own problems, but one was worse in Wave's view. "Isn't that going a bit too far?"

Rouge waved it off without concern. "I don't see a problem with it. You're a bird and birds lay eggs."

The swallow would have deadpanned in most other circumstances, but continued to inform Rouge. "Bird Mobians don't lay eggs. Why would we have mammal parts like boobs if we did?" The bat did not admit it, but she always wondered about that. "And why does it have to be a chao egg?"

"If you had a normal baby, that would take too long. Chao eggs hatch quickly. The idea was that you were 'impregnated' by a chao from start to finish." Rouge purposefully left out the part that she found 'giving birth' to a chao to be demoralizing. For the best effect, there was to be no gap in the process. There can be no room for her to deny that it was not 'hers'. "Once this cutie had his fill, we are going to deal with the next part. Though to be honest, I've never seen them do it for this long."

Chocola was in a constant state of face rubbing. There was something on Rouge's mind that she could not shake off. The adorable chao during their mating season always did an equally cute, soft eskimo kiss. Chocola instead was in his own world, furiously nuzzling Wave's bare stomach.

Suddenly, before their eyes, Wave's midsection started to swell. Her eyes watered and she took pained breaths. Chocola removed himself, revealing what was going on. What looked to be a bubble grew in the matter of seconds. It began from where the womb was and climbed towards the torso. Once it grew length, it gained more width, inching to her sides. Then it extended from her body, poking higher off the table than her beak was. When the event settled down, two Mobians stared gobsmacked at what occurred while a floating chao danced in celebration.

Rouge's train of thought derailed. Something that seemed to have been impossible appeared in front of her. There might have been run-ins that defied her common sense, but this was exceptional. A rule of nature must have been broken. If not, they have learned something that they probably should have never known.

"N-no..." Wave wept at the development. "D-does this mean-n-n..." Her voice was stuttering and was left shaking at the end.

Rouge came to her senses at her captive's nearly broken words. Her throat was cleared as she hastily came up with something. "That...that saves a few steps." Unconsciously, Rouge placed her hand on the extended belly. It was soft and warm to the touch. She thought that the egg must be inside her, but when she poked her finger in a bit, it was not hard. Whatever was inside Wave reacted to her touch, startling Rouge and making the 'mother' gasp.

'Is it a chao? Or a Mobian? A half breed maybe? How would that even work?' Rouge could not help but mentally ask questions.

The carrier laying on the table was reasonably silent. Her mind was busy too, but not in the same way as her mistress's. She was only awake for a short time in the secret room. Rouge robbed her of her vision and mobility and ignored her voice. She completely destroyed the sense of superiority Wave harbored against her. Her body was changed on Rouge's very whim. The trapped bird could not recall the words about forcing an egg into her womb; it was unnecessary. There was a new lifeform inside of her. Whether she was a carrier or a mother, it was harder to escape from than the ropes that tied her.

She had no real options, now and in hindsight. Despite this, she tried to act out. Every time she did and anyway she did it, it would immediately backfire. She could never change the course and only ended up getting hurt. Her waist and ankles were likely marked and bruised after her futile pulling. It was hopeless.

Only through acceptance did the pain subside. In fact, Chocola's touch was oddly pleasant. The swelling did have the side-effect of making her skin more sensitive, not to mention the shortness of breath and extra weight. With Rouge's hand, her sensitivity seemed acute. Her palm on her exposed body was soothing. Is it something that she could experience if Rouge was not 'forced' to discipline her? "M-mistress...A-Are we done? Can I be...released now? Please...?" Wave wished for freedom, and only Rouge could grant it.

The mistress heard it in her servant's voice. The prideful Wave was begging for mercy. Seeing as her plan was done, she answered her wish. She did not have any more plans and the goal was to have Wave serve her soon anyway.

Released, Wave sat up as quickly as her protruding stomach allowed and hung her head. "Mistress, there is nothing else to say other than I was wrong. I was a fool to disobey and betray you. I am forevermore yours to command, to control." The first thing Wave did once she was free was apologize. Not rub the pain away from her joints, but to devote herself fully to another.

Rouge looked at Wave's hanging head and then her middle. She finally secured the mechanic she wanted, but at a cost that she herself brought onto her. Her plans went through, but not exactly as she had hoped. Was it possible that the bat felt some sense of remorse or guilt for what she caused?
15121121221221323.title: (Probably the darkest thing I've written so far.)

choices: Rouge's. "G.U.N. has a new mission for me."
Vanilla's. "Gemerl returned from his long trip."
Wave's. "Jet wants to know where I am."
151211212212213232.content:
There was a line when it came to having power over others. One could treat those under them like dirt and rule with an iron fist of oppression. They would become synonymous with fear, but some chose to fight back against that fear just for peace of mind. Otherwise, the leader could respond with care. They would be loved and many would want to protect the order. This had the real possibility to make the subject complacent and easily manipulated by others.

Naturally, any competent leader would find a balance that they were comfortable with. Rouge was someone who loved to covet, but she also wanted rational living beings and not mindless machines. The ring promised loyalty, so she thought she was good. The incident during the race showed her otherwise. She needed a firm hand to maintain control.

But now, she was more certain of something she already knew. She was responsible for anything her girls were subjected to. She would have to reap her losses as well as the benefits, even accidents.

Rouge would have to make it up to Wave for this oversight, if for her own sense of mind. That would not come freely for the new recruit though. Rouge lift the bird's head and presented her ring to her face. Wave only blinked before she got the message. She gently guided her mouth towards the ring and kissed it as if she was drinking the nectar of the gods. Again, Rouge found this form of submission enjoyable.

"I expect great things from everyone, including you. There will be rewards for the best outcomes, but slight hiccups will be punished." Wave nodded in obedience. While she hoped to get onto Rouge's good side, her powerless lingered.

Rouge was certain of the bird's loyalty and wanted her to get to work. Her first thought was to give her time to rest, but she was sleeping up until about ten minutes ago. Her primary job was to be a specialist mechanic and engineer, so Rouge figured she will only work behind a desk if necessary. She was probably well-suited to pull all-nighters too.

"Now, if you want heaven instead of hell..." Rouge continued, "I suggest you get to work immediately. It was a hassle to do it on short notice, but we renovated a room at Club Rouge to be a workshop. It couldn't be too fancy, and it's not big. But it's perfect for this."

Chocola showed up again in front of the wincing Wave. In his hands was the disrepaired ray gun. Wave uneasily took hold of this device. She studied the exterior of the device, finding 'Age changer' on the side. "Very conspicuous." Wave regained a sense of her behavior. "So, now I just need to find out how to make it work?"

The mistress explained, "Oh, it works. We stole it from Tails but it stopped working. We need you to fix it for me."

"Not really my expertise, but if Foxy thinks he could step on my turf." Name dropping Tails seemed to be a good decision on Rouge's part. There was a glimmer in Wave's eyes. "If I may, Mistress, I could revamp it after making it work again."

"Are you sure that you can get it working again." Rouge asked.

"I am positive. I place it on my pride; the pride of serving you." The reverse engineer vowed.

"Then show me." She finally gave a full command to her newest slave.

"Yes, Mistress." Wave paused after acknowledging. "Fair note, it might take some time. Borderline reality altering technology is going to take a while to understand." She pivoted on the table and stepped onto the floor. A sharp gasp escaped her lips as the uncomfortable bump lost it support and weighed on her front.

Of course, that was going to be a problem. "I'll help you to the workshop." Rouge offered.

Chocola chirped to offer his help too. Wave's expression froze. "No! Not you!" She nearly screamed as she picked up the pace. Chocola was stunned by the sudden treatment.

There were many people employed at Club Rouge, but this section was only for VIPs. This kept things secret from the staff that she hadn't hypnotized yet. Plus, if this much work was required for one person, it was a decent decision not to.

When the group left the room, they met the Rabbits lounging in the hall. It took Wave a hot minute to recognize the groupies as her partners in crimes while the mother and daughter were shocked.

"Wait...? I thought...?" Cream was confused about the series of events.

"I should've waited before taking her measurements." Vanilla was going to have to change the patterns for the new uniform.

"Oh yeah." Rouge remembered before turning to Vanilla. "Cancel the order on the chao egg. We...won't...need it anymore." Treasure hunter Rouge might have riches, but the order was in Vanilla's name.

---The sun rose twice when Cream told Rouge what was on her mind. "It didn't work on me!"

Rouge was shocked. The still grown Cream brought up the incident with the Overmind. When Sonic's team went up against the three Voxai, most of his team got brainwashed. Even Rouge vaguely remembered that she could not go against them. Cream on the other hand avoided it completely. "Then how did the ring get you?"

Cream did not know the answer. She could only give her best guess. "It probably works differently or maybe it's stronger."

"I don't think it's that one." Rouge realised that the ring's power had some weaknesses. 'Still, to be able to capture someone who was immune?'

"Mistress, everything has been going fine now, but I'm worried. What would happen if the ring doesn't work. What if it stops working." Cream was still under the Rouge's acquired power, but her free will did see her favorably.

"No." Rouge looked at Cream in the eye. "You can't put all the hope into the ring. The ring isn't what gives the commands. I am. So what if it stops working like the age machine?" She could sense that that was where the source of uncertainty came from.

"But...What if som..." Cream tried to continue only to be cutoff.

"Is there any situation in your 'what ifs' where you will betray me?"

"Y-yes..." It was not from a place of dissatifaction, but of concern. "W-what if something comes along that is stronger than the ring. Something thats c-captures you. I-I don't want to serve under someone else."

The idea was not unfounded. She strived for perfection, but such a thing did not exist. "Could there be a counter?" Rouge spoke under her voice. She even thought about how she got the ring. Why was it in a ruin alone? Why was a powerful artifact left unguarded?

At that moment, Vanilla found the two of them talking. "Mistress, the device is done. Wave is in the workshop waiting for us."

Another surprise to Rouge. It was only two days. "Great!" It was to be the first of many new things to come for their arsenal.

They went straight to the workshop to find the bulging-bellied Wave leaning back in her chair. It was Rouge's first time seeing the chair, but it was reminiscent of Extreme Gear as it was floating off the ground. 'She built the chair and repaired the gun in two days?' She questioned in her head. 'Irrelevant...'

Wave noticed Rouge eyeing the chair. "Sorry for the wait, Mistress. My body still isn't used to this." There was no need to redirect their attention to her stomach, but she did anyway.

Rouge asked before getting to the point, "What was wrong with the gun?"

The inventor summarized her answer as best as she could without leaving anything that might be important. "Tails must have designed it to be a prototype build. Even if the circuitry didn't short out, the limited power supply meant it never was supposed to last long."

The bat nodded her head. It was a satisfactory conclusion. The rather rustic look would support planned obsolescence

"What was the energy source for it?" Vanilla asked as she could not think of something that can affect someone's age.

Wave gave a uncomfortable look. "Uhh...It would get messy if I explained it." She would not care to elaborate on that topic further.

"The rest was easy to figure out. Improved wiring, replaceable power source, decrypting code in the software." Her chair turned to her workbench and she grabbed the product of her work.

"Alhaya. Ancient Babylonian for 'life'." She introduced the new and improved aging machine. It kept the ray gun shape but was altered to have a longer focusing barrel and expanded back for the unnamed power source. It was two toned with strong dark grey on the handle and a light purple that faded the closer it got to the muzzle. More impressively, the display was reoutfitted with advance options and touch screen.

Wave pointed the different functions available. "And this one here can revert someone to their original age, though I am not sure if it would work on someone who's age changed by something other than this."

"A reset button." Rouge stated plainly.

"Yes." Wave confirmed. There was no hesitation and no command. Rouge aimed Alhaya at the Rabbits and fired. The same lights went off as before and the family image was restored once more.

Rouge smirked. One blast brought both back to their rightful ages. "You did good, Wave. Real good."

Wave adopted her Mistress smirk. It was rewarding to receive praise after a job. "My pleasure."

Rouge felt assured in her ability to act now. The Rabbits can keep appearances and Wave could work behind the scenes for the time being. Still, she wanted more. She needed to fill her ranks even more.

However, Rouge was abruptly reminded that the universe would not have everything go her way. With everyone in one spot, a single phone rang out, silencing everyone. Whose phone was ringing now of all times?

15431.title: Tails

154312.content:
NOTE: Seeing as several people already threw the "No TG" rule out of the window, I don't see any harm in doing it myself.

Rouge picked up her her cell phone, and dialled the young fox's number. After a few tense seconds, she heard his voice at the other end.

"Rouge? What's up?" He asked, sounding excited to talk to someone.

"My, aren't you a little hyperactive today." She teased.

"Sorry, I was just really, really bored. Ignore what botanists tell you. Plants do not make good company." He explained.

"Right." Rouge giggled. "So, I found this weird ring, and I was wondering if you could take a look at it. Are you in Knothole?"

"Sorry again, but I'm at my Mystic Ruins lab." Tails apologised.

"That's even better. I'm at the GUN building in Station Square. I'll get a train. See you there!" She said, hanging up. "Well, the trap is set, now I've just got to spring it."

***

Rouge arrived at the Mystic Ruins station and instantly soared into the air, looking for Tails' workshop. She quickly found it on a hill nearby. It was easily recognisable, as it had a launch ramp several hundred meters long to the front, on which was parked a red biplane. She walked up to the door, and knocked on it. Tails opened it a few seconds later, and welcomed her to his home-away-from-home.

"Sorry about the mess Rouge. Now, what was it that you wanted to show me?" He asked, curious. Rouge's sweet smile turned to a sinister grin, and she fired a beam of light from the ring at Tails' eyes.

"Why, my new hypnosis ring of course." She smirked, as Tails eyes glazed over and he slumped forward, somehow still on his feet. Rouge put her finer beneath his chin, and lifted his head up to meet her examining stare. "Are you ready to hear your new orders, Tails?"

"...Yes... Rouge..." Tails droned.

"Good boy." Rouge said, complimenting her pet. She led him over to a couch, cleared the robot parts off of it, then sat down, allowing Tails to perch on her lap. "Now, first things first. No more pointless experiments. No more doing things with 'science' as your only reason. From now on, you only do experiments when I tell you to. And your inventions must all benefit my career as a jewel thief. Understand?"

"...Yes... Rouge..." The fox repeated.

"Excellent. Now, speaking of my career as a jewel thief, you will be joining me."

"... As you wish...... Rouge..." Tails said, accepting his new career.

"Buuut, not as yourself. You see, you're too recognisable. So I'm going to give you a makeover." Rouge said, leading her victim further into his trance.

"A... makeover?" Tails asked.

"Yes, Tails. You see, I know a lot about you. I know how you've always longed to be like me." Rouge lied, manipulating Tails' thoughts and emotions

"...Really..?" He asked again, confused.

"Yes my dear. You've always wanted to be a lovely, sexy female jewel thief." Rouge smirked, watching the fox's mind change in her hands.

"...I...have...?" Tails said, further questioning these orders.

"Of course, sweetie. Would I lie to you?" Rouge asked, countering Tails' question with one of her own.

"..."

"Would your mistress lie to you, Tails?" Rouge pressed for an answer.

"No... Mistress..." Tails replied, a vapid smile breaking out on his face...



Now, does Rouge have Tails build a gender bender machine, or have him become a cross-dresser?
154312.title: made Tails want to be a female theif (Rouge tea...

1543121.content:
"Mistress... I want to become a female. Not just act like one, become one..." Tails whispered.

"Well you have the means and the know-how Tails, do it. Make yourself a machine that will fix you." Rouge replied.

"Yes Mistress, thank you!" Tails squeaked, and he began to get to work. As she watched her pet build his machine, Rouge began to fantasize about what she would do with this machine. She could have, Sonic, Knuckles, Shadow, and Silver join Tails as submissive female slaves, and they would love her for it! Of all of them, she felt Silver was the biggest threat. As a psychic, he could tear apart Rouge's hold on anyone as if it were a wet paper bag. Shadow would also be a problem, with his vast powers, she'd probably need the others on her side to stand a chance. Sonic would be tough, but not impossible. She could trick Knuckles just as easily as she fooled her trusting, naive twin-tailed captive. Before Rouge could wonder about the future anymore, Tails finished his machine, and climbed into it. "Wish me luck Mistress!" Tails called, and dropped in before turning the machine on.

A bright flash was emitted from a metal canister that held Tails, and the fox was then bundled into the rest of the machine. After a while, Tails stepped out, and Rouge's jaw dropped at the sight.

Standing at the exit of the machine was a fifteen year-old vixen, with an impressive C-sized bust. She had long, slightly curly blonde hair, a small cute nose, a soft facial expression, iridescent blue eyes, wide, child-bearing hips, a shorter muzzle, and a coat of luxuriously soft, fluffy yellow fur. She was clad in an exact copy of Rouge's outfit, downsized to fit her, and the exact same makeup. Rouge wrapped her arms around the vixen, and smiled.

"My little boy has grown up into a beautiful woman." Rouge sighed. Tails blushed. "Well Tails-"

"Please Mistress, call me Tiffany." The younger woman cut in.

"OK Tiffany, I want to get you a present. A very special present." Rouge said seductively.

"What sort of special present, Mistress?" Tiffany replied, blushing.

"A slave of your own. Someone who has wronged you in the past. Maybe that bitchy swallow, or that stuck-up vixen." Rouge replied.

"Oh, I love that idea. I think I'll have..."
1543121.title: Gender-Bender

15431211.content:
"You want Fiona? Then let's go and get her." Rouge said, smiling sweetly. She stepped up and began to leave, Tiffany following excitedly. The two travelled from the Mystic Ruins to New Mobotropolis. Rouge wrote a letter, challenging Fiona to a fight, knowing that the vixen would be unable to resist a shot at her rival, and had Tiffany post it through the door of the building in which the ex-Freedom Fighter was squatting.

***

Fiona picked up the letter, and read it aloud.

"Dear Fiona Fox. I am challenging you to a no-holds barred fight, just like old times. Bring your valuables as a prize. I shall be doing the same. Yours, Rouge the Bat." She read, smirking as she did so. "Perfect. If I win, I can sell that stuff and get more money. What time is it again? That's right, 3pm. Near the lake in the Mystic Ruins. Heh. This one's all mine."

***

Fiona approached the lake in the Mystic Ruins, and snarled at Rouge. The red vixen had a pistol on each hip, and a rifle on her back. Then she noticed the fox holding Rouge's valuables, and did a double take.

"Tails? Is that you?" She asked.

"It used to be, until I got to him." Rouge replied. "Then he got a taste of 'girl power' and the end result is Tiffany, my lovely slave." Fiona burst out laughing.

"Nice one Rouge. I don't think I could do better to the kid!" She cackled. "But, getting back to business, what weapons are you using?"

"This ring." Rouge said, pointing it at Fiona, and giving her a brief flash of energy. Yet, despite the miniscule amount of time Fiona saw the beam, her eyes glazed over and she smiled, staring into space. Tiffany ran over to Fiona and waved her hand in front of her eyes.

"Fiona? Can you hear me?" She asked, worried.

"Hmm, I think she needs a bit more." Rouge said, firing another quick beam. In an instant, Fiona was on her knees in front of the two.

"My Mistress, I live to serve you." She said quietly.

"Come on then, back to Tiffany's house, my foxy pets." Rouge commanded.

"Yes Mistress." Both vixens replied.

***

Back within the confines of Tiffany's house, Rouge sat on a couch with Fiona laying down, her head in her mistress' lap.

"Now, tell me your purpose, Fiona." Rouge ordered.

"I live to serve my Mistress, Rouge the Bat, and please her in any way possible. My second purpose is to worship, adore, and obey Tiffany Prower, for she is far superior to me in every way." Fiona droned.

"Demonstrate your second purpose." Rouge said as Tiffany walked back in carrying a copy of Rouge's suit in Fiona's size, as well as a makeup kit. Fiona sprang across the run and embraced Tiffany's ankles.

"Oh Tiffany, I love you! Please keep me, Tiffany, I need you!" Fiona cried, rubbing her muzzle against the yellow vixen's leg.

"OK Fiona, I'll keep you. Just don't be such a tail-kisser, OK?" Tiffany replied, hugging the submissive red head.

"Thank you."

"Oh Fiona, dear, don't forget to change!" Rouge called, as the vixen instantly stripped and requested her friend's 'help' putting on the new outfit. After this was done, Rouge applied Fiona's new makeup, and the vixens stood to attention in front of her. "Now, I think it's time we made our power play, don't you girls?"


Who is Rouge after now?

Rouge frowned "I thought the two of you would be girls by now what's the hold up?" she declared.

"Sorry Mistress i ran into a problem with the conversion chamber set up. I'm looking into it now." Tails replied not taking his eyes from the screen. "the problem is even if I made us biologically female we would still appear male."

Rouge nodded that was certainly an undesirable outcome."So what's Sonic doing?" she queried pointing at where the blue blur was now fasting curved metal plates to the base of the machine.

"I'm setting up the conversion chambers Mistress." sonic answered not breaking from his task.

"Chambers? as in more than one?" Rouge said turning her attention back to Tails.

"Yes mistress. Unless we power the chamber with a chaos emerald the estimated time to full charge is 24 hours. I assumed your plans would move faster than that so we built multiple chambers." Tails replied before turning to face Rouge. " as a side benefit to the little speed bump the chambers will be able to modify the appearance of anyone once they are up and running."

satisfied with her pet's explanation she turned to look at the rapidly diminishing supply of parts. "Where did you get all this?"

"It's just junk egg-tech we had laying around bits of roboticizers, scanners, doomsday weapons, and some of our own junked tech." Sonic answered as he quickly moved some parts into place. "We made sure everything functioned and didn't have any hardwired programs before we started."

"How long till they're finished?"

"One hour before all chambers are physically complete. Two and a half hours until all programs are up and running with the chamber ready to use." Tails happily supplied.

Rouge wasn't sure whether to be upset that her request wasn't done or pleased they had understood her so well. still what to do with all that time she supposed she could call it a day and head to bed or she could go look for another play thing.

154332211.content:
There was no doubt in Rouge's mind, this ghost girl was about to be given a new purpose for her (undoubtibly eternal) life.

Lah sighed as she looked over the picture again and again, her ethereal purple locks hanging from the couch she layed upon. She had tried to look away but with being a ghost there really were no immediate distractions for her. That first picture she took with that handsome creature just could not be put down. She had taken many with him but this was quite special. While her fool photographers brought so many humorous and interesting photos, this was the first that truly made her feel....well...alive! At least in the heart...but still better then any of those other pictures had. It didn't help those two idiots had to go off and 'ascend', leaving her no chance of ever having a shot even coming close to him. If only that little flying friend of his didn't somehow break from his restraints, then they would have been together forever. With another sigh, Lah put a hand to her transparent chin in depression.

...creek...squeak...

Lah brought her head up, wondering if she only imagined the noises...

...Eerrr...eeeehhhh...thun!

Someone was at the door! No...was already inside! Putting her photo into her hair, Lah grabbed the camera and headed to the parlor.

"Well...it's safe to say this house is deserted by living beings. The dust and cobwebs wouldn't pass for even that sorehead Knuckles." Rouge walked through the old hall, her shoes causing the old wood to creak and squeak with every step. "Well, if a ghost would be here, they might be in the parlor...probably the only decent place in this dump."

"Hmm...maybe someone actually lives in this rattrap after all...." Without another word, the fireplace was lit by no seeable means causing Rouge to jump slightly."Sorry dear, I hope I didn't scare you...too much." Rouge turned around and saw someone sitting on a couch she swore was empty. The being seemed to look exactly like her except....the pupils were a little odd and there were heart patterns on the cheeks. Rouge, keeping her cool despite the slight jump, simply said. "Who the heck are you?" The odd copy giggled and stood up. "Oh enough about me....but I know why you're here. Your looking for a treasure of some sort I bet. Well I know a real preety piece of treasure, just waiting to have an owner. Why not come with me and we'll see if you like it." Rouge smiled internally, the creepy vibe had 'ghost girl' written all over it. Then again...if there was a treasure here it might not hurt to wait...."

Although she was viciously strong, Rogue knew that there would not be any way to for her match Sonic's insane speed or steel determination. If there WAS a way to cancel the brain washing her ring did, he would find it and ruin all of her fun. She HAD to get him out of the way. And what better way to do that than to brain wash him first.

"Someone with his speed could be useful to me." she thought. "He could gather all of the girls I want under my control and I won't have to lift a single finger!"

She let out an evil laugh then set out to find the Blue blur wonder. She found him in his favorite spot, eating, of course. She smiled then gave her ring a kiss for good luck before walking over to him, casually.

"Hey, Sonic!" she said, happily.

"Hey, Rogue." replied Sonic. he gave her a 'one eye' look. "You're not up to any mischief today, are you?"

Rogue pretended to be hurt. "Me!?!" she asked, innocently. "Why would I cause mischief?"

"Because you're good at it." said Sonic, with a wink.

Rogue laughed at his comment. "So true!" she said. "But I just came here to show you this neat ring I found."

"A ring, huh?" asked Sonic.

"Yeah, check it out!"

Rogue held out her hand for Sonic to see. As he gazed upon the stone of the ring, a beam of light shot out and Sonic stumbled backward in a blur of motion as if to dodge the attack.

Was Sonic fast enough to avoid the hypnotic light?

1553122111112112.title: Miley has bigger plans now that she has the ring.

Tails shouldn't be an issue for you as he'll be in that bubble for a few more hours." With the orders given the fox would turn away from the bat and headed out the door as she used her knowledge of the ring to cast an illusion over herself that gave her the appearance of Tails, she planned on using deception on the hedgehog.

"Hey Sonic." She said.

Miley awaited on the hedgehog's response, if he didn't know then she would zap him immediately.

"Nah, not right now. It's my day off, see?" He smiled.

"Okay." He nodded.
1553122111112112111212.title: He knows nothing

15531221111121121112121.content: With that Miley lifted her hand up and shot a line of energy from the ring to hit Sonic who didn't expect it coming. "Let's go to the Workshop slave." Sonic nodded as he picked the vixen up and ran over to the home, once inside Miley undid the illusion as Sonic awaited more orders with Rouge at his side doing the same.
15531221111121121112121.title: Capture him now.

155312211111211211121211.content: "Tails can stew for a bit longer, now I know that Big and Knuckles are in the area due to research, which one should Miley go after?"

1553122111112112111212111.content: "Mistress I forgot to mention I recruited the echidna before arriving here." The vixen did ponder for a moment: that could mean she already has control over him due to the ring or Knuckles is loyal to Rouge until she could zap him. "For all we know he could try to free his former mistress if we came to him, for now you will go to him and check his loyalty and the hedgehog will guide the feline here for me to recruit while I stay with my soon to be double." The two would nod as they didn't take another second before heading off.
1553122111112112111212111.title: Knuckles the Echidna

1553122111112112111212112.content: It would be easier to go with the idiot with super strength first rather than the gullible super strength echidna. Snapping her fingers she would have Sonic and Rouge follow her into the jungle until the reached a cliff area that hung over the small part of the jungle Big resided in, sitting with his frog fishing unaware what was about to happen. "Now slaves I want to be sure the new muscle I recruit here doesn't move an inch when I try to blast him so one of you distract him." Who goes in for the job?
1553122111112112111212112.title: Big the Cat

15531221111121121112121121.content: "Allow me mistress I do have his trust after all." Miley would give Sonic a nod of approval as he ran over to the feline and started a conversation with him, while Big was focused on Sonic the vixen lefted her hand to blast Big. "Now that was too easy!"

info.brief_description: Rouge the Bat from Sonic the Hedgehog fame finds a magic Hypnosis Ring!
info.description:
When Rouge the Bat finds a magic Hypnosis Ring, she uses it to brainwash the females of the Sonic the Hedgehog franchise into being her team of loyal jewel thieves.

A few ground rules:
1. Rouge's hypnosis ring causes whoever it is used on to be reprogrammed with Rouge's seductive, treasure-loving personality, as well as making them completely devoted to Rouge.
2. Once a girl is reprogrammed, Rouge will get them into their new uniform, a copy of Rouge's outfit modified to fit each girl's body, as well as Rouge's makeup.
3. Males CAN be hypnotized as well, but only if Rouge has a really good reason.
4. No death
5. NO ORIGINAL CHARACTERS

Otherwise, have fun!
